Reviews.Content: I got this for my husband to use with the bible touch. He absolutely loves it. He is able to find where the preacher is so much easier now. My teen tries to use it but I wont let him, I will get him one for his bday. We have had not one glitch with this kindle.

Reviews.Title: So much for that
Reviews.Author: Manuel Tavares
Reviews.Content: Bought the KIndle fire because of it's price and to try out the Prime membership. Received the Kindle pretty fast after ordering. Got it charged up and began using it-that's when I noticed that you can actually see the battery bar draining away-fast! And to charge it with the provided cable takes forever. Battery drains in less than 4 hours and takes 8 or more to charge. Really?????

Reviews.Title: Poor battery life
Reviews.Author: YVONNE AGBONTAEN
Reviews.Content: I have to charge it everyday and its very inconveniencing. My only disappointment.I love it because I can do so much more with it.

Reviews.Title: Turned it into a neat Kiosk
Reviews.Author: A. McCombs "Drue"
Reviews.Content: We bought this for Suit City of Orlando to create a kiosk for customer signups... Been working create with some apps that are out there. Easy to use, lightweight and does exactly what we want it to..

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire replacement
Reviews.Author: denise
Reviews.Content: It is o.k. but it is not MY Kindle Fire. I really liked my Kindle. The new one is different and so I am having to learn all over again. Also the battery life on the replacement does not last.  I appreciate having the new one but..... All I wanted was my own fixed and they do not offer that service to their customers.  I feel that the company should have a way for customers to get their own tablets fixed instead of having to replace them with a refurbished one. You see I feel that as customers we are paying twice for a product. They are actually getting paid twice for their products. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: renee haith
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire and wanted to give my niece the same experience.  She loves it!  Being able to enjoy movies, music, the various reading setting, etc.  Even though it is not HD it is still an enjoyable, amazing reading experience.  She says she actually reads faster.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE 7"
Reviews.Author: lashon perry
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY KINDLE, I LIKE THE PICTURE ON THE DEVICE SHOW MUCH BETTER PICTURE AND I LEARNED A FEW NEW THING ON MY KINDLE

Reviews.Title: It is too perfect
Reviews.Author: MIKE
Reviews.Content: It is too perfect, I can't imagine, I have been watching this product before, I also like the design style.

Reviews.Title: A Very Nice Machine
Reviews.Author: V A C "V A C"
Reviews.Content: A Very Nice Machine. A Very Nice Machine. I am glad I got this - everything works well and I'd certainly by a Kindle again.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy! My 3 Year Old loves it!
Reviews.Author: Pam Brice
Reviews.Content: Got the Kindle for My 3 yr old. He absolutely loves it. Great buy. Great price. Only, I Wish it had a camera.

Reviews.Title: Thanks for Replacement and Service
Reviews.Author: Dolores Brown
Reviews.Content: I like the Kindle and I read alot of books. The service was great and the turn around time was very timely.  Thanks again forthe replacement and service.Dolores J. Brown

Reviews.Title: So far, so good.
Reviews.Author: kathryn
Reviews.Content: Well, it seems to be working just fine.  A little different than my old gen 1 KindleFire.  The running ads on the bottom are a little distracting but not that big a deal for me.  The only strange thing is that it is from England, I guess?  The pre-loaded news feed, touch screen keyboard, and spellings are British.  There is probably a way to reset it...I haven't figured it out.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire (Previous Generation)
Reviews.Author: Pamela Dozier
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire, it is everything I thought it would be and more.  It's light weight, easy to navigate.

Reviews.Title: Refurbd Kindle
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: I purchased this refurb. Kindle for my grandson (3yrs old), who utilizes it everyday. The battery life goes slightly fast but otherwise a good buy to read & play games for fun or educational.

Reviews.Title: My mom loves it!
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: My mother is an avid reader and after discussing if she'd enjoy a Kindle or not, she argued that she prefers hard copies of books. So I bought the Kindle for her and she LOVES it. She brings it to work with her all of the time and even bought one for my grandmother. I purchased the extra warranty too just to be safe and it was well worth it!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: This refurbished Kindle was the first one I bought. It's just like having a new one. The only thing I did not like was that the charger was not included. No indication was made that you had to purchase one.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my 10 year old
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: This was one of the best purchases I have made for her. I love the fact that I can see what she is downloading on my Amazon Account and I don't have to have the kindle in my hands to add or make changes to it.She has dropped it several times, and even though we have the screen protector and a portfolio for it, there hasn't been any damage.If I had a complaint, it would be that the charging cable isn't very long.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: A. Meyer
Reviews.Content: I am on my second Kindle Fire. The first was returned because every two weeks or so, I would get the message that I ran out of space on my storage, even though I literally had NOTHING stored on the device. Did the factory reset a couple of times, then they told me they would send me a new one. Guess what... the new one has the EXACT SAME PROBLEM! Now, I'm being told they are aware of the problem, but no solution  has been found, so I should just keep doing the factory reset. This is incredibly annoying, and I shouldn't have to do that.So yeah, if I could hop in a time machine and go back to when I was deciding what tablet to buy, the Kindle Fire would not be on that list.

Reviews.Title: Technical Issues / Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Buyer1
Reviews.Content: This kindle was purchased as a gift for my mother. The reason I gave this product only three starts is because of technical problems we encountered. Not even a week after receiving and using the Kindle it stopper working. When trying to power on the device the Kindle would become locked up on the Kindle Fire start-up screen. I contacted Kindle and they were very helpful and understanding. They immediately sent a new refurbished kindle.Unfortunately, the second replacement Kindle stopped working after only a few hours. While setting up my Kindle the touch screen became non-responsive and the Kindle became locked on the lock screen. Kindle support attempted to resolve the issue, to no avail. Again they were very helpful and sent yet another replacement Kindle. So far, the third one is a charm. It has been working properly for about 2 weeks (fingers crossed).As for the quality of this purchase I am torn due to the technical issues that arose. However, for my mother, and the selling price, the refurbished Kindle was the best route. I have had a separate Kindle fire for my self for over 2 years now and it has worked great. I think we may have just run into some bad luck with the first two. As for the quality of service provided by Amazon and their Kindle Support staff I give them five stars. They were very helpful, understanding, and prompt.

Reviews.Title: Defective plug- stops charging
Reviews.Author: Laura Eddings
Reviews.Content: Kindle stops charging. Have several friend's who  have had the same problem. Amazon took great care of us and replaced two for us, even upgrading the second. In the end we decided to purchase an iPad mini, instead.

Reviews.Title: The Best Little Computor Out There!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Gillespie
Reviews.Content: I have had and used ALOT of different tablets and Amazon Kindle is best! High quality,durable and many features. We even bought our 6 yr old Grandson one. He is learning so many things. Just plain old down to work craftsmanship.THANK you. I can take my computor any where. As a matter of fact this is the only comp. I work on.It is so small I canput it in my purse and use it . The pics and words and numbers are very nice quality.I van do almost everythingI need with this and with accessories it is almost limitless.The batteries go low on about the same as most.I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE!  THANK you.  :  )

Reviews.Title: software issues, too heavy
Reviews.Author: Alethea Comfort "mizelly"
Reviews.Content: I will never get another refurbished kindle, nor pay for the extended warranty which replaces your broken kindle with a refurbished. I have had issues with the thing shutting off and coming on by itself and having to hard boot in order to get it back on, on a regular basis. Had to go to tech services once now and have only had it a couple months. Thinking about getting a nook.

Reviews.Title: do not buy this is a bad product
Reviews.Author: gamer xbz2
Reviews.Content: it does hold its charge& it only charged 7% in 8 hours. i would never get another amazon kindle of any kind.

Reviews.Title: Bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Claire E. Lindelow
Reviews.Content: I had an old school Kindle that was not working properly, so I was looking for a comparable replacement.  This is not only much nicer with the touch screen, color, and Internet access, but it was cheaper than my first Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Loved it so much I bought two!
Reviews.Author: Staci Lynn Perry "Staci"
Reviews.Content: I loved it so much I bought two! I have one and so does my 6 year old. My son has ADHD and this tablet keeps his attention longer than any of his other toys and he will even let it read him books! I love how useful these things are and how theirs an app for basically everything.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: angela
Reviews.Content: Was impressed that I was able to find it for a very good price.  I had to replace my other one that I had, went to Mexico, then it wasn't working anymore.  We think it had something to do with going through security and stuff like that.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Cindy Kinnaman
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire! If the description had not said "Refurbished", i would not have known. It is flawless and works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Ronald J.
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is truly outstanding and does everything it is advertised to do. I would recommend this to others.

Reviews.Title: Money worth spent.
Reviews.Author: olweny Charles
Reviews.Content: I like the kindle and the cover that fits it well. With it I can get the literature I want on line and read, communicate via face book, e-mails etc. For me it is money worth spent. The page background however is too bright for me but with the other options available, that has been covered.Olweny Charles.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kamuhl
Reviews.Content: I have 3 Kindles I love them all.  The special offers have not been a problem for me and I mostly don't realize that they are there.  I would not give up one of the 3 they all have a specific place in my life.  Imagine, Carrying your library with you where ever you go.  What a deal.!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Kara Gerstman
Reviews.Content: I haven't been able to put it down for very long since I have gotten it. I will buy more in thre future. Fast delivery also!

Reviews.Title: refurbished but as good as new
Reviews.Author: Fisayo Oludipe
Reviews.Content: It's as good as a brand new kindle. I am very pleased with it. The resolution is amazing and it's not overlying sensitive.

Reviews.Title: Great especially for the price
Reviews.Author: Lynn L.
Reviews.Content: Paid only $99 and so worth it.  Convenient to have books and music and emails and web access in a portable lightweight easy to use tool.Eventually will find time to learn to exploit all the features.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Kathy Lacek
Reviews.Content: once Kindle is shut off for some time, after turning it back on it is slow or sporatic.  after it warms up it is ok.

Reviews.Title: Amazon will not cover a common problem caused by a defective internal part. Stops charging after approximately 18 months.
Reviews.Author: Lori120 "Lori120"
Reviews.Content: My Kindle was given to me as a gift by my brother who had also gotten one for himself at the same time.  At first it worked great and I loved it.  However, BOTH of our Kindles starting having problems charging about the same time, which happened to be about six month after the warranties expired.  We found out that the charging problems we had were becoming increasingly common with the Kindle Fire because there is a problem with a defective internal charging port.  This is clearly a manufacturer's defect, but instead taking responsibility and offering to fix the problem for their out-of- warranty customers, Amazon choose to use the problem as a to way to try to get even more money from them.  They won't fix the defective Kindles they sold to us to, but out of the "goodness of their hearts", they are willing to "give" us a $100 discount if we buy a new and very expensive Kindle HDX.  The price range is roughly $424 to $594.  They have already us sold us defective Kindle Fires, and now they expect us to buy an even more expensive model from them?  Not me!  With the lack of support that Amazon has provided, you can safely bet that I never waste another penny on a Kindle product again!How can they expect us give them MORE money for ANOTHER Kindle when they won't take responsibility to fix the defective ones we've already paid for?  With that kind of service and attitude, you can bet that I will never buy another Kindle again.

Reviews.Title: So so
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Neuman
Reviews.Content: This device has good books but app qaulity is very low and 99% of the time your internet won't work and it'll turn off your device or sometimes it won't even turn on very iffy device do not recommend for sort tempered people.

Reviews.Title: The person i bought this from totally screwed me on this item.
Reviews.Author: Billy Fisher
Reviews.Content: I give this advice to anyone about to buy a kindle off amazon. I bought a kindle off here and within a month it quit working and I had to send it back after gripping about it then they supposedly fixed sent it back to me. Then it quit working again and I sent it back and said I either want it fixed right or a refund and they got the kindle never sent me the kindle back or my money! This was the most horrible service I have ever had!!

Reviews.Title: Worst consumer product I ever purchased..
Reviews.Author: David Snyder
Reviews.Content: Did not realize that my product has never worked properly until just spoke to 3 Help Desk service members this week.  Had loved Amazon and now will be sure to spread the message how they wanted me to pay $63 for a replacement product for one that had never worked.

Reviews.Title: Extremely disappointed
Reviews.Author: j Woodson
Reviews.Content: This kindle does not charge well and when it does the charge does not hold more than 8 hours even with no or minimal use. Not pleased at all since this is a replacement for a kindle that would not charge at all. Extremely disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished kindle replacement
Reviews.Author: dugan44
Reviews.Content: I was sent this refurbished kindle by amazon to replace my original new Kindle that was not properly responding and I could not charge it.  The cost to me was $63.20.  This second refurbished kindle has not worked we'll.  I had. To call CS and explain that every time I turned the kindle on,I had to reboot it causing loss of all data I down loaded from the cloud.  CS told me new software had to be loaded to the kindle. Why would you send out a refurbished kindle that was not ready to use?  The kindle is still giving me problems.  I will be calling CS once again.  As I see the problem, I should be given a refund of my payment of $63.20 and return the kindle to you.  The other solution would be for you to send me a new working kindle.  I am most disappointed with Amazon and with kindle.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Tasha Hearn
Reviews.Content: I bought this kindle fire refurbished because I already had one and needed a second one so my kids would stop fighting over them. Looked flawless no scratches looked brand new. Does seem to fill up the memory space faster but over all great. I was worried buying refurbished but amazon knows what they are doing.

Reviews.Title: Kindle version 2 should have been upgraded better
Reviews.Author: janice exarhos
Reviews.Content: Easy to read and similar to the first version. Just wish was a paper white so I can read easier outside. Also a little heavy and Hard to hold

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: 20-20 hindsight
Reviews.Content: Low tech, not well lit, not color, not a good product.  Not sure the whole concept of books on a digital screen is a great idea.

Reviews.Title: Replacement for kindle that had problems!
Reviews.Author: Kitty Kat "Angel Eyez"
Reviews.Content: I needed a replacement kindle due to battery and charging issues. I hope this new one is all good, or I am gonna be so mad.

Reviews.Title: The touchscreen stoped working after 13 months
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Brandao Bunevich
Reviews.Content: I'm a very careful user and I used to use this tablet just a little bit every week mainly to read news or e-book. However, after 13 months of usage it presented a serious problem on the touchscreen responsiveness, it basically went nuts and presses itself and don't recognize the my gestures or clicks.It was supposed to be a great device, but it is really low quality, because when I searched on the internet I found a lot other people with the same issue as mine.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: TaylorHentz
Reviews.Content: I've had this for a couple weeks now and I just absolutely love it! When I recieved it, it was already customed to me like amazon had programed it for me!I love that! I have amazon prime so all the movies I get for free and books, its just amazing on the kindle. The only thing I didn't like is that it didn't come with a wall adaptor just the cable charger, but I have had so many iPhones I had about 5 just laying around that I used. I would definitely purchase again for a friend or kids.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Mrs.Jolin "holly"
Reviews.Content: sure, there's no camera, there's no extra ports or anything super high tech or jazzy, but it meets my needs when I want to browse online, read, play games or do other online basics.  I was going to return/exchange and get an ASUS MeMOPad....because the device was faster, had internal 16gb memory and two cameras, but considering all of the other toys I have...this kindle is great.  No need to be greedy.  Also, it is easy to use and has step by step guides to walk you through the process.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding value...
Reviews.Author: J. Collett "Tech Jack of all Trades"
Reviews.Content: This is a fully functioning Android tablet, with 8gb storage, a clear color screen, fast processor and great performance in its price range.  The next best competitor is more money, with less memory and (to put it as delicately and kindly as possible), slow as heck.Oh, and it's a Kindle, and comes pre-setup to your Amazon account, so purchases and downloads are seamless the day you take it out of the box.  I was reading my previously purchased Kindle e-books about 90 seconds after firing it up for the first time.And while that box says "refurbished" my guess is that the first generation Kindle Fire is being liquidated, since mine arrived in pristine condition, sealed, new accessories and even the packaging was free of any blemish save shelf wear and a little dust.My recommendation is buy it.  Now.  Go ahead I'll wait.:)

Reviews.Title: Great Parental Control
Reviews.Author: Tony Dunnick
Reviews.Content: Great parental controls with chooses for the freedoms I want my kids to have appropriate to their responsibility. Even without touching the device.

Reviews.Title: Mines Won't Charge
Reviews.Author: J. McCloud
Reviews.Content: I Thought This Tablet Was Suppose To Be Good But I Was Wrong . The Thing Won't Even Charge For . Which Really Sucks Since I Been Buying Amazon Products For A While And It Is Very Disappointing .

Reviews.Title: Slow and hard to use
Reviews.Author: Shyla Barnett
Reviews.Content: It's slow and not as user friendly as my other Kindles. I should have spent the extra money to get a newer Kindle.

Reviews.Title: DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR REGULAR KINDLE WARRANTY!!! Buy an extended warranty
Reviews.Author: Crafty Mom
Reviews.Content: My mom purchased this for my daughter. We had difficulties within weeks of it not charging. We sent it to amazon who said it was fine. Got it back and had the same issues. After having enough with the issues, called amazon again. Because it's purchased through "warehouse deals" you DO NOT QUALIFY FOR THE REGULAR KINDLE WARRANTY!!!! It's all refurbished products that people didn't want for a reason.Bottom line, we wasted a ton of money for something that NEVER WORKED. Amazon refused to stand by the product and return it.Don't get me wrong, the actual Kindle is great, but don't buy it through the warehouse deals.

Reviews.Title: not pleased and wouldnt buy again
Reviews.Author: sabrina hill
Reviews.Content: It does the same as all the other 4-5 that i have sent back. It continues to freeze. Its not worth the money i speny.

Reviews.Title: BEST
Reviews.Author: PAT PERRY
Reviews.Content: Kindle fires are the best, period. Bought a knock off tablet for my kids for Christmas & I regard it... Never again!!!

Reviews.Title: Refurbished? More like repackaged and resold.
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: There is no way any person or Amazon robot actually tested this tablet after it was "refurbished." I received the unit and all was good; it felt sturdy, the display was good. Immediately, however, I began having trouble with the touch screen. Selecting targets was incredibly frustrating. The tap surface was overly sensitive the the point where scrolling was nearly impossible. Softly swiping a finger across the screen would result in an errant selection nearly every time, but not always. Typing was impossible. Sometimes a letter on the other side of the keyboard was selected, sometimes it was two keys away, rarely was it the letter I was targeting.Anyway, luckily this is Amazon! I returned the product without any worry or problem. Amazon, is great. The Kindle I received, not so much.

Reviews.Title: DIDN'T WORK!
Reviews.Author: jenlm
Reviews.Content: I tried to set it up for my daughter and couldn't even get past the wireless login! Tried typing in the password and it was typing a Z when I was trying to hit the back button. EVERY Button I hit, it would type Z!!!! It's been returned. I will never buy another refurbished anything from Amazon again!-Misty

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: snotwad
Reviews.Content: The replacement Kindle I was sent loses charge faster than the one that was replaced. My next tablet will be a Samsung. =/

Reviews.Title: My kindle fire return
Reviews.Author: john doe "Dog lover"
Reviews.Content: I chose to return this and bought a new kindle paper white instead. I didn't enjoy using the fire and missed some of the features I had on the kindle. But I  very pleased,as always, with Amazom service

Reviews.Title: "Don't buy one" - you'll be sorry.
Reviews.Author: Sparky
Reviews.Content: The micro usb power charging port has intermittent function...sometimes will not take a charge.  Amazon says they will replace gear with new or refurbished at their discretion.  I have only been given refurbished gear, and all units have functioned poorly, including the "new" original one.  I now actively discourage anyone I know from buying one.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased!!!  Money Well Spent
Reviews.Author: kirah
Reviews.Content: Was a Christmas gift for 8 year old daughter and she absolutely loves it.  She plays games educational/fun, read books, and watches favorite t.v episodes on it almost daily.  Displays nicely.  Couldn't be more happier with it. Also brought a protective case from amazon to go with it.  Can modify parental controls and love Kindle free time made just for kids.  Have purchased other tablets and this is the best in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy !!!
Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my Granddaughter for Christmas. She has really enjoyed using her Kindle. You could not tell it was refurbished. It looked brand new. No performance issues at all. In fact I am planning to purchase another refurbished Kindle for my husband.

Reviews.Title: great for travelling
Reviews.Author: barbara rubingh
Reviews.Content: I did not think I'd like this but I don't travel without it now.  Not only does it hold books, games, music, when you have Wi-Fi access, you can get your e-mails and search the net.  I don't have a smart phone so this has come in very handy even on international trips.

Reviews.Title: Awsome
Reviews.Author: Cat cratz
Reviews.Content: Awsome tablet responded very fast love it very light and has a colorful screan I absolutely recamend this tabletLove it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Highland Lass "CelticGirl"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle!  I've had other readers but the Kindle beats them by a mile.  Not only do I have my books with me at all times but I also have games to play.  My grandson loves to play games and having me read him stories.  I don't leave home without it!

Reviews.Title: Really Great
Reviews.Author: Sunshine Radford
Reviews.Content: I was the best way for me to buy my kid a Kindle! It looked brand new and the packaging was new.

Reviews.Title: Great for a beginner
Reviews.Author: Wendy Barron
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 80 year old father to learn how to communicate on Facebook.  It was large enough for him to see the screen and the key board was easy to use.

Reviews.Title: my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Judy Bell
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle. I just wish it had a longer battery life so I could use it more while traveling.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Bradia Burwell
Reviews.Content: i absolutely love my kindle fire. you can do so many things on it. i love reading books on it. going on the web, playing music, games, and more.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Raymo
Reviews.Content: I didn't buy this for myself but I can tell you that she really likes it. Believe me if she didn't like it I would be the first to know.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying it
Reviews.Author: MissWings 92
Reviews.Content: We are enjoying our kindle fire. The kids love the games and we love being able to use it for our games too.

Reviews.Title: I swear this thing was brand new!
Reviews.Author: Just Sum Dude
Reviews.Content: It was in flawless beautiful condition, not one scratch. The only down side is that it does not come with a charger block.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Product
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Berg
Reviews.Content: I would never recommend this product to anyone but the garbage man. It continually freezes or just randomly shuts down for no reason. It refuses to download some documents or pictures and is slower than my desktop computer. I wish I had never bought this POS.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Chelsea Gottshall
Reviews.Content: I got my kindle for Christmas and I absolutely love it. I looked into other models, but they were all too expensive for what I wanted. When I saw this I was a bit turned off about it being refurbished, but I haven't had a problem yet and it's been about 2 months. I highly recommend. You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE 7" REFURBISHED
Reviews.Author: MALINDA G KUHLE
Reviews.Content: MY SON BOUGHT THIS ITEM AND HE LOVES IT!  IT LOOKS AND WORKS BRAND NEW!  I WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS ITEM.

Reviews.Title: l like it
Reviews.Author: Heather Lee
Reviews.Content: I am happy with it,it is like having my old iPhone,but I can't make calls or take it on a run. I haven't been able to get books yet because Amazon Prime is so flippin` expensive and other book sites charge so much. When did books become such a hot commodity? Oh well, at least all my other apps get a workout.

Reviews.Title: I'm on my 6th replacement Kindle - all with charging problems
Reviews.Author: Yours Truly "Compassion for all sentient bein...
Reviews.Content: I'm so sick of it. Yes, Customer service is decent about replacing them as long as they are still under warranty. But it's a pain in the ass to keep schlepping every Kindle down to UPS after boxing it up again sending it back. Amazon says the charging problem is not a "known issue."But go to the community support pages. There are HEAPS of people with the same problem. By the 6th replacement Kindle, you'd think at least they'd upgrade me to the newest Kindle version for all the hassle, but nope. I'm a Prime member, so until my membership runs out, it makes sense to use this thing, at least for the streaming. [Which? By the way? Is weird. Random episodes of shows. Most stuff you still have to pay for.]I bought my daughter a Nook and it's quite nice. If this 6th Kindle fails, I might just bite the bullet and go for the Nook.

Reviews.Title: grandson
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My grandson loved playing with mine. So I bought him this. He loves it. Oh and I am an AWSOME gramma! lol

Reviews.Title: Glad we changed to Kindle
Reviews.Author: Carla
Reviews.Content: We originally ordered something from Wal-Mart.com (My mother did this, I told her to use Amazon!) And the devices wouldn't work out of the box. These were a Christmas present, so naturally my mother was enraged, upset, just freaking out. So I logged in with my Prime account three days before Christmas, and ordered four of these. They literally have not put them down since they opened them on Christmas morning. (Yes, they got here in two days, even with UPS and FedEx goofing this year!)

Reviews.Title: One of My Best Devices
Reviews.Author: J. Orbs "Ink buyer"
Reviews.Content: I use my Kindle Fire every single day.  Whether it is to check the weather, look up movies, check Facebook or my emails.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Judy A. Pierce
Reviews.Content: Wow!  I won this in a contest and I must say I am surprised at how well it operates.  I have a Velocity Cruz also that I thought was great until I started using the Kindle.They are like night and day.  The Kindle is so much faster and the video's are clean and crisp not cloudy.It holds a lot of info too!I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: 2nd one... charging issues again.
Reviews.Author: Akiko Kawahata
Reviews.Content: The whole systeming is screwed up. The silk browser constantly shuts down, very small memory capacity, etc. The REAL problem is the charging issue. I had one, it constantly stopped charging. I knew another girl with a kindle fire, and figured out it was a common problem and they would exchange it for a new one. I exchanged it, and once again, within less than half a year, I rarely get it to charge. Sometimes I go days without using it, not for lack of uses, but because I have given up trying to charge. Shoddy piece of tech, Amazon. Never buying one of their tablets again.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My mom had been wanting one and I saw this on amazon.  Every time we see her she is so proud and happy with it.  She likes that she can read her books and also go on to the Internet all on this one device.

Reviews.Title: Need to learn how to use it better.
Reviews.Author: Marilyn R Graham
Reviews.Content: Need to learn how to use it better. It has taken more time to learn than my regular edition and more complex.

Reviews.Title: Certfied Refurbished Kindle Fire is just as good as a new one!
Reviews.Author: pamela schulze
Reviews.Content: I just received another certified refurbished kindle fire, and this is not my first one. I have purchased several, one for myself and several for my grandsons. This model is just as good as a new one and cheaper. When I received my first kindle fire for Christmas in 2011 I thougth what will i do with this. But I have grown to love my kindle fire, and DARE anyone to touch it. There is only two complaints that I have and that after several months of daily use, it doesn't want to charge. This is either because of the connection port becoming loose or the charger fails to make connection. Also, the charger that is sent with the kindle is cheaply made. My opinion is like many others, if we as consumers are spending good money for either a new kindle or refurbished kindle we should be given the 9W charger that Amazon is selling for roughly $19.

Reviews.Title: Third time's the charm... I hope
Reviews.Author: Gail Ann Wacker "Goblin Mama"
Reviews.Content: Had my first Kindle Fire given as a gift about 14 months before it began to not charge properly.  After it finally stopped charging altogether, my husband researched the problem, only to find that a loose charging port was a common problem.  So, we called and Amazon immediately replaced it.  That Kindle, too, had a loose charging port right out of the box!Now I have a 3rd one - this one seems to be brand new and is giving no problems.I love the convenience of being able to carry a library with me, plus several games, so I can occupy myself while waiting in line, or going out for a solitary lunch.It's the second best gift I've ever received - my husband was the FIRST best.  Sorry, Kindle!You're good, but can't beat my husband.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased Customer
Reviews.Author: Disappointed buyer
Reviews.Content: I continued to be amazed and pleased with Amazon customer service. My compliments to everyone there.  My old Kindle (DX Model) had been around the world (literally) and was never treated gently. After a number of years faithful service an irreparable button broke.  Amazon sent me a refurbished Kindle Fire for less than I would  have expected to pay for sending my DX in for repair. My books downloaded automatically and I love my smaller, color Kindle Fire. Was sent as a "Refurbished" Kindle but I can not tell difference from brand new one.  Great deal from great company.

Reviews.Title: Warning cold soldier joints
Reviews.Author: Bluewhale
Reviews.Content: Amazon has sold thousands of kindle fires with charging circuits with cold solder joints they will not fix. Or replace

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: I'm only 8 years old.  I can do a lot of things with this.  A lot of apps.  I can send emails to my aunt ( who brought this for me).  Watch movies, u-tube, and play music.  Hope to get the HDX if I get the best report card.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle
Reviews.Author: K. Childers
Reviews.Content: Nice kindle to use for my reading.  Need to order a charge for my kindle. Pleased with it so far and would consider purchasing one again.

Reviews.Title: uexpectedly versatile!
Reviews.Author: dsw
Reviews.Content: very versatile and user friendly. I had originally purchased this to read but it's Wi Fi capabilities have made it very useful for surfing. it is faster than I expected and I am truly enjoying it's capabilities

Reviews.Title: It's worth it
Reviews.Author: Priscila Wilford
Reviews.Content: The refurbished kindle fire is faster but the battery life is short.. My 6 year old is the one who's using it because I got the kindle fire HDX. The refurbished is cheap so it's worth the money. I can recommend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire 7" WiFi, 8GB
Reviews.Author: truecrimelover
Reviews.Content: I have bought at least 3 refurbished Kindles at this point, one for family member and 2 as gifts.  No one has had any issues at all with any of them.  They have been just like purchasing a brand new product plus they come with a 1 year warranty anyway!  My son was extremely pleased with his as he now uses it instead of his laptop.  Would purchase again without a second thought!

Reviews.Title: Great Service
Reviews.Author: Grandma
Reviews.Content: I want to say one thing for sure.  We had one Kindle  that did not work and  you were so great, we had a new one  here within a couple days, what great service you have.  I will always shop with you.  Thanks for your great Customer service.  Everything I  have ever ordered from you has been fantastic.  Thank you so much.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Billy C. Register "bear 0ne"
Reviews.Content: i like my kindle it  makes it easy to view about anything and my kids get a blast out of using it

Reviews.Title: Love IT
Reviews.Author: Kimberly
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle Fire back in March of 2013. I love it. As of just a couple of weeks ago I had NO problems with it. Now I have noticed it is getting slow loading and even playing games it loads slow. My husband uses it more than I do because I got him hooked on BINGO. Maybe its just needs a good break from BINGO for a while. LOLI have thought about buying another Kindle Fire and he can have mine beings it has his now favorite game on it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7" Second Generation
Reviews.Author: Eileen L.
Reviews.Content: The first generation Kindle Fire was easier to use. It frustrated the heck out of me!  There are better products out there.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: wendy kirby
Reviews.Content: Got this for mom for Christmas ,she loves it  it has everything she needs ,she can read go on Facebook and play she has had so much fun with its,she is 77 ,I recommend it for everyone ,

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Kayla
Reviews.Content: I was weary to get one of these for my mother who's never given my kindle a second glance over her real books but I took the plunge and she loves it. She likes going to bed early, but then she likes checking facebook or playing games on her phone instead of taking her laptop so I thought this would be a happy medium. I was really scared she'd shy away from it (not big on electronics) but she's already finished a book and has been on me for days to put more on it. Definitely worth it!

Reviews.Title: Good for a little while!
Reviews.Author: Pam Dixon
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle for my birthday. Worked great I was in love.  Then shortly after the warranty expired (9 days to be exact) the  unit would not recharge unless I wiggled the cord. They offered a replacement for a discounted price which was not satisfactory as it was still within the same month the warranty expired. So just remember the warrantyruns to the day you register it not the month. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: How did I live without a Kindle fire?
Reviews.Author: Andrea Peterson "Andrea"
Reviews.Content: I fought reading books on a Kindle for a long time, but once I was one chapter into my first book I was hooked. The Kindle Fire is easy to read, portable, and the screen is lit so I can read at night without disturbing my husband. I can check my email and websites/blogs with it. Also I can listen to music on YouTube, and the sound is amazingly good. I got one for my husband, and he now has it wherever he goes. So, I'm reading in bed and want to know the definition of "sans souci," I can go to Google and look it up without getting out of bed. If it's an English word in a book I'm reading, I just press on the word on the screen and the definition pops right up! Love it. The best thing, though, is the fact that as I browse the Kindle store and see a book I'm interested in, I can download a sample of the book and start to read it. If I like it, I can click on "Buy Book" the book downloads in a few seconds (no need for delayed gratification:)) I've downloaded samples of most of the books I buy, and it has definitely saved me money. I almost forgot an interesting feature: When you highlight a book in your library, at the bottom of the screen a list of books that are similar in style, author, or topic appears. I have found several really good books this way!

Reviews.Title: Just as good as NEW!
Reviews.Author: lindy cornell
Reviews.Content: I have nothing but good things to say about this! I had purchased two refurbished Kindle fires for my 5 and 7 year old. Last Christmas I had bought my 9 and 11 year old brand new ones! And there is literally no difference, except the price!

Reviews.Title: Happy customer
Reviews.Author: Danny Alverson
Reviews.Content: Really enjoy this product. Reading watching movies, TV shows at my finger tips is great. A great way to spend my relaxing time.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: curveuser "aeaud9"
Reviews.Content: While the older generation Kindle that I have is nice as a reader, it is virtually useless due to its incredibly short battery life and its incredibly L-O-N-G re-charging time.  I've tried charging it with USB and my computer and also with a USB power adapter -- either way takes many hours in order to build up enough battery life to read for a short while.  I hope the newer generations have improved on this disappointing feature, but I'm not likely to spend any more money on a Kindle product due to this bad experience.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Krystina Anthony
Reviews.Content: I had an older Kindle Fire and the charging port died on it so I had to buy one of these refurbished ones from Amazon; not a huge deal, I don't mind refurbished stuff.However, when I received the new Kindle I noticed there was something different about it. The sales rep told me this one was the same as mine. But it's not. It's quite different. It's as if the whole OS got an upgrade. I've gotten used to most of the things, but there are some that I hate about it.-Downloads. I download something, I see it in the browser menu, but when I tap it to open it, nothing happens. I've tried with multiple downloads and nothing changes. It's quite irritating.-Carousel. I'm not sure if there's any way to turn this off, but I hate how it displays the whole "Customers Also Bought This". I don't really care. If I want to see things related to that app or book, I can look on Amazon. I don't even know how but my cat ended up buying a book like this. Thankfully I could return it, but it was some book that I had NO interest in this book or anything like it at all.-Swype. Whoever thought that putting Swype on the Kindle and making it IMPOSSIBLE to remove is an idiot. You're probably going to tell me to get with the times. I'm a 24 year old woman who has had several smart phones and the like and I understand how things work and such. Making Swype a mandatory thing is ridiculous and it's enough to make me never buy another Kindle if they don't implement a way to turn it off. I don't like drawing all over my screen to form words; I tap to type with my thumbs, just like I would on a phone.Overall, I'm quite dissatisfied with my new Kindle. I will use it until it dies and by then if they haven't made some improvements, I will probably look into another brand of e-reader.

Reviews.Title: Lasted about 6 months...
Reviews.Author: Nicole Hauff
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed with the kindle fires. I bought 4 last Christmas 2012, and 3 out 4 will no longer charge. We get the black screen on all 3 now and now the 4th one is starting to act up when we go to charge it. Called customer service, which they were nice, but to fix it will cost more than to replace them. This Christmas I'm going with 4 mini iPads. I have 2 iPads now and never had any issues.

Reviews.Title: Junk only last for 1 year
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: this kindle fire will last one year to the date  I was happy with it till it stopped tacking a charge.I bought it in November of 2012

Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle Fire/Amazon is a "class act"
Reviews.Author: Ellen Jeffers
Reviews.Content: My first Kindle Fire wouldn't hold a battery charge and when I called Amazon a replacement was sent "no questions asked"!!  AND it was a real pleasure to talk to the Amazon rep . . . a really simple process of returning my "broken" one and the new one was received almost immediately.  I LOVED my first Kindle Fire and this one is exactly the same (but holds a charge!!).  Amazon is a class act in my book - - I've never been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: 1st Gen Kindle still works great after 2 years
Reviews.Author: Chris30542
Reviews.Content: I have owned my Kindle fire for over 2 years now and I still use it all the time. I play in a band and use an app to scroll lyrics, I read Kindle books on airplanes, and I use it to surf the web and play games. I wish it had a mic and external storage but otherwise, it's been a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: I love my new Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Proud Cheapskate "Proud Cheapskate"
Reviews.Content: Was given an earlier version of the Kindle a few years ago as a birthday gift. I love it but wanted one that had a lighted face. The certified refurbished Kindle Fire has been perfect so far. It's everything I'd hoped for and more. I use it almost as often as my iPad 2. Definitely worth your consideration.

Reviews.Title: Won't hold a charge!
Reviews.Author: misdan
Reviews.Content: I really like the Kindle Fire, but this one will not hold a charge. I can only use it for a very short time before I have to plug it in again. I have called to report this problem but have not heard back from Amazon about a resolution to the problem. It is really too bad because I think I would enjoy it very much if I could actually use it without being tied to a wall plug.

Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Christina Perdue
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle. This is the best investment I have made all year. There are freebies to be had everywhere including apps, books, etc. just have to know where to look. My husband thought it was a waste of money when I first got one, now he wants one for himself, so I bought another one for him as a Christmas gift.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Rhonda M.
Reviews.Content: I have my own Kindle so I brought two Kindles doing Black Friday for my children. They love them. I enjoy that as the parent I get to control their time spent on the Kindles setting it up for more reading and less play time. Easy for them to understand and play the many games that are in the Play Store such as Candy Crush that I see everyone fighting over. Worth the price I spent easy to buy books just at our fingertips. Can search the web, watch movies and listen to music.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire still great
Reviews.Author: Meme6
Reviews.Content: my daughter's Kindle was taken in a home invasion  She is thrilled to have the replacement spends many hours reading

Reviews.Title: Love it, great investment!!
Reviews.Author: paytonrocks
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my daughter who was 9 last Christmas and she never seems to put it down! There are more than enough free  apps for her download to keep her busy when she wants to play games. She also loves that she has the option to download her books now. I love the Kindle Free time and parental controls so that you can control the internet sites they have access to and limit the time the spend on there. It was a great investment and you can't beat the price! The only down side would be that it does not have a camera.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire previous generation
Reviews.Author: rose rupard
Reviews.Content: Temptin to buy and nicely dome to urge the consumer.  I might just think about it. for a future buy

Reviews.Title: Amazon Kindle
Reviews.Author: Jared J "Estes"
Reviews.Content: A fun little electronic device that gives you all of the accessories featured in a laptop while giving you the mobility of an mp3 player. This little guy has traveled across continents with movies, music and continued Netflix access. A fun addition to your home electronics that you will pick up more often than your laptop. Offers many programs for download and convenience and any sort of game or email access that would be needed. A great buy.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Neff
Reviews.Content: Seems to be in very good shape and works well. A birthday gift for my mom and she is enjoying it!

Reviews.Title: I have had to buy my daughter an Ipad mini because the Kindle is too hard to navagate.
Reviews.Author: Maria Gregoriou
Reviews.Content: My daughter does use her Kinfle Fire often she would rather use my Ipad. She tried to read book on the kindle and it seems that it is the only thing that she has enjoyed.

Reviews.Title: happy purchase
Reviews.Author: Crocodile4u
Reviews.Content: got this for my kid at Christmas to use, and she does, but my wife uses it more to read books.

Reviews.Title: Works and looks brand new
Reviews.Author: suzy
Reviews.Content: I purchase this for my son for Xmas he hasn't used it yet of course but I downloaded apps for him and not only does it work like a brand knew Kindle it looks brand new I swear it was such a good investment !

Reviews.Title: had to send it back
Reviews.Author: Robin Seldin
Reviews.Content: had to send it back because it did not charge completely...seemed like a good device if it had worked properly

Reviews.Title: Rocky Start, but Happy Ending!
Reviews.Author: Lara A Henderson
Reviews.Content: Upon receipt we loved the Kindle Fire.  Shy of a year we could not get the Kindle to turn on properly.  We would charge the Kindle for almost a day and never make it passed the intro screen. We tried to restart it several times with no luck.  I called the Customer Service line and explained the problem and because I am still within warranty they are sending me a new one within 3 days.  I still like the product, but I would have to say the immediate resolution to our issue is what brought my rating back up to 4 stars.  Thank you to the customer service agent that helped us!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Librarianchik
Reviews.Content: love love love my kindle fire. had i known a lighter version was in the works i may have waited longer but i still don't regret purchasing this tablet. i do wish it was microsoft office compatible but i will live.

Reviews.Title: buy it,should've got itt when it was on sale
Reviews.Author: Robert Kepics
Reviews.Content: I LIKE WHAT I READ,FOR A OLD TIMER LIKE ME.NOW WHERE DO I GET THE MONEY TO BE IT.MAYBE SANTA!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love this device!
Reviews.Author: LoveReading "bookworm"
Reviews.Content: Absolutely LOVE this device.  I haven't had one problem with it!  It is a joy to carry around, not too big for my purse, excellent battery life, easy to read and play games on (I loaded apps for my grandchildren to play and learn-they love this "puter" , baby talk for computer).  I have a friend who has the Kindle Fire HD, and while hers is larger and HD, I don't see much of a difference, but I don't typically use my Kindle to watch movies, etc.I also have a Nook, but when I got the Kindle, the Nook hasn't been used at all.  I still have a few books on it, and will get to reading them, but I much prefer the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Love this gadget!
Reviews.Author: Pinkie
Reviews.Content: Love, love, love my Kindle Fire. Sometimes it corrects my spelling when I intend for the word to be spelled exactly as typed, but I'm dealing with that. It's not HD and not the latest, but what a joy to own. I view my email, EBAY and Amazon with record speed. I watch movies and read books, and am especially pleased now that I've also subscribed to Amazon Prime. Fun, fun, fun. I had to spend time recently waiting for six hours for someone while away from home, and used wifi and viewed a movie and read while I was waiting -- not like having human companionship, but kept me company nonetheless.

Reviews.Title: Very User Friendly
Reviews.Author: John Kelly Kannel "K"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle. I absolutely love how easy they are to transfer books & magazines. The screen is clear & easy to read. No complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE my kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Diana Netzer "Diana"
Reviews.Content: I have many friends with lpads and I know they have some features I don't on my kindle, but the Kindle Fire has all, and even more than i need. Of course, it has my books and with it I can have all of them in one handy place. It also has internet and it is faster than my laptop, so I use it all the time. I am 68 and not in the computer generation, but so far I have bought some apps  ( scrabble and card games, mostly )  and downloaded some music and articles. I've had no problem maneuvering around my kindle.I was also happy that it came with Netflix. Since I already had an account I used it right away.DinetzerFor those who want the convenience of a tablet without the price tag that goes with most of them, I highly recommend the refurbished Kindle Fire. The "web" selection opens with a page highlighting your frequently used pages, making your selections easy and fast. The "carousel"  is a fast way of flipping through your books and favorite sites (and you can control what is in the carousel ).I have found that if I have questions or problems, I google it and it usually takes me to amazon where I find the answer quickly. So far,so good.I LOVE my Kindle Fire!

Reviews.Title: Unlucky customer
Reviews.Author: bjc
Reviews.Content: I truly love the Kindle Fire, BUT I think I must be the most unlucky person in the world. This is my 3rd Kindle because the first and second one developed the same problem and would not charge.  Amazon support said it was a loose port and they replaced the non-functioning Kindle with a new one.  Now my Kindle #3 has started losing the picture/print on the screen. It just goes to a blank screen---but not the blue screen of death.  I have discovered that if I tap it on the side, the screen comes back up, but why is this happening? The Kindle is only maybe 2 months old. Some days it works perfectly and then the screen suddenly goes blank again. I guess that I will be contacting Amazon Support again. Like I said:  Unlucky.  I give it a 5 star rating because I truly love the Kindle when it works. I would have given up after Kindle #2 if Amazon Support had not been so sympathetic and completely replaced the unit.  I highly recommend contacting them if you have any problems with the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: HATE THESE!!!!
Reviews.Author: k.chfu
Reviews.Content: I got this a couple of years ago and it quit charging after about 1 year then about 5 months ago I got the kindle fire HD and it stopped charging today I'm sick of these awful products!

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Diane Randall
Reviews.Content: Bought the kindle for my son 9 year old son.  When the device worked it was great but it consistently stopped charging. I have been through 3 kindles in one year under my one year warranty. There was a constant issue of the Kindle loosing its ability to charge properly. Amazon was great in sending me 2 other new Kindles but after just a few months same thing would happen. Not able to charge. My warranty is up so I will not be getting another Kindle. Switching to an ipod touch or mini ipad for my son.

Reviews.Title: It's good!
Reviews.Author: Frances Davies
Reviews.Content: The touch screen on this Kindle works much better. We have finally downloaded a book and looking for more titles for boys aged 8.

Reviews.Title: Faulty Equipment.
Reviews.Author: Lizette Guillen
Reviews.Content: This was the second kindle fire I received after returning a previously sent one and it had software issues I would select a letter on the keyboard and it would produce the letter that was two keys over. The first kindle I received arrived untapped and had a note saying that it did not power up. So I got a return item that was faulty because just as had been stated in the note it did not power up nor hold a charge. So in the end I received two faulty kindles.

Reviews.Title: Battery problems.Returned 2
Reviews.Author: Bushia
Reviews.Content: Retuned 2 of them.Battery problems.Loved the LCD but had to continually charge it..Bought a refurbished one ,maybe that was the problem.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: R. Lambert
Reviews.Content: Does everything I want to do. Hoping to learn more so it's potential is used completely ! Oh by the way, EXCELLENT price.

Reviews.Title: Poor Warranty Coverage
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: My daughter has enjoyed the Kindle fire and honestly I would give it five stars for that...but today while sitting on the floor playing with it she dropped it...on the carpet...the screen ended up cracking.  I called Kindle support and they do not have replacement screens nor do they fix or know of any companies who fix the screens.  They offer a refurbished Kindle for a "discounted" price.  When asked if it is "normal" for the screen to crack when dropped on carpet they stated it could based on the angle.  I DO NOT recommend this for younger children for this fact.  It had a protective case around it and still cracked.  The unit still works but the screen is ruined.  Sadly disappointed for the first time in Amazon and their service.  Lesson learned and future tablet choices will sadly not include the Fire.

Reviews.Title: ordering a kindle fire  hd
Reviews.Author: Karen Baudoin
Reviews.Content: We got a nice kindle fire for our grandson for christmas, it was delivered before time & in great condition, thanks!

Reviews.Title: Can't charge it
Reviews.Author: Product-Reviewer
Reviews.Content: The product might be ok, but the charger no longer sits in the socket to charge the Kindle.  Of course this happened just  after the warranty ran out and we received this as a gift.  So it just sits in a shelf.  Would not recommend as I heard others had the same issue.  Going to get an IPad mini!!

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: nice game
Reviews.Content: My uncle gave this to me so he could get the new version. He got the bad end. This is great.dont go for the new one thismuch better!!!!!!!!!!!buy it now.

Reviews.Title: Touch on kindle fire easy but....
Reviews.Author: JJJ
Reviews.Content: I like the ease of some features but dislike tapping the top or bottom of the screen to access some features such as wireless. Those areas seem to be temperamental and don't always respond well. Still prefer my old kindle.

Reviews.Title: Third broken kindle.
Reviews.Author: jd
Reviews.Content: The warranty is great, fairly hassle-free...however, I have already returned two.  And the third is already broken.  Really is not even worth returning the stupid thing again.  Always the same problem.  The Kindle will not charge because the port is poorly attached and comes loose after a few months of regular use.Each time I replace it I get a couple months of use out of it, and other than this one MAJOR flaw the Kindle Fire is great.  But the constant breakage is a deal-breaker.

Reviews.Title: Bad battery ports..DONT BUY IT
Reviews.Author: Della
Reviews.Content: I bought my kindle fire when they 1st came out, About 6 months later it wouldnt charger, I called Amazon an they sent me a replacement, Now again 6 months after getting it Im having the same issues with it..Wont charger..And all they want to do is send me a another one..So I can have the SAME ISSUES OF IT NOT CHARGERING AFTER 6 MONTHS...Im VERY disappointed in the way AMAZON is handling this..VERY BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE!

Reviews.Title: Lousy Kindle Fire product
Reviews.Author: Paul East
Reviews.Content: It does not hold a charge worth a flip. It is difficult to navigate to get to your own account. You can't read the screen with sun glasses on. If I had not spent $ 160 for this I would throw it away. One lousy product. Paul East.  Email:peast@cfl.rr.com

Reviews.Title: 2nd Kindle and not a problem yet
Reviews.Author: Misty Mclaughlin "Misty"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my mother last year for Christmas.  She had the 1st generation and I thought it was time she got the upgrade and got herself on the internet as well.  She LOVED her first Kindle and she is not computer savy at all, so I was a little scared when I got this for her.  I have to say, this was made for her.  It is wonderful!

Reviews.Title: not real happy with it
Reviews.Author: kellie mraz
Reviews.Content: I don't like it ... dont like the layout  i like the first gen but this is faster. Want the first gen layout with second gen speed

Reviews.Title: Extremely happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: Denise Moore
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire 7" three months ago and have been very happy with the product. I had been thinking about buying an iPad for sometime, but it was hard to justify the price. When the Kindle Fire price was reduced I decided to purchase that instead and see how I liked reading books in an electronic format. I have been very happy with the purchase and thoroughly enjoy reading books in this format.Likes:1. This size is perfect for reading. I can hold it with one hand comfortably and it is light for taking with me wherever I go.2. I primarily use it for reading, but I frequently check my e-mail, browse the web, and use various apps. The overall speed is very good and it is easy to navigate.3. For me, the battery life has not been an issue. I charge it in the evening and don't take the charger with me during the day. I travel with it, etc. and the battery sustains itself through my daily use.4. Cost/Price - the price is outstanding and I could justify spending $150 compared to $400+ for an iPad.Dislikes:1. The apps are not very extensive. I can get a lot more variety on my iPhone, but I still can find the typical apps most people enjoy.2. The charger. This product includes a USB, but a wall charger is an additional product.3. The screensaver is an advertisement and there are other ads (usually specific to Kindle book deals, etc.) that you will run across. I would like to personalize it more, like you can with a smart phone, but the ads do not get in the way of using the product in anyway.

Reviews.Title: The Greatest
Reviews.Author: Lyn Orwig
Reviews.Content: My Kindle Fire, is great.  I liked my first Kindle that I still own, but the Kindle Fire is amazing.  I wish it was a not quite as heavy, but because of the quality and the many things that it has to offer, I can deal with the weight.  Thank you, I am enjoying every minute of it.

Reviews.Title: Good price, good product
Reviews.Author: Jeannine G.
Reviews.Content: I use this mostly for reading PDFs/e-books for classes and watching netflix. I bought it used for ~100 and its well worth the price. It takes about 30 seconds to start up but the battery life is pretty long for what I use it for. A little heavy, but def. worth not having to carry all my books and print readings out for classes.

Reviews.Title: HSV, AL
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire, I wish I could take pictures with it. I love that I can download the bible and flash light apps as well.

Reviews.Title: i wish i hadn't bought this thing...
Reviews.Author: catherine andersen
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 kindles fires that were refurbished. Oh boy am i sorry i bought them. Beware buyers, the kindles that are refurbished are a waste of time and money.

Reviews.Title: WiFi Drops Out Constantly
Reviews.Author: W Potter
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle Fire and both have had the same problem. After about 6 months it starts constantly dropping WiFi. You have to reboot every 10 minutes. I suggest you Google "Kindle Fire dropping WiFi" and look at all the other owners having the same problem. Amazon this is a big issue.  Are you going to make it right?

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire -2nd generation
Reviews.Author: Claudia L. BRYANT
Reviews.Content: So far so good. I charge it overnight. Unplug in the morning. If I turn it off after using it, it holds the charge almost a full day without the cord plugged in. I am vary happy with this one, compared to Kindle Fire 1st generation!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: sabrina
Reviews.Content: Got my mom this two years ago on Christmas and she loves it! She is a bookworm so having the option to quickly and easily download a book is just awesome to her. She also is computer illiterate so the simple & convenient web access helps her with searches. LOVE that I finally found something in technology that she can easily get the hang of, that she can actually use!

Reviews.Title: Quick and Easy
Reviews.Author: Judith
Reviews.Content: I had the previous Fire and I was very frustrated at the lack of page numbers.  The upgraded one has those.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle BUT
Reviews.Author: Miriam Vasquez
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle, but sadly as the yr. approaches the kindle starts going bad, it will not charge, it's not the charger either.. Hoping the new kindles don't have this problem, I was thinking of upgrading but afraid it will do the same.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Kay F. Cook "Gammy"
Reviews.Content: Really love it.  Still finding out how to use it.  It just does so much.  When I couldn't't figure something out , I called Amazon's technical dept and they helped me immediately.  Great service.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Michele Robinson Foster
Reviews.Content: These things are amazing, they do so many different things and the cost compared to an IPAD is wonderful.  The kids love them and I love that Amazon's service is great as well.

Reviews.Title: Great bproduct.
Reviews.Author: BRNY
Reviews.Content: I purchased the kindle for my 8 yr old son for a birthday gift. He loves it! Easy to use. Great purchase.

Reviews.Title: this is the tablet to get for Families.. does more than the average tab
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Flo"
Reviews.Content: I have had experience w a number of big named tablets and  I have purchased  3 kindles fires the original, the new 7 inch and the kindle HD.. 8+ inch. and I can tell you the learning curve on this tablet is minimal..one of the kindles went to a tech DUMMIE and I can tell you he loves it and uses it regularly I just intro 'd this to another family member who  had grandchildren.. after see how you could Limit what the kids can use on the tablet and the amt of time they are allowed to use it they were Sold. This is a perfect tablet for families..  w the control over what the kids can use and  if you opt for the Amazon Prime program . UNLIMITED  MOVIES , Lending of books and  free shipping on most items.. that combo is the best in the Internet world.............The apps that the Amazon store doesn't have. can easily be obtained and downloaded via one of the alternative app stores Free of course. I was even able to get the many Nook books on it that I had purchased prior to the kindle.......Now it isn't as speedy as a few of my other tablets but no slow enough to bother the average userJust dive in and enjoy .. this is the tablet that all members of the family will enjoy using.

Reviews.Title: OMG LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Wallace
Reviews.Content: First tablet I've ever owned. I was in a huge debate if I should just stick to the e-reader or get this, but I am glad I ended up getting this. I mostly have been using it to listen to TV shows while at work so that they don't take up screen space. I have some pretty neat apps for it, and play Plants vs Zombies most of the time. It is actually pretty good for reading, but I turn down the screen brightness when I am reading a book.

Reviews.Title: Like mine better
Reviews.Author: Eula Bishop
Reviews.Content: I actually purchased it for my mother in-law.  I have a Kindle Fire that I have had a year or so and she had borrowed it a couple of times and really enjoyed it.  We got her the updated version for her birthday and I have to say I like mine better.  It is easier to navigate and more user friendly.

Reviews.Title: I just loved it
Reviews.Author: Fran Claflin
Reviews.Content: It cover my Kindle Fire screen very well, keeping it clean. I would tell people who buy a Kindle to buy this product to go along with it.

Reviews.Title: My 1st Kindle
Reviews.Author: Mina Constantine
Reviews.Content: It really cool, clarity is great & its super responsive.Its a little on the heavy side, but works all the same.

Reviews.Title: Great value for a great e-reader
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Lengle
Reviews.Content: I got this for my son because he is always taking my Kindle.  It is going to be a Christmas present but I find myself playing games on it.

Reviews.Title: Fun
Reviews.Author: Anglefish1
Reviews.Content: This is a fun device, but sort of hard sometimes to operate.  I find that it changes pages too easily when I'm reading and I getway ahead of myself very quickly.  It will be fun, I think, when I'm more familiar with it, and will use it more for movies or otherthings like that, but less for books.  My other reader is much more reliable and lighter weight, and I have to charge it muchless so it fits my needs for a reader much better.I would recommend this only to adults who want to watch movies or have access to email but don't want to put out thebig money for an ipad.

Reviews.Title: Great little machine!
Reviews.Author: Rick Piper
Reviews.Content: Awesome capabilities - didn't think I'd like reading books from a "machine" - but I was wrong!  May get another for family gift!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Mark Edwards
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a gift for my husband.  (I have the gen 2 Kindle, that I love).  It has so much more to offer than mine; however, it is a little more cumbersome getting back to your book in progress.  Can't really read it outside in the sunlight either.  The many wireless functions virtually make it a replacement for an IPad.

Reviews.Title: A Great Device To Have
Reviews.Author: Robert O. Chilcoat
Reviews.Content: Ever since hearing about the Kindle. I have always wanted one. Now I have one. Have not been disappointed yet. The first book I bought for my Kindle Fire would have cost me over $500, because not many were published. For less than $10, I have a very good electronic version. Now I am looking to change on what books I buy in the future.

Reviews.Title: Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: I love it, it is just what I thought it would be and meets all the guidelines listed in the reviews.  It is the size I need and I like that it is in color and I can connect to internet, get emails, shop everything I would do on my desktop.  I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a smaller size ipad.

Reviews.Title: Happy customer
Reviews.Author: J. Butterworth "Jenni B"
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift to my mother. She is VERY happy with it. Loves the Kindle for reading and all it's features (wifi, weather, games, apps). Easy to transport. Easy information storage on Amazon.Bad news is that I had to buy this to replace another Kindle that was barely over a year old. It froze on start up and we were told there was no way to repair it and it was just out of warranty. My mother loved her Kindle so much that it was worth it to get another one and all her information and downloads were saved on Amazon and transferred seamlessly to the new device. Hoping the first device was just a quirk and this one lasts for a while!

Reviews.Title: Don't get for audiobooks or battery life
Reviews.Author: K.
Reviews.Content: I am returning this Fire because it won't play an audiobook without being linked to a wifi network, even though I "downloaded" the book to the device.  You'd think with an 80 GB memory it would be able to store the whole book, particularly since my ancient iPod can.  Since listening to audiobooks while on the road was half the reason I purchased it, it makes no sense to keep it.  It also runs through a battery charge like crazy, primarily because of all the apps it runs automatically; apps that cannot be deleted.  I downloaded a "kill apps" app, but I have to use it every time I turned the Fire on.  Given it's limited functionality and the recharging hassle, it's bye-bye Fire!

Reviews.Title: Nice at first......
Reviews.Author: mark murphy
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is a nice alternative to the iPad but it doesn't stand the test of time. Like when it fails twice in 18 months. The first was replaced in warranty, with a refurbished unit, that also failed. I got the "?" where the battery icon is supposed to be located and the battery won't hold a charge. Amazon would not replace the second unit so I'm left with a brick. I guess I should have ponied up for the Ipad because it would probaby still be functional

Reviews.Title: fine to read on, why bother surfing the net!  Get an iPAD!!
Reviews.Author: Disappointed
Reviews.Content: The reader is fine because it is backlog and that is an advantage over initial versions, but the fire is heavy and the browser will make you want for a Commodore computer.  Get an iPAD for heavy lifting!

Reviews.Title: No wall charger and battery dies to quick
Reviews.Author: j badamo
Reviews.Content: I find it very cheap on Amazon's part that they can't give you a wall charger, you buy apps and books so it isn't like they are losing money.  Also the battery life isn't very long, even when you turn off all wifi and make it stay on airplane mode. It is no where near the limit they say it is that is why they say up to, but it has never come close. With wifi on it is like 2hrs. not cool. I HATE the fact that your forced to keep the screen pics on there you should be able to delete and only keep personal photos on. Amazon is wasting your space with pictures you don't want.  Also never got my free 500 coins, when you click on it you have to pay them, so that is also not true.

Reviews.Title: It takes forever for it to boot up.
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth's Mom "Verna"
Reviews.Content: Not sure if that's a function of the Fire or the fact that it is a refurb.  It takes about 2 minutes for it to get to the pin screen once I press the power button.  I do shut-down when I'm done, so not sure if that affects it as well.  Otherwise it's fine and colorful.  I've had the old school kindle since it came out and it finally went out after 2 refurbs (i got about a year or so on each free refurb until they couldn't provide anymore) and the next gen Kindle didn't last 9 mos.  I finally got the refurb as I didn't want to spend a few hundred dollars on a fire HD (did for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it) as I only really read on it.  This was a slow first step, and I have played a game or 2 (the same word games almost I did on the old school) and have enjoyed moving my paper subscription over to electronic on my fav mag.  It doesn't have nearly the battery life of the old school, and to me seems more fragile with the screen.  It's interesting the fire, and so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Awful.
Reviews.Author: J. Littleton
Reviews.Content: Awful. Owned it for about 14 hours then returned it. NO STORAGE SPACE! Takes forever to download anything! All around extremely frustrating!

Reviews.Title: We love our new Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Ademis
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I both love our new Kindle Fire 7".  I purchased two Kindle Fire's one for myself and one for my daughter.  We previously had a Kindle and wanted to upgrade... we were not disappointed... they are everything we expected them to be.

Reviews.Title: Good for a year.
Reviews.Author: DannyGriff
Reviews.Content: I bought four Kindle Fires for my family as a gift to us all because I loved my Kindle Reader. After a years use, all of them quit charging within a month of each other and after countless attempts to get ahold of a person to figure out if I could get a refund or replacement, I have been in an endless chain of auto reply emails and no real response. The customer service is just as bad as paying for four of these and having them all fail.Hope this doesn't happen to anyone and if you do buy multiple tablets, buy one of these and one of something else to try them out.

Reviews.Title: Impressed with  My Refurbished Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: charles Lunsford
Reviews.Content: Impressed with my Refurbished Kindle Fire. Haven't had any issues due to the fact it a refurbished Kindle.It's nice to be able to access certain information via my Kindle without having to go to my computer and sign to get the same in formation. The Fire is much better than the Kindle Keyboard I owned previously.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Customer Service saves the day
Reviews.Author: CheapskateShopper
Reviews.Content: My father purchased a Kindle Fire for my mother in November 2011. Over the past year it has developed charging problems that 5 replacement chargers did not solve. It appeared to be a loose charging port issue.Even though the Fire was out of warranty, I had read many stories online stating that Amazon was aware of the manufacturing defect, and would authorize a 1-time replacement at no cost as a gesture of goodwill.I had to escalate through three supervisors, but I am happy to say that my mother's free replacement kindle is on it's way.Thank you Amazon, for being reasonable when handling this defect.

Reviews.Title: a partial improvement
Reviews.Author: friendly critic
Reviews.Content: I really dislike the constant ads every time it is turned on and the lack of a list of books purchased in a cue like my old kindle. The screen lighting is a plus and otherwise it is ok.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't Live Without My Kindle
Reviews.Author: David H
Reviews.Content: Several years ago, I was one of those people who thought that an electronic device could never provide the same feeling as paper book.  I've always loved reading, and curling up with a book is my favorite pass time.Now that I've had my Kindle Fire for about a year, I couldn't live without it.  I've actually wheedled down my paper library (donating the majority to charity, keeping only my favorites).  I now have an entire sewing/craft room that is no longer 75% library.  It's nice to have every book at your fingertips.I did get one of the Kindle Fires with the faulty mini-USB charging port, but Amazon replaced it immediately and the customer service agent was very polite and helpful.  I was also able to return the first one in the box the replacement device came in for free.

Reviews.Title: Durable
Reviews.Author: Kayla
Reviews.Content: This evening I had taken my kindle outside to listen to music. I had gone inside and left it outside in the yard. I was eating dinner and it had been pouring rain for about an hour. I realized I had left it outside. I sprinted out and got it. I ran inside and dried it off. I turned it on and was surprised it still worked. The speaker and everything still worked. I am still putting it in rice over night. I am very impressed that it could stand the rain. Definitely worth the price. (Plus I have dropped it many times, it is still with no cracks)

Reviews.Title: used to be a great item
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: I got my first Kindle Fire about 5 years ago as a gift and once I added Amazon Prime, I fell in love with it. between the free shipping bonus, ability to surf the web, check Facebook, watch Netflix, and store mp3s and videos on device or cloud, as well as read books, magazines, and play various games...
