I may not know how but now it is so hard to find it.  If I am close, I only have to flip a few pages.  But if it is a long way off the only way is to flip pages,maybe 20 or 30 or more.I'm deciding whether I like to touch the page % sign or turn paper pages.  I guess I'll get used to the touch method.  I found out I don't have to swipe, just touch lightly.

Reviews.Title: Great present
Reviews.Author: Graicy
Reviews.Content: For quite some time I had wanted the kindle fire, I was very excited when the offer came and I was able to afforth it. It is the greatest I am enjoying it very much.

Reviews.Title: having difficulty using the Kindle..difficult to understand,thought a manual would accompany my purchase
Reviews.Author: rhonda goldman
Reviews.Content: I haven't been using it due to difficulty figuring things out,was hopeing to have some support or a manual with all the options of how to use

Reviews.Title: Very upset about one thing
Reviews.Author: denise
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these last year for Xmas presents, bought 2 more this year and they NO LONGER have a wall adapter included, just USB.

Reviews.Title: my kindle fire and learning how to use it....
Reviews.Author: Sharon Dorland
Reviews.Content: Although I have not had the time to use it much, i was a bit frustrated without a "handbook" however I read the instructions and started to write them, then I called amazon, and Kyla one of your young ladies really helped me a great deal. I have not had a kindle before so it is new to me. I do thank her for her help...Sharon

Reviews.Title: kindle fire lcd
Reviews.Author: pattipat
Reviews.Content: i found it very hard to program, could not find were to program my apps like face book and so on.

Reviews.Title: iT'S OKAY
Reviews.Author: Mary Greer
Reviews.Content: I am somewhat enjoying it.  The charge does not last as long as I expected.  It is difficult to use, it moves too fast as I try to move the pages or it just uses my attempt at moving the page as a click to go to the book or whatever.

Reviews.Title: Charging problem
Reviews.Author: elsa jenks
Reviews.Content: there is a known issue with the USB port on the kindle and we are having a hard time getting in touch with amazon to get a replacement. this kind of dampens the excitement of a new toy.

Reviews.Title: Where is the wall piece to recharge not just the cord.
Reviews.Author: Rick Martz
Reviews.Content: Where is the wall piece to plug it in ? Take to long on the computer to charge. No big deal same price when you buy wall plug.

Reviews.Title: Warning: installed software not compatible with Adobe Flash Player
Reviews.Author: Izabella Goubnitskaia
Reviews.Content: I returned the item no matter how cute and nifty it was. The only FREE videos you can watch are on youtube. All the other videos, on any news websites or other websites, require Adobe Flash Player.However the installed software has been designed NOT to be compatible with it - so that you pay and pay and pay more and buy and buy subscriptions.There was NOTHING in the device description about it. Not really honest, I would say..

Reviews.Title: What a let down
Reviews.Author: Kerry B
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas and it has been nothing but problems. Not very easy to use as a first time user. Wanted a credit card to get free apps. Bought a Amazon card and it took forever to figure out where to redeem it. As if I'm gonna leave my credit card info on a device my kids use!! Terrible!! Also none of the big stores get along with amazon anymore so it took along time to find an amazon card or case.. Get an iPad save yourself the trouble.

Reviews.Title: IT sucks!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Grimm
Reviews.Content: i can't get it to work at home  or elsewhere ,and cant even get signed on to register it  i have always wanted one and wish i never bought it  now.You asked .

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire not a good buy at any price
Reviews.Author: Collin
Reviews.Content: Bought it on sale, didn't come with a charger, but did come with a bunch of advertising that made it a pain to work with.  For a mere $15.00 extra I got the advertising taken off, and then went and bought a charger at Staples as I was giving it for a gift and didn't have time to shop for a charger...for a mere $21.00 I was able to buy a charge...without a the wire connection.  What a deal....only $182.00.  Went to Frys and bought an Android tablet that was larger, works much better without all the garbage...everything was included for $139.00.  My very last Kindle purchase for sure.

Reviews.Title: Battery
Reviews.Author: Susan Willis "susie"
Reviews.Content: Battery won't stay charged sent it back for refund. Tried to charge took forever to charge then didn't last but 2 hrs

Reviews.Title: Advertisements
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I had a kindle fire that I liked a lot. I lost it and replaced it. Now there are advertisements on the home page and it's annoying. Apparently you can pay $15 to have them removed. I would recommend buying something without advertisements and if something happens to this one, I will NOT replace it with another kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Gregory B. Stolcis
Reviews.Content: It is great! A totally new and interesting to read collect books. I am now learning about its other applications.

Reviews.Title: This was a Christmas present to someone else and they loved it.
Reviews.Author: LongIsland
Reviews.Content: The person that received this gift from me was very happy with it. This met their expectation. i would buy this again either for myself or someone else.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: I really wanted the HD version but decided that since I use my Kindle as an e-reader mostly the "basic" model would be best.  I am really surprised at how much can be done on the Kindle now and to tell the truth I don't think the HD model would improve my experience.  I own a Keyboard 3G Kindle and this is a huge improvement over that, but I do miss the free 3G.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: Duran
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this if you want to do anything more than read a book it's slow it freezes and it won't play games very well I wish I would've bought something else

Reviews.Title: BIG WASTE OF TIME !!!!!
Reviews.Author: sandysherman
Reviews.Content: NO instructions .  Had to by the charger . have to "BUY" anything to go in it ( games /books/ and most anything else !!!)  Just try calling for info !!! . Just try talking to ANY body with a brain that knowns ENGLISH AND DO NOT wait for 10-20 mins . OK you got me this time but NEVER NEVER  again .. I WILL BUY NONE OF ANYTHING FROM amazon. .DON'T even try to contact me ,i'am busy emailing everybody i can to save them TIME and MONEY

Reviews.Title: Awsome!!
Reviews.Author: C. A. Grant
Reviews.Content: I have arthritis in my hands, and can no longer hold heavy books to read.  The kindle eliminates that problem!  With all of the font choices, I find my eyes do not get tired when reading.  A wonderful product.

Reviews.Title: It was the first thing I bought for my daughter because I knew she wanted it.
Reviews.Author: caryn crouch
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my daughter and she loved it. She had the Kindle that I bought her last year and she loved that too. So the upgrade made her very happy.

Reviews.Title: Amazing product.
Reviews.Author: G. Nikolau
Reviews.Content: Gorgeous colors, amazing technology, all combined into a small, compact, affordable device. I really love my Kindle. If you don't need a built in camera and your main goal is reading, get the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: catherine ramnath
Reviews.Content: Great product.  My son can't put it down!  The down side is that Amazon does not inform international purchasers of the restrictions to purchase and download apps and videos.  I think that this sort of information should be made known upfront.

Reviews.Title: Why spend $500 on an iPad?
Reviews.Author: Lindsey Beasley
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire as a Christmas gift, and I love it! It has replaced my laptop, and has all the features I need. I initially did have some problems setting it up, the Silk browser stopped working within a couple hours, but I easily reached a tech support representative, and a factory reset fixed the problem. turns out I accidentally set it up wrong.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Amanda Patterson
Reviews.Content: Just got this for Christmas for my wife and she loves it.  She had a LePan tablet with google Android and it worked ok, but was buggy.  I have an ipad 2 and this works just as well.  Very impressed with the ease of use and the programs.  Would recommend for the price.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: H. Saltzer "autism momma"
Reviews.Content: I got this for Christmas and I love it. I use the Kindle apps on my iphone & ipad and it came already loaded with all my stuff. I have a $5 credit for amazon from watching an offer. Now to see what else it does...

Reviews.Title: VERY EFFECTIVE PRODUCT!
Reviews.Author: WE HAVE LITERALLY GOT TO WORK WITH EACH OTHER.
Reviews.Content: I RECOMMEND IT HIGHLY. FAST ACCESS TO INTERNET AND HAS VERY MUCH TO OFFER IN APS AND I THINK ITS WONDERFUL. PAM LEACH

Reviews.Title: great purchase
Reviews.Author: Robert Wright
Reviews.Content: it was for my 5 year old son and he absolutely loves it, it works great and love the apps

Reviews.Title: Quite a Learning Curve, but a Fun Device
Reviews.Author: Scotman's Film & Book Reviews "Film & Boo...
Reviews.Content: Quick comments on the Kindle Fire.  I still have to get used to the WiFi hot spot uses and I know this is lame to those professional users of tablets, but it is annoying trying to turn off the relentless reminders of getting onto hotspots.The screen is top notch.  Clear, large fonts if you want.  The device does need a cover though in order to better handle it.  I suggest dropping by a Staples or other electronics store for this purpose.Kindle books download quickly and well.  Movies do play OK, but you really need the ear-buds.  The speakers are tiny and are best listened to in a quiet room for best clarity.Overall, a satisfactory purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great for kids too!
Reviews.Author: elisesmommy
Reviews.Content: My 9 year old daughter bought this for herself and loves it. She is never anywhere without it. It keeps her occupied on long drives to school and at her siblings sports practices. Her younger brother borrows it regularly and now he wants one too.

Reviews.Title: Love At First Sight
Reviews.Author: eecoconut
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire. I just got it and I'm still trying to figure it out but overall its easy to use. I take it everywhere. I can watch my favorite movies on netflix and read all my favorite books from Amazon. Also its great for games. You will love this product!!!

Reviews.Title: one word awesome!
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: hard to express perfection, but this little thing is awesome. does everthing but mow my grass, & after all i need to get some exercise.have not bought a movie yet but watched a trailer small but never noticed because the quaility of the picture was better than my 42 inch LCD flatscreen keep up with the great work

Reviews.Title: Not working to expectations
Reviews.Author: Mike Swiniarsi
Reviews.Content: Gave the kindle to my wife for xmas.  Amazon offers free books for download.  My wife bought one to test the system.  It tells us that the book is purchased, but we can't get the book to download.  The kindle says that it's not connected to my wifi, but that's the first thing my wife did - of course.We are also having trouble getting it to recharge the battery.Merry Christmas

Reviews.Title: Just a quick note
Reviews.Author: Matthew Stout "ZenoStout"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle fire has enough reviews floating around already I'm going to be brief.  If you want a sold High End book reader that also does a bit more this is it.  Physically built like a tank, comfortable to hold and attractively engineered.The one thing I did want to point out that I haven't seen covered in other reviews is that you can't organize your books.  They are in a long alphabetical list with your recent read in front.  You can search, but if you have a large collection you can't create folders (or shelves) or whatever.  You are confined to searching or scrolling thru hundreds of book.There IS an app made JUST for the fire you can buy for a few dollars that will do this...... but it's not a built in feature.  At least not yet.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: R. Horton "NW Penna."
Reviews.Content: My first tablet. Had it a week and like it so far.  I've used it for e-mail, Facebook, browsing.  So far all seems good.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Paula Chapman
Reviews.Content: I started out on this one and I loved it. I ordered my kids one for Christmas and they were so tickled. I did give my mother mine as I ordered the Kindle Fir 8.94G LTE.This is perfect for books, surfing the web.. and so much more.The big perk..amazon gives 1 free full version app away every day.

Reviews.Title: Hard for older person to maneuver
Reviews.Author: kourtney hawkins
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 67 year old Uncle. He had a hard time setting it up, and working with the kindle. It took a lot of one on one tutorials. I will have to update the post after he learns how to use the product independently.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: jonathan l marsh
Reviews.Content: ty very much merry christmas amazon ty ty ty ty ty  ty tyty ty ty ty ty ty ty .

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: pepsi32861
Reviews.Content: I do like it but I thought it would at least come with something on it but basically it had nothing and no directions and you had to get apps to make it interesting. I have now seen 2 other brand tablets since my purchase and they came with much more for only a bit more money.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire - E-Reader on Steroids
Reviews.Author: Jan M. VanSyckel
Reviews.Content: This is a great little device!!The Pro's: As far as I'm concerned it performs exactly as it should for what it was designed to be, an E-Reader with Extra's!! It is fast, very responsive and even though it's not the HD model I think the screen is beautiful!! I just got it the other day so I haven't checked out the video or music yet but so far it does exactly what I bought it for. A portable reader that will allow me to get e-mail, do a little web browsing and check updates on Facebook. I'm not a big game player so the "Words with Friends", Scrabble and Poker App that connects with Facebook is good enough for me. I also LOVE how easily it all connected and configured and how it integrates with Amazon.The Con's: Did NOT come with a charger included, major fail.  Has a micro USB cable but not the wall connector end for it. Luckily I own a BB and the wall adapter was compatible. Have to do more testing but my 1st impression is that the battery life is not that great, and it is very SLOW in recharging, at least with it powered up. I just powered it down and will see if that helps.Bottom Line - Don't buy this if you are looking for a full featured tablet because it doesn't run Flash and it is not a true Android OS so you don't get all the Android Apps and Games. But if you are looking for a GREAT E-Reader with a little more functionality and a snappy interface than I recommend this 100%

Reviews.Title: first kindle fire
Reviews.Author: computer geek "code"
Reviews.Content: this is my first kindle fire and if it dies I will buy another because it is very fast and the touch screen is very clear and responsive. it's battery life is good it varies from 4-5 1/2 hrs. the keyboard is very nice to.my only beef with it is the limited apps. I mostly use it for Netflix,web browsing,and playing games. I would definitely suggest this to anyone

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: K Halliwell
Reviews.Content: I enjoy the access to books and am learning how to utilize other components.  I do not care for the advertisements or the fact that I have to learn as I go.  Would love to have had instructions when it arrived.

Reviews.Title: Solid reader
Reviews.Author: Gregory R. Noack
Reviews.Content: This is a solid ereader and video streaming device. Screen is sharp and touch is responsive. Speed is fine.  I'm not to fond of the web browser.  Also disappointed in the apps available for the Kindle (I thought I would be able to put any Android App on it, but you are limited to the Amazon Marketplace).  I didn't like the interface at first, but I got used to it.  If you haven't ever used an iPad or full Android device, this would be great.  If you have, you might be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Cheated me out of gift wrapping
Reviews.Author: Josh Betts
Reviews.Content: Glad my gift came.. but I'm really not happy for paying almost 20 dollars  for gift wrapping to only get a color box with a  single strand of ribbon. this package was 4 gifts, only 1 was gift wrapped.  I feel really cheated.  I will be demanding my money back. AMAZON you cheated me out of 20 bucks.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: patricia a lafferty
Reviews.Content: HAVE ONE MYSELF  GREAT GIFT FOR MY GRANDDAUGHTER  VERY PLEASED AS ALWAYS WITH AMAZON AND QUALITY OF PRODUCTS SOLD  tHANKS

Reviews.Title: Perfection
Reviews.Author: greenamberrain
Reviews.Content: This little baby rocks, my sister has down syndrome and she gets loud and fidgety when she is in the car or has to wait at doctor offices and this keeps her busy so that she does not notice time elapsing. the applications are useful and 90% are free or cheap so its budget able as well.

Reviews.Title: love it but a bit confusing to use.
Reviews.Author: Jessica's Book Review
Reviews.Content: i think if you are trying to save money or buying for a child this is the best beat for your money compared to an ipad. i have both and yes i rather have my ipad i think this would be a wonderful back up choice especially with children who lose or break things easily. i think the use is a bit hard for people, it is not very simple. i wish the on and off button was bigger.

Reviews.Title: like the kindle first book purchase was a BIG disappointment
Reviews.Author: eaglebeardog
Reviews.Content: went to my local staples  with one of their knowledgeble techies  looked at the kindle..nook..and google...bought the kindle fire...the reason for the purchase was to have all my cookbooks in one place and in an easier to read format when cooking..ordered my first cookbook..a field of greens..by ivy newton-gamble  a wonderful cookbook  imagine my surprise when i opened it on my kindle and found the kindle version is missing half of my printed version  i will check other books much more carefully  hope that is not the trend because if so i just threw money out the window

Reviews.Title: Just Great.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic little device. It functions better than an iPad 2, and is immensely powerful for its little size. The screen is beautiful, and options such as sideloading and sending to Kindle make my Kindle truly personalized. Best of all is the Amazon app selection--although it does not come close to Apple's appstore in quantity, it surely beats it in the level of quality. Unlike its counterpart, the amazon appstore does not have a million or so flashlight apps, and has an application for everything without the extra trash added in Apple's alternative. The amazon customer service is surprisingly good. The first kindle I received was defective, yet after a short inquiry with Support I was quickly sent another, free of charge. Just the way amazon made it be so easy deserves an applause. Thank you, Amazon, for such an amazing device.

Reviews.Title: 4th for the household!
Reviews.Author: T. Weik
Reviews.Content: My wife and each kid hav their own Fire now, so there's no more arguing over whose turn it is.  :)  The newer model is much faster and sharper.  I like the subtle changes in the UI.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KNDLE FIRE
Reviews.Author: solange ruiz
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THAT I COULD READ BOOKS SHOP AND LISTEN TO MUSIC ON IT I TAKE WITH TO WORK AND WENT I TRAVEL

Reviews.Title: Amateur on these type of things.
Reviews.Author: Richard Smith "Normal Consumer"
Reviews.Content: This is my first dip into electronic gadgets except for cell phone and computer.  I l love it and have downloaded 4 books and find myself using it every day.  Would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: D. Huberty
Reviews.Content: Don't let the "special offers" sway you, they don't interfere with my usage of the KF, they aren't annoying pop-ups, and they aren't bothersome at all.  The price was right, and I'm happy overall with it.  The only thing that is different from my old-school Kindle, is I could get the internet to work whether or not I was in a wireless area, even as a passenger while traveling on a road trip, this Kindle relies exclusively on wi-fi coverage which is a pain sometimes.  I basically can't use it when traveling.  So I will bring both Kindles with when I do!

Reviews.Title: One aggravating glitch.
Reviews.Author: Hardheaded Hoosier "HH"
Reviews.Content: Except for one problem, this has proved well worth it's price so far.  It gets me up and going much faster than any PC, is easy to read and fun to use.  My one complaint, the browser seems to have a slight tendency to garble text when the screen font is increased by the 'reverse pinch' motion.  It seems to randomly insert previously displayed text, but offset by a half screen width, in place of the text that should be displayed.  Shrinking then expanding the screen seems to be the fastest workaround, and it's so far a minor problem.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Stronecross sams
Reviews.Content: Just want I wanted to get so I could give my mom something she always wanted for the perfect Christmas gift

Reviews.Title: great gift!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! except?
Reviews.Author: Antoinette Mattison
Reviews.Content: The only thing I dont like is you have to sign in with a gift card or a credit card , thats not good if you are down loading free thing and then giving it as a gift. Other then that I love the kindle.

Reviews.Title: Loving it at 72 years of age!
Reviews.Author: Sandra Ross
Reviews.Content: I am thoroughly enjoying it.  I would reccomend this to everyone both young and old.  Needs to come with more intructions.

Reviews.Title: Best Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: Undisclosed
Reviews.Content: Perfect for basic tabular use. It was a great gift. Easy to use and designed around the ability to maintain an Amazon account. Perfect little device.

Reviews.Title: cool for the kids
Reviews.Author: Molly Cobb
Reviews.Content: I haven't taken the time to use it but my young girls have watched movies,played games and they find it easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Really Prompt Shipping And Great Quality Product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product Friday 12/14. Got a confirmation that it would be here by Wed 12/19. Today is 12/18 and it just arrived. Priced very well. Very clear screen. Got it as a gift for my girlfriend. Me thinks she will love it. Seems very easy to navigate.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Alisha Parker
Reviews.Content: I haven't given it to my daughter yet for CHristmas but I have been playing with it.  Apparently I need to buy one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected.
Reviews.Author: Linda Hall
Reviews.Content: This product was everything I expected to received in a Kindle.  So similar to IPad but at a very reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Donna Capella
Reviews.Content: I didn't realize I was going to love it so much!!! The price was right and the device is wonderful to have with me all the time without lugging a book or laptop with me everywhere I go.

Reviews.Title: I am so glad I ordered it -- too bad the quick charger is not included!
Reviews.Author: microcrafter
Reviews.Content: Being a book lover, I had resisted going paperless, but I love my kindle fire!  It is a pleasure to read and has become a great tool for the translations I do at church -- so much easier to navigate the books of the Bible in my kindle, so I can concentrate on paying attention to what the speaker is saying, rather than turning pages over and over.  The fact that I can connect to the Internet is icing on the cake.  I just wish that I had I  realized that if I ordered the charger together with the Kindle I would have saved $10!  I was in a rush to make the deadline for the sale (had only 4 minutes to spare) and totally missed that bit of information.  I ordered the charger now, but it hurts to have to pay the extra $10.  Oh well, I will know better next time.

Reviews.Title: More Battery Life? Not so much.
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: I got this new Kindle for myself and am planning on giving my old one to my daughter. I will agree that it is more responsive than my old one. However, the battery only lasts about half as long. I don't generally travel with mine, so a charger is always available, but I can't believe how fast the battery runs down. Otherwise, it's a good product like the first generation. I am undecided about the new user interface. It's smoother and more responsive, but I think I like the old one's configuration better.

Reviews.Title: Looks great
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my fiance for Christmas.  Opened it up to check it out and it looks great.  I really think she will love it and if not, I will take it!!!

Reviews.Title: Mrs. Jackson
Reviews.Author: Alicia Jackson
Reviews.Content: it is very nice to have, you can check your e-mail, play games, down load music movie and everything easy.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: PattiAnn48 "pattiannr"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire complements my dumb-phone and desktop PC. Constantly upgrading the various tech-gadgets is not a priority for me so the Fire is a great compromise. Best features: Wi-FI, being able to carry documents with me and impulse buying at Amazon (watch out for that one). There are still many reasons to keep paper books, but the Fire does so many other things that it's worth it to me. Still comparing notes with other users to master the fine points, but it's fun!

Reviews.Title: Fulfills my needs
Reviews.Author: Robert Broughton
Reviews.Content: Basically this is a great little high quality tablet for the price (got it on sale for $127). It fulfills the needs I bought it for (lazy web-surfing, Netflix, Pandora, mini-gaming, some light work-related applications). I get a little annoyed at how often Amazon tries to sell me something, but after a few weeks now I don't even notice the promoted apps and such below my carousel. Not having the Google Play store is remedied by a lot of side loading, which is not difficult to do. The screen is just the right size, big enough to see everything, but not so big I can't comfortably hold it for a long period. The Freetime feature sold me on getting one for my son for Christmas. The big thing I'd like to have, that I thought was available when I bought it but isn't, is an option for an external keyboard. The reason I'm not rating it more than three is that even though it is good for the price there are more robust tablets out there for a little bit more money. Nexus 7, Gal Tab 2 7 both allow for the external keyboard, have cameras, bluetooth capability, and allow for more freedom of customization. I don't mind not having those items to save the money while it was on sale; but at it's normal price the others give more bang for the buck. Just my 2 cents.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet if you want it for entertainment, not office
Reviews.Author: Annie Neidert "Annie Lou Who"
Reviews.Content: I got one of these when they first came out.  I love mine.  I read books on it, I watch TV and movies on it, and I play games on it. It only gets online if you have Wi-Fi.  I download games, shows, and books before we leave the house to go on trips.  I've heard that there is a way to make it recognize my phone's Wi-Fi hotspot, but I haven't looked into it.  I mean, if I have my phone and it can get on the internet, then I'm good.  Also, it uses a micro-usb, just like my phone and my GPS so I don't have to keep up with a random charger.My friends and I download books and email them to each other and it is handy with the Kindle email.  I have bought a second one for my daughter for Christmas because she is constantly "borrowing" mine to watch shows on Netflix and Hulu.  We love them, and for the price you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My 10 year old daughter saved up enough money to buy an ipod touch.  As we were rating the touch we came across the Kindle Fire.  The Kindle Fire  has Many more features and the price is considerably less! I love that I can parental control just about anything on this.  I really love the text to speech that comes already installed- yes it is digitized read back but has encouraged my daughter to read more.  Overall this is a great investment for any age!

Reviews.Title: just as ordered
Reviews.Author: chan8913
Reviews.Content: Package came just as I thought it would! I love the Amazon/Kindle box b/c it is very, very sturdy and clean!

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: The whole family really enjoys the Kindle Fire! I really like the parental control. The only problem is...having to share!

Reviews.Title: Terrific product
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I am more than satisfied with my Kindle Fire.  It has a great display, is easy to navigate, handles new downloads extremely fast, and lasts a long time between charges.  I couldn't be happier with it.

Reviews.Title: great for apps, music, and video.
Reviews.Author: STARLETT RENKEN
Reviews.Content: only problem is does not come with any instruction on how to turn on, or work the initial steps. works great for e-mail, music, and apps are great. don't try to use facebook games, I had no luck getting to farmville original, only farmville express, which I did not care for at all. My 2 year old granddaughter uses the apps and the parental controls are great.

Reviews.Title: Love my kindle. Just wish the font size was a little bigger. Too small makes it hard to read at times.
Reviews.Author: CHRISTINE CHILDERS
Reviews.Content: My old kindle had more font settings. Even in the book section the font choices are smaller. And at times it is impossible to read aol or facebook. All the other options are great!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Harold Burnham
Reviews.Content: Delivery was prompt and the product met and exceeded my expectations. the price was fair. Amazon had excellent promotional price.

Reviews.Title: Husband enjoys use
Reviews.Author: S. L. Hettinger "basically organic"
Reviews.Content: I'm glad we got this special Kindle Fire.Now we can both be online and do what we love to do.

Reviews.Title: about my order
Reviews.Author: emily
Reviews.Content: love this item it works so great i have not put it down since i got it in the mail .. would definitly recamened to others

Reviews.Title: Like it alot
Reviews.Author: Kristine M LoSasso
Reviews.Content: It gets a bit heavy after holding for awhile and maybe might have wanted a bit bigger screen but it is awesome for the price.

Reviews.Title: Funny
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: I bought this kindle for my mother whom is retired. My father stated that I couldn't have bought her a better gift. Mother stays up late at night on her kindle and my father have to make her come to bed. I thought that was very funny since it use to be the opposite with my mother having to make my father come to bed after falling asleep in his recliner watching television.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Deborah Jondle
Reviews.Content: Great entertainment for the whole family!!!  Love Love Love it so much.  So happy that I decided to get this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Cool
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I actually like my Kindle, after not wanting one because my Android does everything I need.  I can read books wherever I am and no one knows.  I also surf the internet on wifi.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: A. Taylor
Reviews.Content: So I got this for my daughter for christmas. She has not used it yet, but I can not wait for her to try it out. I have already put tons of free games and books on it. It also has tons of parent control so I can block all the items I don't wish her to use. Everything she does shows up on the front screen so I can see what she has been up to.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Nguessan J. Sess
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle Fire 7" I think it is a good item. Unfortunately I did not get the HD one.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: great battery life. the only thing i wish it had was a camera....took it on a trip to MI LOVE IT!!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: James Myers
Reviews.Content: I love the ease of operation and and really a great reader.  I would love to have 3 for 4G in addition to WI FI.

Reviews.Title: Frustrated
Reviews.Author: kinblock
Reviews.Content: I was given a Kindle Fire for Christmas by my daughter who lives in USA.  She knows I'm a Sudoku freak and knew there was a great free app that could be downloaded.  Unfortunately, I can't download free apps as I live in Australia.  I cannot understand the logic in that I can download books, which I pay for, but because I don't have an American credit card or address I cannot download FREE things.  Crazy!!

Reviews.Title: Best purchase in a long time!
Reviews.Author: charlo213
Reviews.Content: I was contemplating between the Kindle Fire, the NOOK tablet and and iPad.. After playing with the iPad and checking out the specs between the Kindle and the NOOK, I decided on the Kindle Fire! It's not HD, but it definitely looks it. I've been reading or playing games on it at least once a day since I received it in the mail. I'm also a college student and found out that I can get some of my textbooks on it, which will save my back and space. I love that when the Kindle is in it's case, I can set it up and read in a lot of different positions without holding it. You can also change the size of the font, the color, the style etc when you're reading. I also set up all of my e-mail accounts on it: University e-mail, personal e-mail and my play e-mail and it lets me access all of them in the same application. My boyfriend also played with it a little and he wants to buy one too! All of the apps and everything that you can receive for free is even worth the price that was paid for it. The iPad is way way more expensive and I must say that the Kindle is definitely comparable. I love my purchase of an early Christmas gift for myself!! :-)

Reviews.Title: Great kindle
Reviews.Author: Marty Gonzales
Reviews.Content: Love Kindle Fire. I have the first generation Kindle, bought several Kindles for gifts and now have a great Kindle with access to wifi, movies and games. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Ver;y nice product
Reviews.Author: tonya
Reviews.Content: Very nice product although this is the first tablet I've ever purchased. I'm still learning things about it but over all, I'm very happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: AMIRA BABOOLAL
Reviews.Content: i would recommend this product as i quite enjoy it I have just started using this product as i just received it last week

Reviews.Title: Great product for beginner
Reviews.Author: Kim Abraham
Reviews.Content: Easy purchase, fast delivery with no damage.  Great beginners product.  Can't wait for my daughter to open this on Christmas Day!  She will be able to read her books she wanted me to originally purchase from Barnes and Nobles.Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Shawn W. Bidlingmeyer "Shawn B."
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife for her birthday and she never puts the thing down.  Earned some brownie points. She loves it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: pook "shop-o-holic"
Reviews.Content: Ordered this on Cyber Monday for the awesome price! lets keep it real- AMAZON is amazing! everything about this company is what makes it what is is- AWSOME

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Tamera Mcintosh
Reviews.Content: Love the product for the quality and quantity of projects that my kids will be able to use, this is well worth the price!

Reviews.Title: Best Christmas Gift!
Reviews.Author: Charla Brantley
Reviews.Content: Getting this for my daughter for Christmas and she is gonnna love it!  Processed and shipped very quickly in the mail!

Reviews.Title: kindlefire
Reviews.Author: Reena
Reviews.Content: this product does everything it says it does i would recommend it to any one every age it is great for reading

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Max L. Hatfield "Max L. Hatfield"
Reviews.Content: It was time for an old man to adjust to a newer Idea. I decided to go middle of the range with color. Thought I could download rockhounding information to cut the amount of books down that I carry in my truck, but very few are on Kindle, maybe that will change soon.I have had great fun with this wonderful tool, as I have spent way to much time slinging birds at pigs, am still deciding what books to download need some new ones to match the searies that I read. This Kindle seems to grow more on me each day and has been a worth while investment for me with great potentials yet to be discovered.As stated by others the only thing leftout is expandable memory port of some kind would be a good thing.A great tool at a good price.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet at a nice price!
Reviews.Author: Harry Mark
Reviews.Content: I ordered this Kindle Fire on cyber Monday. There was green line in the middle of the screen. I return the package and received one in a few days. I like my Kindle Fire. I used other tablets but the Kindle Fire perform faster. It is extremely easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great mini tablet!
Reviews.Author: J. Lofton "Some Girl in NC"
Reviews.Content: I am no stranger to tablets, I have a Nook and a Coby Android tablet, but the screen on the Kindle fire is just awesome! Fast and quick device, no problems what so ever. Great device for a person who is getting started with a tablet or is experienced and wants a smaller tablet to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle. It suits my needs exactly. I use it to browse the internet, download and review documents, and read. The only issue I have is that you cannot get Adobe Flash on it. This means there are a lot of videos that will not play. If i had realized this before I bought it I may have gone with another product just because watching shows online is a big part of why I bought it in the first place. It is an awesome product but it would be nice if Adobe would create a flash player for it.

Reviews.Title: Longtime Owner of Original Fire: Like it even more now
Reviews.Author: Rex Koontz
Reviews.Content: I have had the original Fire for many months (a year?) now, and I can say that I use it even more now than when I took it out of the box.As a scholar, I must read a lot of journal articles in their pdf version. The Fire displays these beautifully (unlike the original Kindle) and the "Send to Kindle" app on my computer makes it painless to load my Fire with required reading, straight from my University's research databases. The Fire has revolutionized my bus ride to work.As more scholarly books become available for Kindle, my library has grown. I love the ability to search or come back to a book section instantaneously. It's like living with your library anywhere, anytime. This might sound simple, but in everyday practice for a scholar it is incredibly useful.Evernote works well and serves as my notepad for things work and play - I get to my destination and sync and there are all my thoughts, to dos, etc.I'm also a pop culture maven and am constantly streaming TV in the evening. I have had no substantive issues. With a good pair of headphones (I use Sennheiser) the experience can be significantly better than watching on a big screen. The music app is great - all my Amazon music is in the cloud, ready to be played. I am also very pleasantly surprised by the integration with Audible - all my old audiobooks are ready to be streamed or downloaded instantly!I became so hooked to my Fire that I purchased a 4G hotspot (with metered connection - Ting) so that I could connect on the bus and elsewhere. It works fairly well - the Fire may drop the connection when we are moving at 65 or 70 in weird Houston suburbia, but in general the Fire can handle the hotspot fairly well. The drop may be the hotspot anyway. Also, the Fire seems to be fairly frugal in 4G use - I set the browser to "mobile page" and read much of the NY Times with the Fire for little in 4G cost.As a baseball fanatic, the MLB app (with a daily streamed game and all sorts of info) is a great deal, and the stream works passably well.I use Skype a lot and would like to do it on the Fire, but the original Fire is Skypeless. At some point may have to move up to the HD, but for now I'm so in tune with my Fire that I will find other places to Skype, or suck it up and use my cellphone.I'm surprised at how useful and straightforward the mail app is. I have synced to Gmail and over the last year never had a problem. CalenGoo is a wonderful app for syncing your google calendar, which is important for me at both work and home.In short, I was unsure how productive the Fire was going to be for me. I can now say unreservedly that for a scholar it can be incredibly useful, and the pop culture maven and baseball fan in me have not been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Really love my Kindle Fire.
Reviews.Author: vani711
Reviews.Content: I love reading and I had been looking into getting a Kindle for some time now.  I was going to get the first edition whose price came down to about $70 but when I seen the Kindle Fire I figured why not just get it for twice as much as the first version. So far I like it a lot it's easy to navigate. Also, I will be saving a lot of space when it comes to buying books.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I am still learning how to use the Kindle but I really love my Kindle Fire 7 so far!! :-)

Reviews.Title: Great Gold Box Event Purchase!
Reviews.Author: Roger A. Beam
Reviews.Content: Have been wanting a Kindle Fire for some time.  When my sister-in-law sent me a message that a terrific buy was coming up on a Gold Box Event in Amazon's Top Holiday Deals, I jumped at the chance and was fortunate enough to be in on the deal.  Love my new Kindle Fire!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7
Reviews.Author: Anita Beckwith
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle I bought it as a gift for my granddaughter.  It is simple enough to use, I would like to do away with the ads on her kindle as she is very young.  I also would like to be able to control the age limit of the movies and games that are streaming, I am sure there is a way.  I love the way it connects easily to wi-fi and what I buy can go directly to her kindle.  I plan on buying one for myself after Christmas if I don't receive one as a gift.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: bob burns
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is a great tablet. I am glad I chose this over the seemingly hundreds of other tablets to choose from in this price range. The special offers are nothing t be concerned with as all they amount to are unnoticed screen savers at startup. After owning my Kindle Fire for almost 2 weeks my only disappointment was the inability to run multiple apps at one time.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: John Wayne
Reviews.Content: I though that it was great ! It met all my expectation and more! Enjoying it more n more everyday!

Reviews.Title: Best thing that happened to reading!
Reviews.Author: Deborah A Coleman
Reviews.Content: MY KINDLE FIRE!I am enjoying my Kindle Fire.  I read a lot an don't have to lung a book around.  Enjoy not having to wait on shipping.

Reviews.Title: Great table
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I gave this table for a friend as a b-day present. she already own a regular  kindle tablet. She say this one is Great.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: VirginiaRoby I Love my new kindle fire.
Reviews.Content: I Love the back light, I can read at night without disturbing anyone, It is not to hard to understand, It was really easy tolearn how to use, Try it you will love it.  I had two other kindles before the fire, I had the touch, It was OK , but it did not have back lighting, and not as many features as the fire, It skipped pages when I was reading so I traded for the Kindle Fire. and I am so glad I did.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire Review
Reviews.Author: tarheel
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is far above any other tablet of that size and some larger ones, would highly recommend itfor anyone young and old, my 5 year granddaughter enjoys using her mother's, loves to download games.It processes information very fast, screen is crisp, great for readings books.

Reviews.Title: Gen 1 kindle Fire but upgrading
Reviews.Author: wasafiri
Reviews.Content: I bought a gen 1 Kindle Fire when it first came out.  I have been more than satisfied with this product as an e-reader with privileges eg. wifi browsing, email etc.  This was my first step into the tech world beyond my "dumb" cell phone.  Now I'm ready for more and it seems that the Fire HD might be what I am looking for.What I need to know is whether or not it is a good investment for my 5 grandchildren ages 8 to 16.  We would be talking about 3 households with 2 to 3 HD Fires per household.  Do I need to buy Prime for all of them or for each household or just 1 for the purchaser (me)?If I understand the downloading procedure, there needs to be an account set up for each device. Do I need to set up an account for each household or can I use my account to download items for all of them.I know these are basic questions but it seems that the product description lacks info on the simple stuff.  So if anyone can help I would appreciate the advice.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: Altdr08
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet for a beginner or someone who will be using it to read books or just surf the web.  The downside to it is that it does not have Adobe Flash player nor can you download the feature; without Adobe flash player the tablet is limited to websites outside of amazon that play videos (ex:  Youtube).  After contacting field support, I learned that you can change the settings to Mobile view in order to play youtube videos which is a plus.  The main reason I purchased the tablet was so I could watch my favorite sitcoms through my cable service online (which I already pay for), but quickly found out I couldn't due to the Adobe issue.  In order to watch my fav shows I will have to purchase them through Amazon Instant video.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: pharcyde
Reviews.Content: Small portable & not to mention amazon freindly runs fine great seller arrived on time the best 7" tablet compared to the high end tablets like the ipod mini.

Reviews.Title: It's ok...
Reviews.Author: juless
Reviews.Content: Pros: Great screen quality, sound quality. I love the amazon store- it's filled with great books, apps, magazines, etc.Cons: I wish it had more customization. I started having problems with it. Battery not that great.Overall, it's a great ebook, but not a very good tablet. If you're going to use it more on like apps, internet, I say go with an android tablet (HKC, Visual Land, Emerson) They are cheaper, you can customize a lot more and still great quality!

Reviews.Title: Great product for kids
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: Bought 3 of these for Christmas for my nephews.  They all work great, I have them fully charged and put them inside of Poetic Cases to help protect them. I opened the box to set up the Kindles and to get the latest updates.  This way when christmas comes, the kindles are ready to be enjoyed by my nephews.  I found absolutely nothing wrong with the Kindles. They arent as nice as my wifes and I kindle fire HD's, but for kids around 8-10, these are a steal.  Couple it with Kindle Freetime and you cant go wrong.  Great job Amazon.

Reviews.Title: A little overrated but I still like it
Reviews.Author: Turbo Mom
Reviews.Content: I was very excited to get this little tablet and couldn't wait for it to come.  It is perfect for a book worm like me who needs to read constantly everywhere I go.  I can have all my favorites books with me, and some other perks like Facebook, Angry Birds, movies, audio books etc.  It is great to also make use of Kindle Free Time with my 8 years old in the car.  She can play her favorite games, read books, watch video without getting bored on the long car ride.  Some cons - yes there are some.  A bit heavy (but sturdy which is a pro) , battery life could be better too.  I charged it to 100%, only used it for a little bit to read a book and it's already down to 70%!  Come on!  I can listen to a book for hours on my MP3 player and it will last me for days before I need to charge a battery.  Could use an SD card too, would be nice, but I guess a flash drive with adapter would do.  And yes, Amazon throw in a 2 dollar charger, please, don't be cheap.  It's not that much to have it included and still keep the price down.  If I could buy it for $2, so can you include it into a bundle.  Bottom line - excellent purchase for the price.  People who post disappointed reviews were obviously expecting to get a smaller version of iPad at the fraction of price, Don't fool yourself and just do a full research and know what to expect from your Kindle before you buy it.

Reviews.Title: A great buy.
Reviews.Author: Cindy Marley
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle fire.Anybody reading this should buy one.The best i could of ever bought.Love  love it. All the things you can do with this is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love it.
Reviews.Author: T. Moran
Reviews.Content: My husband got this for our 20th anniversary.  We both like it so much that I turned around and got him one to have also.  We both love to read and these are so much easier to take on vacation than a suitcase full or books.  The color is absolutely beautiful on these devises.  My grandson loves to play Angry Birds on it also, so we are all happy.

Reviews.Title: Christmas present for 9 year old.
Reviews.Author: mtb0012
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Kindle Fire for 9 year old for Christmas. I have been using it for the last two weeks getting it set up. I was concerned about purchasing a Kindle Fire for my child because of the ability to purchase items. (I use 1-click on my amazon account.) Since she would be allowed to take it to school and I have seen children purchasing items during school on their devices, I was concerned. I was glad to find out parents can change settings so purchases need a password. My child will enjoy having her own electronic to use during trips. I'm thinking I need to upgrade my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Heeehehheee
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Foxwell
Reviews.Content: Omg! The husband surprised me with this as an early Christmas gift. I love it, although I wish the battery lasted a bit longer

Reviews.Title: Awesome, Awesome and more AWESOME!!!
Reviews.Author: Aim
Reviews.Content: I had a Nook before and switched to the Kindle because they were running a sale.  I can say that I do not regret the purchase for a minute!!!

Reviews.Title: LOVE this gadget
Reviews.Author: KathrynD
Reviews.Content: Oh my goodness, I love this thing. I've had the original kindle keyboard, and I loved it, but it's no comparison to the fire. I decided on this model fire over the others strictly because of pricing, but I am FAR from disappointed in this model over the HD model. My mother has the HD model, and there aren't many visible or in depth differences between the two, other than one being HD.

Reviews.Title: My wife likes her Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: rick johnson
Reviews.Content: First Rick bought it for his wife and I really like it.  So far I love the games and going on line.I would recommend it to everyone. Really wish it had a camera.thanks it is really great.Kathy Johnson

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: Have to say I love this device.  Seems a majority of complaints that I had read about it involved a lack of features or capabilities compared to an ipad.  For me, I bought it as an E-reader and it performs that function beautifully while also looking awesome on the display.  No hitches with wireless networks I connect to for using the internet and the device feels sturdy without being heavy to hold (though I did buy a case to help protect from the rugrats).  I feel Amazon did an excellent job with this device, especially with it being their first effort in the tablet/E-reader market.

Reviews.Title: No need for HD
Reviews.Author: AMB
Reviews.Content: I am re writing my review, as I have had this 6 months now. I love it more than I did 6 months ago, if that is possible. The graphics are GREAT, the audio is great. the speakers are  on the side so the volume is loud and clear. its the perfect size...it fits in my purse. i download movies on to it for long drives. i dont know how many movies i can store on the device but so far i have 3.The advertising home screen people complain about is pretty cool. doesnt bother me at all and keeps the cost of the device down.

Reviews.Title: Great gift!
Reviews.Author: Fantastic Book Review "Tina"
Reviews.Content: I was expecting this to be like the 1st gen Kindle and found out flash is no longer supported. The features are set up differently but other than flash (which I guess I'll blame this on Adobe), my mom loves her kindle and you can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!!!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Williams "kw"
Reviews.Content: I brought two of these.  One for my 10 year old and one for my 6 year old.  I got them for $129 on Cyber Monday.  They love it and it's one of the best purchases for my kids.  So much freeee educational stuff.  I'm blown out!!! They also used their adapters that was from their ipods and all they had to do was use the cord that came with the Kindle. The advertisement I have not noticed which I have seen people complain about.  So to get the discounted price with the advertisement, it's a great deal! The only extra money I put out was cases from Amazon that were cheap and comes with a screen protector and stylist for $7.99. I had to put the parental guard on so they couldn't order anything else without my permission and now it's even better than what I excepted!!!!  Free apps like books, games, and so much educational stuff!!!  And now when they want an app, they need a pass code which works for me and my credit card! I have to take the Kindles away from them because they can't put it down!!!!

Reviews.Title: nice!!!!
Reviews.Author: J. Matthew Dewitt
Reviews.Content: My wife loves it and never puts it down... Somethings on it do have their draw backs.....APPS .....For example, Facebook only has limited history, Words with Friends goes crazy any time you have a blank tile... and so on...

Reviews.Title: KINDLE
Reviews.Author: xnewyrkr
Reviews.Content: I bought this kindle for my grandson for Christmas as he loves playing games on my phone and my reader so it is not actually for myself.  However, I chose the Kindle Fire as in all the research I did I feel it is the best product for its price and he will be able to use it for quite some time.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Cameron Hudson
Reviews.Content: This thing is great! Light, easy to use and great picture quality. I highly recommend it to everyone. Ya hoo

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE
Reviews.Author: josefina nieto
Reviews.Content: VERY HAPPY WITH MY  HD KINDLE FIRE PURCHASE!  AND SPREADING THE GOOD WORD TO FAMILY AND FRIENDS!  AMAZING PRODUCT!THANK YOU!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is a great product
Reviews.Author: Joy Younkin
Reviews.Content: I use the Kindle Fire every day.  I like the apps that are available and the books.  There are always free books and free apps available and the ones that are not free are very reasonably priced.  I like the options for display of the apps and books and the screen is very clear.

Reviews.Title: Lovely gift
Reviews.Author: juanita
Reviews.Content: I got this kindle fire for my daughter so that she could play her games on and leave my Ipad alone. I am very pleased with how clear the screen is and all of the other things that she can do on it. I'm thinking about getting me one.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 2nd generation
Reviews.Author: Ludovit Tatos "cleaverx"
Reviews.Content: This my second Kindle Fire. I have both 1st and now the 2nd generation. There is a bit of improvement in 2nd generation Kindle Fire. More memory and slightly faster CPU. I was going to buy Kindle Fire HD which is very nice.But I don't need camera and the screen resolution in Kindle  Fire is good enough for me. Far as 8 GB storage on Kindle Fire is not a problem since I have everything  I purchased on Amazon Cloud.For $159 bucks you can't beat it. If someone use Skype and want HD screen then Kindle Fire HD is a good choice for$40 more dollars.

Reviews.Title: Did I ever thank you for getting this for me?
Reviews.Author: D. R. Smith
Reviews.Content: That's what my husband says nearly everyday.  He has neurological problems with his hands and has trouble holding a book and turning the pages, but this is so easy for him.  The display is easy to use and downloading books is a snap so he's reading through the classics, Ben Hur, The Count of Monte Cristo, etc.  If he doesn't understand a word he just checks the dictionary included in the software.

Reviews.Title: Great for Kids, Too
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Disclaimer:  I did upgrade to get rid of the "Special Offers".My daughter loves the Fire.  I love the Kindle FreeTime -- I can let her use the Kindle as much or as little as I want, and restrict her to only those apps and books that are age appropriate.  It does everything she wanted a tablet for, with controls and a price I am thrilled with -- not to mention the incredible content available through Amazon.  The only drawback to sharing it with her is that I find myself having to use my smartphone more often again when we're waiting at places...  I think I will have to get a second Fire!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Brandy
Reviews.Content: Great product fast shipping! Thanks for the fast turn around.  Product was exactly what I expected it to be. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Love my new fire!
Reviews.Author: Amanda Bay
Reviews.Content: I love my new fire.  I wish I didn't have to get the "special offers" to get the lower price as those are a pain.  But I do love my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Lots of fun
Reviews.Author: fanotr
Reviews.Content: I have only had it for two weeks.  Bought it on CyberMonday since it was so cheap just to play around with.  I consider it an entry level tablet but it has been a joy so far.

Reviews.Title: It's great
Reviews.Author: Desiree Ramaglia
Reviews.Content: Know what you want - this works with wifi and does not come with a service plan other wise but I get alot of entertainment out of it because I already have Internet service in my home.

Reviews.Title: As always great purchase.
Reviews.Author: J. Mullins "CaerRaven"
Reviews.Content: I got this kindle for my husband for an early Christmas and he was ecstatic. It's rare that he ever gets excited over anything and when he opened this the look on his face was amazing. I have a kindle of my own and take it practically everywhere with me.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: bernie
Reviews.Content: so excited to get this. I have moved up from the basic Kindle (which I still love and will use more when I am away form internet access as it is smaller and light). This is easier to play some of the games on and I like having the internet capabilities, as I want to keep a smaller basic phone.

Reviews.Title: KINDLES ARE AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: Nickie Witcher
Reviews.Content: Great product! Arrived quickly!! Got this for a Christmas gift for my sons kindle!! He will be so excited to see it! I love the Kindle and Android!! I would much rather have this than any "I" anything!!

Reviews.Title: Yes! who needs an ipad when you've got a kindle
Reviews.Author: MunasG
Reviews.Content: I am an avid apple user, but when it came to the ipad...well it was too much money for me. So i thought a kindle fire will be nice. And was it a great decision! I love this tablet...you should see the sheepish smile on my face everytime i pull it out of my purse on the train. And I bought the 8GB for $129! on cyber monday. It's got everything I want on it...the challenge was in trying to sync the tablet to my macbook...am an idiot when it comes to electronics so there were a few trying moments. And it would've been nice if it came with a camera and mic for skype. But all in all i love it. I am due to travel on a bus for 13 hours over the weekend...well guess who's coming with me for company? yep the fire! For anyone considering this tablet, stop thinking and just buy it...please...you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle vs Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Carol L. Mcgann
Reviews.Content: I have an old Kindle (one of the originals), and my new Fire does almost everything better: touch screen makes page turning easier, navigation is better, changing settings is easier; everything the old "5-way controller" did is better on the Fire. The one thing that isn't better: reading! If you are getting this mainly to use as an e-book reader, get a Kindle instead. The Fire display is just too bright for comfortable long-term reading; it offers the option of "sepia" which is somewhat more comfortable, but it doesn't have enough contrast. They really did a good job designing e-ink on Kindles for being most like a book.But: the Fire does lots of other things, and does them well, so if reading isn't your MAIN aim, this is a great device!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Hayley
Reviews.Content: For the price its an awesome product. Does just enough. I gave it to my mom to listen to music on and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: stacey bryant
Reviews.Content: I have an iPad, so it took some adjusting to get used to this product. I love the size for the way it feels while holding it, but as far as viewing things some of the page writing is kind of small...I bought it on cyber Monday for only $127, and my son will be so happy to receive it for Christmas...I will wrap it on Xmas eve, because right now I'm busy enjoying and becoming familiar with this product...I would highly recommend this product especially if you are considering purchasing a tablet for your child

Reviews.Title: what a dynamite tablet
Reviews.Author: mama3
Reviews.Content: This is my love right now. My kids fight who gets to go on Mom's Kindle  Fire. I have to elbow my way in too, for my own tablet. I couldnt be more happy.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THE FIRE
Reviews.Author: Mary H. Peery
Reviews.Content: THIS IS THE BEST DEVICE FOR READING AND SURFING THE NET.  ITS EASY ENOUGH FOR MY ELDERLY MOTHER TO USE WITHOUT DIFFICULTY.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Linda Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I didn't think I needed a Kindle. Now I don't know how I lived without it. I thought it was just about books. This can take the place of my computer for about 90% of what I use it for. My computer can be used for work---hopefully increasing its life.

Reviews.Title: It is worth the initial price
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: It's like buying a really nice book case then filling it with endless cheap books! My kindle has already more than paid for it's self with the words to audio feature considering how expensive audio books are.

Reviews.Title: Tablet is cool
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: I like the tablet. Ebay app is not so cool but so far the tablet is great. Reading light on screen is a bit bright but can be adjusted.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: heidikins
Reviews.Content: The picture is extremely clear. It is very easy to work with. The only thing I do not like about the Kindle Fire is that you cannot change the backgrounds (without tweeking the system). Overall, a great product though.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire lives up to the "hype"
Reviews.Author: Lois A. "apppl"
Reviews.Content: This is the best purchase I've made, and I seem to buy quite a bit lately. The kindle lives up to all the "hype". I have one negative about it, and that is it has no instruction booklet. I'm still finding things I don't know about it. If there is a booklet, I sure would appreciate receiving one.Lois A

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amanda Neal
Reviews.Content: The only bad thing I can say is that it needs a better flash player. Other then I LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Pattin "Patti"
Reviews.Content: I love this little piece of technology, bought it for myself for Christmas. Just learning all that it can do, and so far so good. I do wish it had a longer battery life though.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: dimaroto
Reviews.Content: Im loving the Kindle Fire. Now, have in mind that I got it so that I could read my books, listen to Audible books, and watch the movies I have bought through Amazon. I love the fact that I can download them and not worry about internet conection so that I can watch them ;)It does the job for such a great price! I bought it during Cyber Monday so I saved myself some money, and got an extra one for my husband.I watched youtube videos in it and can't complain.I have an Iphone which I can use to Skype, so instead of getting an Ipad which costs so much more... I decided for KF which plays my movies and I can take with me everywhere because the size is just PERFECT, and is sooo light too!I know there is a way to transfer my itune movies and music to my KF, so Im going to start working on it ;)This is great, EASY TO USE TOO!!!Just get it people!

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 12 year old son for christmas and I preregistered it and add some books on it so he's ready to go in christmas morning.  I have to say it is awesome and I am jealous!  it is really fast and the picture is beautiful.  Mommy is going to be getting herself one for christmas too!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Robert L Robinson
Reviews.Content: Great price.  Recevied as promised.  Very smart product, easy to use.  Love Amazon!!!  Hope they run the 129 spcial again.  Would like to purchase more.

Reviews.Title: Best Price Performance deal
Reviews.Author: Signor Emanuel Ravelli "Captain Spaulding"
Reviews.Content: Bought a refurbished one of these a while ago and couldn't be happier. Navigation is perfectly acceptable regardless of what some other reviews suggest and you can't beat the price. View it as a low cost, low risk way of entering the world of tablet computing. If all you're going to do is read and occasionally search the internet, why spend three or four times as much for an iPad? Plenty of free and reduced priced content available so you needn't spend ten, twelve, fifteen bucks a pop for books. Check the Kindle Book Deal of the Day; you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Carol Ferrone
Reviews.Content: Never even held a tablet before my purchase. After only a few minutes I had registered it, hooked it up to wi-fi & was using it.

Reviews.Title: My new favorite electronic device!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!! I am in love with my Kindle!! I avoided getting on for a long time since I'm really a fan of having the physical paper to touch in a traditional book, the smell of the fresh ink, the paper stock, the joy of flipping the pages. Well my husband got this for me as a birthday present because I hate not being able to read while laying out by the pool or lake. I bought the LifeCase to make it waterproof and voila, we're in business!! I love being able to download a new book in one click allowing me to never run out of something to read. It also works great for social media, Facebook, Twitter, and my new favorite Pinterest. I've watched movies, played games, surfed the web, you name it. Anything I can do woth my laptop I can do with my Kindle. Can't wait to get every member of the family one!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Hawaii1951
Reviews.Content: I already have an iPod Touch and an iPhone. Love them both. I was considering getting an iPad, then decided due to cost and taking into consideration this would be a whole new format from which to choose, I got the Kindle Fire. I love it and the ease of Amazon's one click ordering makes it effortless to download apps, games, books,whatever I want.

Reviews.Title: Help Book
Reviews.Author: Jesse
Reviews.Content: Need a how to book to teach everything this tablet can do,plus add ons. Also more info when buying a new tablet.

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY! Came within 3 days!
Reviews.Author: Sunflower "AJeffery"
Reviews.Content: Amazon have never failed me. 90% of the time, I only buy when it is from Amazon or backed by the company. Shipping is always fast and the products sells itself. The Kindle is recommended by families and friends even the ones who have a toddler as young as 6. This one is for my 9 yr old and I cannot wait for her to get this for Christmas!! Highly recommended to those who doesn't want to break the bank AJ

Reviews.Title: Wonderful.
Reviews.Author: Charlene
Reviews.Content: I never had anything like this before and I just love it.  It's easy to use and I can do anything I want to on it.  So far I like all the games and the books are real easy to read.  I also like the fact it fits in my purse and I can take it any where.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Martika
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a gift for my sister on her birthday and she loved it. She likes not having to walk around with her laptop.

Reviews.Title: EZ
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: My highest award to the kindle is the 'EZ award' of excellence. Life should be so kind. Window 8 should learn how EZ it is supposed to be... I will be buying 2 more Fire 8.9 HD for Christmas presents. THANKS AMAZON <3

Reviews.Title: I am in love!
Reviews.Author: Miranda
Reviews.Content: I am in love with my Kindle. I was going to buy a tablet but why buy a tablet when you can get all you want from this Kindle Fire!!! LOVE!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Kathy Conklin
Reviews.Content: This device takes some getting used to due to it's set up.  I was used to a PC and it's so much different.  Alll you have to do is learn the set up and it's fine.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: RMJ
Reviews.Content: I'm really enjoying my Kindle Fire.  I got it only to read books, magazines, and now probably other things.  I had an iPad first generation however that was so heavy and I rarely used it.  I think the only time I used was for my music and magazines.  Go figure?  Anyway, I'm enjoying my Kindle.  I hope everyone buys one.

Reviews.Title: Way better than expected!
Reviews.Author: DEB RN
Reviews.Content: I could not be happier with the kindle fire.  It is like a mini I-pad. Stays charged for long periods of time.

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL DEVICE
Reviews.Author: Speedy
Reviews.Content: There are currently three of these in our family.  I have had mine for about 9 months. My sister has one.  We purchased one for my mother in the spring.  We all LOVE our Kindles.  Don't want to spend the money on an Ipad?  Get one of these!  After Christmas there will be two more of these in our family.  I got this one for my Dad.  My sister got one for her 11 year old daughter.  This is one purchase you will not regret!

Reviews.Title: Had a battery issue at first but...
Reviews.Author: Megan T
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire on time and packaged very well. I played with it all night - I received it at 40% charged and after 2 hours of playing with it on Wifi it was only at 35% - not bad! It runs great on Wifi, they are wonderful apps at your fingertips and the display is beautiful! The Kindle is easy to use and navigate around. I enjoy the weight of this Kindle, not too heavy but not too light and I love how it displays the books. You can also change brightness, fonts and even add notes next to things you like as you read - this makes my reading experience more comfortable for me but also more interactive. The touch screen is responsive - you don't find yourself having to hit a button more than once because the screen responds right away. The sound is great - much better than I expected and sounds even better when I plug my headphones into the headphone jack. This Kindle is a great purchase. It is easy to navigate and personalize as well as fun for something other than just reading.My only negative is that my Kindle wouldn't charge :( It didn't recognize my mother's Kindle charger, my computer or another wall charger at all. I called Amazon support, my call was answered after I chose the correct opition on the recording and the woman was so helpful, Victoria was her name. She helped me reset it but still nothing. Then I was transferred to Rhonda in digital support who clarified all I had tried and then said they would be sending me out a new Kindle. I was so disappointed and aggravated when I started my call to Amazon support and in the end was smiling and thanked both Victoria and Rhonda before I hung up. Thank Amazon for making a potentially terrible situation into something great.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Pinger
Reviews.Content: Although the Kindle Fire is not as customizable as the Google Nexus 7 Tablet (16 GB), it is still a great tablet, especially for the price.  The colors are vibrate, the sound is smooth, and the operating speed is adequate. My only big complaints are that I wish it came with a camera and an AC charger, instead of just a USB cord to charge using your PC. The Amazon App Store could also use some improvement.  Surprisingly though, unlike many others, I actually have no problem with the advertisement screensavers.  I think the Kindle Fire is a great first tablet to buy for people who are unfamiliar with them and/or kids (since it is cheap, in case they break it).  Overall, I am happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Why did I wait??!
Reviews.Author: Julie A. Osborne "Vamp Lover"
Reviews.Content: I know I am not the only "hold-out" on getting a kindle! I love to read "real" books so much that I thought I would not like an e-reader - boy was I wrong!  I just got the Kindle Fire 7" (non HD) and I love it!!  This is my first e-reader of any kind so I don't have anything to compare it to - but this one it is so easy to use, fast, great screen color, ec.  It is so nice to instantly download a book that comes out the same day.  My bookshelves are overflowing with books, I will still buy books but not nearly as many.  Highly recommend Kindle!  I also recommend getting the wall plug charger for $10.  I also would suggest upgrading to Amazon Prime ($39 a year for students) gets you a lot of freebies, lending library, etc.

Reviews.Title: Great gift... to myself!
Reviews.Author: Jrcruz0921
Reviews.Content: I bought this on cyber Monday and got a great deal on it. I have only put it down to charge it so far. I am continually finding different apps to use on it. I love this gift... thanks ME!

Reviews.Title: Good for Amazon and web browsing
Reviews.Author: A. Macdowell
Reviews.Content: I decided to order a Kindle Fire over some of the other tablet options out there because I wanted a portable streaming device for prime instant videos and my Amazon video library purchases.I am happy for the most part with this device with only a few things I would care to change. This tablet is lacking in hardware as far as external volume controls like you find on most devices. It's frustrating at first to figure out how to adjust the volume. Other tablets and even my Android phone, all have these side button volume controls. Another issue I have had and not tried yet to fix is that when I put the headphones in, sound comes out of both the headphones and tablet speakers and the sound isn't great. Also at max volume it is hard to hear much. I also did not like that the device doesn't come with a charger for your wall, it only comes with the cord. This is the first time I have EVER seen that. I don't want to pay extra for a charger so I am using others that I luckily already had but what if you didn't?As far as streaming goes, I experience a slight lag when I first stream Amazon or other videos but it doesn't last too long, video quality is otherwise great and I like being able to stop watching a movie on the Fire and resume watching on my Roku or PS3. I don't like the Kindle app for reading as much as the ones I have on other devices, it just isn't as seamless.The lack of apps is a bit disappointing and I am finding that some which are normally free on Android cost money on Amazon App store.If you want this device for an affordable basic tablet and for Amazon content I recommend it but if you are looking for something more advanced go with something else like a Nexus 7.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: C. C. Morris "violin nut"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire. I read on it all the time. It seems I can read it faster than I could a hard back book. Love love love it!

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: trevante
Reviews.Content: Totally love this product it was everything I expected. The quality is gr8 and it arrived on time. I would definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Not Enough Language Support
Reviews.Author: Barnabas C. Park
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item with special offer. But, I am returning the product mainly due to language support issue.Simply put it, Kindle Fire 2nd generation only support in few major Latin languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian (probably Russian too). However, there is no support for Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and Arabic, Bulgarian, for example.If you have to read and write in non Latin Language, as native speaker or learner, which was my case then this is not the product you want to have.I wish Amazon come up with a solution sooner than later or at least put out information so that people may not mistakenly assume that it supports non Latin languages as well as I believe most android os product support.  In addition, though I didn't try myself, through my research I was informed that even among languages available, toggling between two language options, say, English and Spanish, is complicated.No doubt, apart from language issue, I would have been very satisfied with this product. In fact, the product came the very next day after I ordered it.  What a service!!!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Janice Morgan
Reviews.Content: its lite and easy to operate. it past my expectations . my family uses it as well and it has been a great investment.
