It appears that the Fire processing is fine tuned to communicate with Amazon, but fails miserably in communicating with other sites. However, at home using my wireless connection, it seems to work much better. It is just when in another country at various WiFi hot spots the devices fails. Since the IP communication protocol is the same world wide, this is a mystery and something that Amazon should correct. Did they fix this in newer models? Who knows. I wish now I would not have spent the money on this device and purchased an Ipad instead.

Reviews.Title: Nice present
Reviews.Author: M. Bazan
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Mother's Day present, my mother loves it, she is an older woman and has been famiiar with a laptop, now she can have all in this single device.

Reviews.Title: My friends love their Kindle
Reviews.Author: Alice Mesnickow
Reviews.Content: Brought this for my friends and they absolutely love this product. They used mine so I bought them one like mine,

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: arron taylor
Reviews.Content: wife loves it so far this was a replacement after I broke her last kindle by siting on it but great buy

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Juan Pablo Madiedo Zuniga
Reviews.Content: Very good product. It is very usefull and it have satisfied all my needs.  I recomend this product, very good tablet.

Reviews.Title: Gift for Mom!
Reviews.Author: Leta Collins
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a gift for my mother to replace an older model Kindle.  She absolutely loves it! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't hold a charge
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: I bought this preowned and it was supposed to be in good condition. It wasn't. It had scratches and does NOT hold a charge for more than 10-15 minutes. I bought this for my kids and they have broken a few chargers because they have to use it plugged in. Waste of $80. I should have just bought a new one.

Reviews.Title: This was a replacement for a first Generation
Reviews.Author: Coby McFadden
Reviews.Content: After receiving my FIRST replacement unit which was a SECOND generation unit, it would not work. This caused me to have to AGAIN send it back for another replacement unit in which I was sent ANOTHER FIRST Generation unit. I am hoping that the battery/charging issues that plagued the first generation do not end up showing up again on this one. As far as being satisfied, I buy a lot of things from Amazon, and would have preferred that they at least after the second one being defective them giving me the option to get a free upgrade to a newer unit. Nope. I can only hope that this one lasts.....

Reviews.Title: different from my first kindle, but very nice
Reviews.Author: Kay
Reviews.Content: The navigation is different from my first kindle, but the display is very nice. I enjoy reading on the new device.

Reviews.Title: liking the kindle fire.
Reviews.Author: Kristen
Reviews.Content: It's a great little tablet.I've had no problem with it.  Although I'm not a pro at navigating it, it is easy enough for my 3 year old to work.  The battery life is great!I use it for surfing web/email/games/reading/pintrist ap.

Reviews.Title: irritating!
Reviews.Author: c.brock
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd time ive had to replace this product the port works for about a month then it stops. Its aggravating I keep it on one charger and will take the charger and plug my phone up to make sure its working its the stupid kindle that keeps messing up!!!!

Reviews.Title: kindle review
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: So far so good!! I was one of the unlucky ones that had the Kindle 1st generation that went through charging issues every couple of months. This one has been excellent and I've enjoyed learning all of the different features this one has. Thanks for all of the help from the service reps at Kindle

Reviews.Title: My refurbished kindle fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Hazel Dickens
Reviews.Content: I now have 3 kindles and I am on them all the time.....i have no idea how I went so long without one.  I have one main one and two for the grandkids to use..the refurbished came looking brand new and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: kevin majeski
Reviews.Content: Came in timely order and exactly as expected. THANK YOU! Great item and a good deal. Fits the needs to a tee.

Reviews.Title: Solid update
Reviews.Author: Shannon964
Reviews.Content: Amazon replaced my 2011 Kindle Fire, which had problems with the charging port, with Kindle Fire 7.  I really like the new interface.  My only wish is that it didn't show every book I've ever read.  Now I'll have to go through the whole delete process again.  Other than that, it worked perfectly from the moment I plugged it in.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: J. Welch "Joy"
Reviews.Content: I up-graded from a very early version of a kindle. This is my first Kindle fire. It meets all my needs. It is taking me a little time to get used to it, as I am not tech savvy, but I am learning, The price was right. The options are good. I would recommend this product to someone on a budget but wants to have a Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: From morning till night.
Reviews.Author: Terri
Reviews.Content: Dear Amazon just to let u know that if ever there was a tablet to fall in love with I am in love with my Kindle Fire.  I on it from morning till I fall asleep at night.  I even bring it with me on the job.  If I have to go out of town well then in the front seat with me my Kindle will be.  Yes I need help.  Lol.  But truely this is the best tablet.  Thank You.  Mrs. Terri Smith

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: L. Kristi Muhuri "Krisg1913"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my 2 year old daughter and she loves it, I wish on this model that I could lock certain things with a password, like her purchasing apps

Reviews.Title: okay
Reviews.Author: Randy Holmes
Reviews.Content: I loved my kindle at first. But then it wouldn't charge anymore, so amazon offered a new charger. Worked long enough to get past the warranty. I contacted them about that they said it's past the warranty, there was nothing they could do. Amazon was just trying to make me purchase another kindle. Why would I want another product that is clearly defective!!!!Amazon you should have stood by your product that you are clearly aware of be defective, SHAME ON YOU!!!!

Reviews.Title: Awsome
Reviews.Author: Lilialexa17
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my dad and he absolutely loves it! he has all his favorite novels and books on it! I highly recommend this kindle!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire Tablet [Previous Generation]
Reviews.Author: Waine E. Newland
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire Tablet very good tablet. My wife loves it.. She uses it dailywith no problems as of yet.. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Karla's 3rd Kindle
Reviews.Author: Karla J. Kniffin
Reviews.Content: Worried about it being refurbished but so far I have had no problems with it. Loaded lots of games for the grandkids road trip and did great.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Robbie Burson
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love it. I use it almost everyday. Great for reading books and looking stuff up on the go. Djakanx

Reviews.Title: Some good features, but...
Reviews.Author: James Moore
Reviews.Content: I like a lot about Fire but, like all computers, it is jumpy and not even close to the convenience of the basic Kindle.  I use it every day and still do not feel in complete control as with basic Kindle.  Can not find a way to maneuver within a book to go back to chapter beginning etc.  And when you try to read in bed the display turns sideways a lot.  Just not my cup of tea.  Gotta buy a regular Kindle as my wife sat on hers and display is screwed up.

Reviews.Title: Service was quick, friendly and efficient.
Reviews.Author: K. Saffell
Reviews.Content: My original Fire died and for the cost of upgrading the refurbished HD Fire transitioned my account and contend quickly and easily. The Customer service representative was friendly and informative and even upgraded my shipping when I explained that my wife used my kindle every day.  The delivery and return were easy and quick.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Dcewu
Reviews.Content: Love the Kindle and the dedication Amazon has for their products. We will keep purchasing this product as long as they continue to provide great customer service and quality product for a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Wife Loves It
Reviews.Author: Addicted2red
Reviews.Content: She hardly ever puts it down.  It follows her everywhere.  I'm not sure which is more important to her, the Kindle or her phone.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle is saving my life and keeping me out of a wheelchair
Reviews.Author: JJ DeMauro
Reviews.Content: I had bad luck with my fist two Kindles, but Amazon was fair and helpful in the replacement.  This one is working fine. I seem to need twice the light that friends and family are comfortable with, and they rudely refuse to restructure their homes to bring up the lumens for me!  With my Kindle I can read in a dark corner or a closet, if need be.As to the extravagant claim in the title, I have four herniated disks. If I am not religious about exercising my core, I am at great risk for degeneration of my spine. I work out for an hour twice a week with a trainer and as part of a circuit class.  Then I try to put in at least a mile (sometimes five miles) per day on the treadmill, which is terminally boring.  Absolutely nothing exciting has ever happened in the parking lot of Fitness 19, and for insurance reasons, the gym will not move the "dreadmills" backward to an angle which would  allow us to see the tvs.  So my kindle, which fits beautifully on the tiny ledge of the machine, is a life saver.  I don't read books there often because the jogging motion is hard on my eyes.  And anyway, the major inducement to y virtuous hour of aerobics is that this is the only time and place I allow myself to play video games.  The best video games I have found for this purpose are Tetris and Popping Stars.  Popping Stars is best because there is no time pressure.  I gave it a top review some years ago, but have to retract that now.  The game is great, but it breaks down.  I have bought it twice but cannot access either one.

Reviews.Title: Love the new Fire
Reviews.Author: David Lee Hedrick "Cardinals Fan"
Reviews.Content: I have an original Kindle and then the second Gen, wanted the Fire for my mother.  She loves it.  She is learning new things on it daily and sends me notes from St. Louis daily.

Reviews.Title: Great deal, solid tablet
Reviews.Author: JustAGuy732
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 of these to replace Meeps (children's tablets) for my 2 kids.These work great for kids.  I love being able to password protect certainapps and downloads.The performance and connectivity is excellent.It has all of the basic features that I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for his third birthday. I went back and forth on several tablets and I am glad I chose the kindle. He did learn how to go into the app store and download things himself, but one I put the kid time and set the parental controls on there I dont have to worry about him going in and buying things. He loves it and enjoys having "his own computer"

Reviews.Title: My new kindle
Reviews.Author: Loretta m Morrison
Reviews.Content: Amazon addressed the problem promptly. My new kindle was shipped right away. Returning my old one was so simple smooth transaction. Love it!!!!

Reviews.Title: Came without chargers
Reviews.Author: Jim Tackett
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these for my kids to keep them occupied while traveling.  I did not realize they came without chargers, so not much of a deal.

Reviews.Title: kindle..mans answer to convenience with no lugging books around
Reviews.Author: milman26
Reviews.Content: Absolutely fantastic. Replacement was a quick fluid process. Only drawback was that I couldn't get my pictures off the problematic one that failed. Otherwise Kindle is an outstanding device that I don't want to be without...ever.

Reviews.Title: Over warranty; Expensive paperweight
Reviews.Author: lleach
Reviews.Content: After not quite a year and a half the thing won't turn on anymore. Gets to the title screen but won't go any further before it goes black and turns right off again. Contacted CS and they suggested a reset (which I tried tons of times before I contacted them). I humored them and gave it another whirl but it still won't turn on. After over a year my daughter now has a really expensive and useless paperweight. We've had multiple problems with a couple different fires and I'll never purchase another one. I have plans to buy a new android tablet in the fall for nursing school and it will be a samsung. Never again a fire. Never. Speakers crackled, sometimes just won't charge no matter what you try, won't turn on, freezes, I had a HD that just randomly turned off, or wouldn't turn on, and multiple (i'm not joking) problems. While it's true they generally have amazing customer service I shouldn't have to contact them so much, and I shouldn't still be left here with a dead kindle and the only option they give me is to pay 100 bucks to upgrade to an HD (which I already had and hated). Thanks but no thanks.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Tanya
Reviews.Content: Its fast, easy to use, and the colours are good.  I have yet to watch a movie on it but intend to do so really soon.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire is so nice to have
Reviews.Author: Valerie Stephens
Reviews.Content: Good picture. Though I bought this from Amazon in acceptable condition something have not done before and likely will not again, the kindle is in good appearance and works just like it's designed to... Perfectly. It only came with a charging cable rather than with wall adapter

Reviews.Title: Not user friendly
Reviews.Author: Thomas Jerome
Reviews.Content: I consider myself a very tech savy person, so I am saying this from expierience. The operating system on this is the most user unfriendly garbage I have ever used. I put andriod kit kat on this for $20. It is much better with this software

Reviews.Title: Was not as listed online
Reviews.Author: Shirl
Reviews.Content: it was to large and too heavy and could not get it to work right.Thank youShirl Byrdsb

Reviews.Title: REPLACEMENT
Reviews.Author: SHIRLEY TRAXLER
Reviews.Content: RECEIVED REPLACEMENT VERY PROMPTLY AND RETURN OF OLD KINDLE VERY EASY TO DO.NEW ONE MEETS ALL MY EXPECTATIONS AND THERE HAS BEEN NO PROBLEMS

Reviews.Title: Perfect gift for child
Reviews.Author: Kelly Rogers
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves this Kindle Fire.  It's just enough "technology" for her and I like that she can grow into it as far as books, internet and email.

Reviews.Title: So reasonabily priced, and reliable
Reviews.Author: S. Quinn "avid bookworm"
Reviews.Content: I had been given my sister's 3 year old used Kindle and it opened my world to lots of fun and even movies. Since it was so great I knew I could trust Amazon's refurbished certified tablet. Not disappointed at all. Works great and Tech supprot, even though both were used has been great. At 67 I'm not very trch savvy and they didn't laugh at me, but walked me through it. One day when I get to understand everything I can do with my Kindle Fire I may move on up.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my mom!
Reviews.Author: Brynley Martin
Reviews.Content: My mom is technologically  challenged, and she loves this gift!  I spent Mother's Day teaching her how to use this device and she was a pro when we were done!  I have a regular Kindle, but am considering getting this for myself as well!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7" LCD
Reviews.Author: Cassandra Shivers
Reviews.Content: I enjoy my Kindle tablet, I have no complaints. This is my 3rd Kindle, I have the paperwhite for reading only the Kindle Fire as my tablet with my music and games.

Reviews.Title: Besides the draining battery, this was an alright device
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: This Kindle had some great interface and other features but the battery drained soooooo fast. I called customer service and they offered some help but I had to eventually return it. It was still alright for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: My refurbished Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: HotLipsTX
Reviews.Content: Received in like new condition and I love it.  Use it for hours everyday.  Best Money I have ever spent!

Reviews.Title: expected better
Reviews.Author: Big Momma
Reviews.Content: it was advertised as a longer lasting battery and I am totally disappointed, the battery dies fast even though I use mine mainly for reading. My kindle reader lasts 10 times longer.

Reviews.Title: Customer Service Kudos
Reviews.Author: Kathy Armstrong
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire has always performed as expected. This review is to commend Amazon for their amazing customer service. The battery in my Kindle had expanded during charging to the point that it split the Kindle in two. After a call to Amazon explaining my problem, I was sent a brand new Kindle, free of any charges. Everything was handled in a most professional manner. My new Kindle arrived in two days and came with a prepaid return label for the damaged Kindle.I have always been happy with my Kindle and the same holds true for the new one. The response by Amazon was fantastic

Reviews.Title: will not stay on
Reviews.Author: jane wooters
Reviews.Content: It keeps cutting off every time it boots up. When it does stay on,if you switch to a different screen it cuts off

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: jerseygal08
Reviews.Content: it works the same as my old kindle that died  The only thing is I can't put in my Words with friends cheat sheet on the permanent board

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Natalie Berger
Reviews.Content: Overall great for my kids but have had to exchange them a handful if times due to charging issues! The port is not made very well and stretches out then the charger won't stay in!! Very annoying problem!

Reviews.Title: Refurbished is just as good as new!
Reviews.Author: Stacy
Reviews.Content: I was a little concerned with buying a refurbished item but it looks and functions like it was brand new.  And the price is certainly a plus! I love reading, playing games and watching Netflix on my Kindle Fire, all of which work great. Excellent product--highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Great purchase♥
Reviews.Author: Miriam Riverview fl
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my twins birthday they love them. Clear so many things they can do besides read.  I recommend this to anyone looking for one.

Reviews.Title: First time
Reviews.Author: ToxAgain
Reviews.Content: This was my first time to buy a refurbished item. Very pleased. I have 4 Kindles, but when the grandkids come it is great to have one for each. They play their own age games and with ear buds they can watch age appropriate movies or TV on prime. The item looked like it came straight from the factory. So if you're wondering-go for it!

Reviews.Title: Not designed for reading in the sun
Reviews.Author: Bailey
Reviews.Content: Same problem with screen as you have with the Ipad in the sun.  Screen is reflective glass and the sun light makes it impossible to read.  Returned it and ordered the older version of the kindle

Reviews.Title: okay....
Reviews.Author: tobi mankita
Reviews.Content: the kindle fire 2nd gen is pretty bad.prosgood customer servicecheap prices (compared to nook)consonly 5.5 gigs availiblecasing isnt very strong (i have had mine for about four months and its very strached and dented and it had a case on)appstore is very limitedweb browser is very slow and cant do anythinghas low battery charge (lasts about 3 hours)it is probally better to get a ipad and then download the kindle app. this costs like nothing for a reason. STAY AWAY

Reviews.Title: It's good, but...
Reviews.Author: TaxMama "Your TaxMama"
Reviews.Content: If you're really using it, the battery keeps running out in about 4 hours.So don't plan to spend the day with it, unless you bring the charger.For some reason, the Silk browser doesn't stay connected very well. This is the browser that takes you to the Web. Sometimes, I get kicked out in seconds. Other times in minutes. And yes, I checked to see the Internet connection strength, bandwidth and how much memory I have left (generally over 85%)The audio is weird. It's not very loud at its loudest level.Yet, my husband tells me that the sound pervades the entire house, in a way that the TV, set to a similar volume, does not.Fortunately, I have spare headphones handy and they work quite well.Note: If you are wandering around with your Kindle and using wifi zones, you will have to re-enter your home access codes every time. The system doesn't save your default codes. So keep them handy.Other than that - it's pretty good with books, pulp fiction publications, and even with TV shows and movies.The Amazon Prime membership is a terrific value - for everything.And the SquareTrade protection plan is totally worth the price!

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Oneil
Reviews.Content: A awsome product it does everything games ,music,books, the web i just love it i would recamend it to all my friends ,family and everyone its great

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 7in.
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: I got it for my husband. I got tired of him stealing mine. He never read a book since highschool. Now he reads all the time. He loves it and I don't have to share mine.

Reviews.Title: my Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: carol aulicino
Reviews.Content: I love it!! This thin, light weight  pad brings me such joy every day, all day that I'd be lost w/o it.  Thanks Amazon for helping me upgrade.  Your team's expertise and above all their patience made my life much better.  I made my neighbor , Stuart Reicher, but one.  They love too.  Thanks,  Carol Aulicino

Reviews.Title: toddler
Reviews.Author: KS Whaley
Reviews.Content: the kindle was purchased for use by a 14 month old to hopefully keep her busy during a 3 hour flight, she hasn't appeared too interested in it but I have enjoyed finding apps for her to play with

Reviews.Title: Great Refurbished Kindle
Reviews.Author: speedreader
Reviews.Content: I got my first Kindle three years ago as a gift. I have used it quite a lot and was upset when it went on the blink. I tried locally to get it repaired with no luck and ended up calling Amazon. They offered the refurbished unit for a very reasonable price and I couldn't be happier. Thanks Amazon. I really didn t want to pay a lot of money for a new one. The refurbished one is excellent and looks better than the one I had.

Reviews.Title: hated this product
Reviews.Author: Don Vaupel
Reviews.Content: This confused me, was NOT what I expected.....wish I had returned it...but gave it to a needy 12 year old instead!

Reviews.Title: They forgot that people who upgrade might still want to use this for reading.
Reviews.Author: GSMarlene
Reviews.Content: Really hate the lack of ability to categorize books. I complained and Amazon support recommended I purchase an app. Thought that was pretty stupid that I have to pay for something that ought to have been feature #1. It helps, but if I'd designed the app, it would function much better.It is heavy, switches to landscape way too easy. But it's got a gorgeous clear screen and I am beginning to enjoy other features. Still, categorizing books would have been such an obvious thing to do. Someone lost the ball.

Reviews.Title: Works great for me.....
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Eternal Student"
Reviews.Content: I waited two months before reviewing this product because I wanted to be sure. I have read a number of reviews for these KINDLEs and most have been positive while a  large number have been negative in the EXTREME!  I purchased two of these as school tablets for my children who attend on line school.  For our purposes they are WONDERFUL. The children can access their lesson with very little problem, answer questions, take tests all with very limited or zero help from me.  They work on their KINDLEs I work on my laptop, a win-win for all concerned. My ONLY problem is when they need to view something which requires FLASH,  they have to use my laptop. This may be owing to my lack of techie savvy.  But, I have a net book which they can use for that so again, minimal difficulty for us.  I love the price, $99.00 for  "computers" for little ones under the age of 10. We've had no charging problems,  the screens are perfect, I had a very minor hiccup with one of the devices, but that seemed to be "operator error"  :-). All in all I couldn't be more pleased!As an aside, I purchased a 1st Generation of the KINDLE Fire years ago and to this date it still works perfectly, I've had no problems with Netflix etc, however I AM looking at the HDX version, cooler graphics, longer battery life, maybe next year.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: K Robinson
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother since she loves reading books on her phone. So far she loves it and has downloaded a ton of books

Reviews.Title: Awesome price
Reviews.Author: Sharon A. Richmond "rsr815August"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband, I have 2 kindle's and he was always wanting one so I bought it for him and he loves it also.

Reviews.Title: Had to use warranty as Kindle wouldn't take a charge, it was so easy to get replacement and setup also easier than expected!
Reviews.Author: Anita T Wilding
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased to learn that my Kindle Warranty would replace my old Kindle when it no longer held a charge. The process was very easy and the setup of my replacement very easy, thank you!

Reviews.Title: They forgot that people who upgrade might still want to use this for reading.
Reviews.Author: GSMarlene
Reviews.Content: Really hate the lack of ability to categorize books. I complained and Amazon support recommended I purchase an app. Thought that was pretty stupid that I have to pay for something that ought to have been feature #1. It helps, but if I'd designed the app, it would function much better.It is heavy, switches to landscape way too easy. But it's got a gorgeous clear screen and I am beginning to enjoy other features. Still, categorizing books would have been such an obvious thing to do. Someone lost the ball.
