Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Eternal Student"
Reviews.Content: I waited two months before reviewing this product because I wanted to be sure. I have read a number of reviews for these KINDLEs and most have been positive while a  large number have been negative in the EXTREME!  I purchased two of these as school tablets for my children who attend on line school.  For our purposes they are WONDERFUL. The children can access their lesson with very little problem, answer questions, take tests all with very limited or zero help from me.  They work on their KINDLEs I work on my laptop, a win-win for all concerned. My ONLY problem is when they need to view something which requires FLASH,  they have to use my laptop. This may be owing to my lack of techie savvy.  But, I have a net book which they can use for that so again, minimal difficulty for us.  I love the price, $99.00 for  "computers" for little ones under the age of 10. We've had no charging problems,  the screens are perfect, I had a very minor hiccup with one of the devices, but that seemed to be "operator error"  :-). All in all I couldn't be more pleased!As an aside, I purchased a 1st Generation of the KINDLE Fire years ago and to this date it still works perfectly, I've had no problems with Netflix etc, however I AM looking at the HDX version, cooler graphics, longer battery life, maybe next year.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: K Robinson
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother since she loves reading books on her phone. So far she loves it and has downloaded a ton of books

Reviews.Title: Awesome price
Reviews.Author: Sharon A. Richmond "rsr815August"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband, I have 2 kindle's and he was always wanting one so I bought it for him and he loves it also.

Reviews.Title: Had to use warranty as Kindle wouldn't take a charge, it was so easy to get replacement and setup also easier than expected!
Reviews.Author: Anita T Wilding
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased to learn that my Kindle Warranty would replace my old Kindle when it no longer held a charge. The process was very easy and the setup of my replacement very easy, thank you!

Reviews.Title: great. customer service
Reviews.Author: Susan Waller
Reviews.Content: Well.done! They sent a replacement Kindle for one.I dropped in the bath and it was.refurbishedWith a glitch. They shipped another one right away.

Reviews.Title: It lived a good life.
Reviews.Author: Monica Cressman
Reviews.Content: I had this kindle for four years and it never let me down. But then again, this device was extremely laggy and and I had to shut it down every time it stopped. Another let down is that it stopped charging, even when plugged in. But did still read books and watched movies and never had problems with the wifi. However, I did occasionally have trouble with the touch screen not working. Thank you Amazon for making a wonderful device that held its own for four years. Sadly its life ended after I dropped it twice in school. The under screen cracked so the screen is all distorted, but it still powers on. I'm going to try to fix it and sell to to my mom, then I'm going to buy a Samsung Galaxy tab 4.

Reviews.Title: works great so far
Reviews.Author: kelly keelty
Reviews.Content: so far it works great,  I just hope it last longer than a 1.5years.  Unlike the last 2 rejects that have died on me.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: smegspug
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my nephew. he loves it,  he playsgames. uses it for face book,downloads books o red does shopping on the internent, banking. Great buy.

Reviews.Title: very good overall
Reviews.Author: Thnunn
Reviews.Content: All as advertised.  The kid option is super but still needs to be reviewed and monitored.  Overall I like it.

Reviews.Title: ITS OK
Reviews.Author: m frazier
Reviews.Content: hard to turn on &off;  doesn't compare to newer model which I lost  the selection process is not as easy to use

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire (2nd gen)
Reviews.Author: littleuno
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle Fire. Although I like it overall, the flash player needed for most videos is not supported on this KF which makes it useless at times. It works to surf the web, facebook and of course reading. Kindle needs to address the flash player option to make it a more versatile tablet.

Reviews.Title: Better than the Kindle fire HD
Reviews.Author: DW-501
Reviews.Content: Gave one of my sons my old, previous generation Kindle fire and bought this for my other son since I was 'trading up' for the Newer Kindle fire HD. Wish I would have kept my other Kindle. If your trying to decide between this one and the new HD, buy one of these, the HD crashes whenever the battery gets below 76%, the Kindle Fire previous Generation has never failed me and still works great for my son.

Reviews.Title: Frustrated
Reviews.Author: Constance
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my boyfriends birthday. After just a week the screen starting acting up and made it impossible for him to use any apps. I called support and the issue was not resolved. I'm really frustrated.

Reviews.Title: Kindle is a winner!
Reviews.Author: Valeria Washington
Reviews.Content: I had a 1st generation Kindle until few weeks ago, when it finally couldn't go on anymore. I replaced with this one and I fell in love with it all over again. It's compact, it's fast, great for reading, play small games and listen to music. Kindle is my best buddy!

Reviews.Title: Mom loved it
Reviews.Author: Verneisha Martin
Reviews.Content: I have the HD but thought my mom would love this version being new to technology this little tablet is the best and so easy to use

Reviews.Title: For readers on the go
Reviews.Author: betty ryan
Reviews.Content: For avid readers it is great.you can downloadbooks from the library at no cost and take it with you anywhere.just keep it charged

Reviews.Title: I  love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: DebA
Reviews.Content: Being a disabled senior, this is my social connection.  I love that I can  play games and e-mail with friends, search the web, pay bills, and many other things - all from the comfort of my bed and at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: Got a few of these, my kids both asked for them for b-days/ holidays etc... put the parental controls on and its great for a long ride, a rainy day or even to get them out of my hair ;) they can read, learn and have fun all at the same time

Reviews.Title: Better than New! Just kidding.
Reviews.Author: Jhonny Almeida
Reviews.Content: I think it's fair for the price.  I can't even tell what's refurbished about it to be honest.  It doesn't have the same nice HD as the newer ones but its reasonably priced. I mostly wanted a tablet device to read PDFs and this does the job well.  I mostly get my textbooks as PDFs and I didn't want to pay 200+ for a device.The one setback but not the reason I bought it is the resolution I can see the different between video quality, but that's mostly because I watch 1080p quality videos most of the time.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: A. Morales
Reviews.Content: My 5 year old Son loves his Kindle. ...Great for on the go. Cloud storage helps with only having 8gb.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: earline j. ledoux
Reviews.Content: My special needs daughter loves this tablet. She had another way more expencive one but it broke. This one is more user friendly for her and it does everything she wanted and so much more. so thankful we gave it a try. This is our 4th Kindle and we are all hooked on them.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindles
Reviews.Author: LiLi
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindles, I have purchased 3. The only dislike I have is about 3-6 months I have had trouble with them just stop working, for no apparent reason. The great thing to this is Amazon, with no hesitation has replaced all that I have had trouble with. Amazon has amazing customer service. Yes I would purchase Kindles again, my mother and children love them. Way to go Amazon.

Reviews.Title: I wouldn't want to be without my Kindle Fire.
Reviews.Author: jh
Reviews.Content: I really use my Kindle all the time. When I recently had problems with it and contacted Amazon, they were very, very helpful in resolving my problems very quickly.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: victoria reeves
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire. It's easy to use. The only thing I dont like is my first one got stolen and Amazon had know way to track it or stop someone from using it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE my new kindle
Reviews.Author: Afton J. Martin "Afton"
Reviews.Content: After problems with my old device, I was sent this replacement kindle and could not be happier! It works great, holds a good charge, and is fun to use!

Reviews.Title: My new kindle
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: I love my new kindle but already having some issues with it. The cable or the connection to charge the kindle is beginning to malfunction.  Sometimes I need to re plug several times.  However I have told many friends and family how much I love it.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: ddjjr
Reviews.Content: Very similar to the old kindle fire I had.  Easy to use. Nice bright display and easy to read in the dark.

Reviews.Title: Just right for that "extra" device
Reviews.Author: K. E. Morris "songbird"
Reviews.Content: It may not be the lightest, or the fastest, or the biggest, but this product is just perfect for one who wants to mainly read books and check emails, facebook, etc. as the "second" device.  I look forward to seeing what else my Kindle Fire can and will do for me.  I appreciated finding a refurbished one and saving some bucks!

Reviews.Title: I like how it shows on the bottom of the page ...
Reviews.Author: Barbara B.
Reviews.Content: The refurbished Kindle Fire 7" definitely has some improvements compared to my 2 year old one that I returned to Amazon.  I like how it shows on the bottom of the page what percent of the novel has been read and the page number, and location.  I rated it 3 stars for two reasons -  the first being battery life.  I still do not feel that the battery life has improved much more than the one I returned.  I  hardly have anything downloaded - only a solitaire game and a Sudoku game. I use the Kindle mostly for reading, but find I have to charge it about every second day - and that's from reading maybe a total of 6 hours.  The other thing I'm not sold on is the charging cord is a USB cord.  My original Kindle's cord was a regular plug in adapter.

Reviews.Title: perfect...not too much
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Perfect for our needs....web, videos, games, apps, everything kids these days need to help in school. I like that there is no camera...stupid selfies.

Reviews.Title: AMAZON KINDLE REFURBISHED
Reviews.Author: babygirl
Reviews.Content: I really don't know what to say....I purchased this as a birthday gift for my 6 year old. Her birthday hasn't arrived yet.But the package was nice and the kindle looked to be in pretty good shape. Only time will tell.

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my kindle even though I wish I had it with internet when I go outside not all places has free Wi-Fi I am truly enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!!
Reviews.Author: laura pineda
Reviews.Content: Just love it!!!perfect for my 2 year old! The price awesome!!! Is just what I need to down load a couple of showsofmickey mouse club house!!!!

Reviews.Title: Happy with Amazon
Reviews.Author: Willa J. Thompson
Reviews.Content: So far I am very happy with my new Kindle.  The only thing I wish was better is the speed.  I think my original Kindle was faster.  Amazon was great to deal with.  They handled my problem quickly and pleasantly.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished and a great price
Reviews.Author: Diane Mayfield "the Mayfield's"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire works as well as new.  We are an older couple so we are not up with the technology of the new stuff an the Kindle has been easy to use.  Just like NEW.

Reviews.Title: Just like new
Reviews.Author: J. Toney "Chair Man"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace one that came up missing.  Works just as good as new.  Very happy with this refurbished model.

Reviews.Title: Seems just like a new one
Reviews.Author: R. W. Fyfe
Reviews.Content: Couldn't tell it was a refurbished Kindle if you hadn't told me. I could tell it wasn't mine as I had to reload all my wife's games on it.  No problems there.  It is being put to good use as she has to spend a good deal of time in bed due to pain and she keeps both her refurbished one and mine working almost constantly, either in use or recharging.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle!
Reviews.Author: L. HAUGE
Reviews.Content: Great piece of technology! Love all the things I can do on this Kindle. Now I really love to read.

Reviews.Title: cannot watch videoos
Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: does not have flash player and will not let me download it-says I do not have  the proper set-up do not feel like returning it I play games and read---disappointed also skips when touching screen should have bought new

Reviews.Title: cannot watch videoos
Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: does not have flash player and will not let me download it-says I do not have  the proper set-up do not feel like returning it I play games and read---disappointed also skips when touching screen should have bought new

Reviews.Title: refurbished kinle
Reviews.Author: Carla M Shipman
Reviews.Content: Came on time works great looks brand new! My mom is loving it. Couldn't beat the price. Was nervous ordering refurbished but not anymore.

Reviews.Title: It jumps several pages
Reviews.Author: Monica Tichauer
Reviews.Content: Sometimes it jumps several pages although I just tapped it once.  Sometimes windows open in the middle of the page that I didn't want or ask for.The ON button is too small.

Reviews.Title: very easy to use
Reviews.Author: maureen sayles
Reviews.Content: Had a different brand that died in three months and was constantly giving me access problems.  The kindle was as easy as turn it and read.  No problems accessing my books or web searching.  Very happy.

Reviews.Title: Kind of hard to navigate
Reviews.Author: Angela W.
Reviews.Content: I had an Ipad previously.  Had to give it up for my son to use, so got this instead since I mainly wanted to read and occasionally watch Netflix or surf the web.  Miss the Ipad!!  this is not a good web surfer or movie viewer. pretty much only read on it.  So, should have gotten another Ipad or a Kindle Reader only

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I wanted something simple and basic for a first time tablet user and I am very safisfied with this purchase.  Would recommend this to beginners.  It's easy to use and I love the screen resolution.

Reviews.Title: You can't go wrong with Kindle!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Tito M.
Reviews.Content: My kid love it, it's the third Kindle in our family. Simple and stable for gaming, reading, emails, internet, video and music. App store is very good also.

Reviews.Title: DOA - Dead on Arrival
Reviews.Author: Barry Rutherford
Reviews.Content: I had to return it.  I thought refurbished meant it was fixed and tested before being resold.  I think this unit was returned and resold without anyone doing anything to it. Had anyone tested it they would have noticed it didn't work.

Reviews.Title: It does not have a camera and I have foreign ...
Reviews.Author: Etta D. Jackson "Etta D. Jackson"
Reviews.Content: It does not have a camera and I have  foreign language app store I can't seem to change. Can't connect to WiFi in a foreign country.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire is great!
Reviews.Author: Maria Neren Carlton
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire. For me the size is just right, and does everything I need. I can read books or play games or watch my Netflix.

Reviews.Title: Very go service from amazon
Reviews.Author: Kevin morales Acevedo
Reviews.Content: Very good kindle fire 2nd gen works perfect faster than my first kindle fire.  thank you very much for your services

Reviews.Title: Dummy
Reviews.Author: westernreality
Reviews.Content: I require lots of help to make my Kindle Fire work, but enjoy being able to read with the LARGE print.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: We love the Fire
Reviews.Author: David Harvey
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife. She likes the display, but is not a tech-savy individual and has not ordered anything yet. We are working to get her on the internet as I am typing.  I like the Fire better than the old kindle which I use.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: leah randall
Reviews.Content: I love reading on the Kindle. I have gotten a lot of free books for it that were really surprisingly good. I can play games on it and listen to music while I sit out side with it. My husband even uses it to download his sermons and preach from.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: L Hudman
Reviews.Content: I am still having touch-screen issues.  This replacement I received seems to be better than the one I returned but still not like how the 1st one was brand new

Reviews.Title: Perfect for grandchildren
Reviews.Author: Karen Hawkins
Reviews.Content: This item was purchased for my grandchild. It is perfect. He enjoys his time on it and the games for his age are just right.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Tatam Nicole Hancock
Reviews.Content: This is great for reading and listening to music. So if that's all you plan to use it for, its a great investment.Just wish they had more case options to choose from as wellAll and all I got my use for it. But if you're wanting something more as an iPad I wouldn't suggest this product for you.

Reviews.Title: great birthday present!!
Reviews.Author: Patricia b
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire Previous Generation for my grand daughter for her birthday. Even though she is only four she is a book , game, and movie buff..... she absolutely loves it.  She has been on my kindle for over a year, so she can maneuver it inside and out with no problem... a perfect educational birthday present for a precious little girl. And the sales price was great!!!!!

Reviews.Title: I'll only buy Certified Refurbished.
Reviews.Author: SuperDad "SuperDad"
Reviews.Content: After the first two died in a year I knew I had to have Certified Refurbished. Previously I had to deal with the shippers to return and get a refund but now I just deal with Amazon. The first on was bad with problems on the touch screen but Amazon sent me another quick. If the first one had worked I would have given it 5 stars. I do like working with Amazon as they stand behind the waranty.

Reviews.Title: Thank you Kindle
Reviews.Author: Jodie Watt
Reviews.Content: Do not switch from white cord to black cord and back again. The black micro USB fits tighter in the hole, the hole gets used to that nice tight fit, then you put the white one in, it charges, then the black chargers goes in, back and forth… Next thing you know the female port in the kindle fire got stretched out b/c we use whatever cord is handy, black, white, just charge it, but here's the rub; you go back and forth white/black too much the female end gets loose, so back to my subject…Thank you Kindle! I have had to return my 2 Kindle Fires like 4 or 5 times, for different reasons (mostly having to do with charging), but EVERT SIGLE TIME those wonderful people take the back (I know the warranty has to be long gone) and they send out new/refurbished Kindle Fires (whatever). I am alive today because they keep saving me and sending new ones when the natives (age 4 & 7) start losing their freaking minds, so this is my heartfelt thanks to Kindle Fire and Amazon Prime. Seriously, thanks for helping me keep my sanity  (kids are crazy no one tells you that or our species would die out). I love you guys, thanks for always being there, and helping while my kids are screaming bloody murder in the background.

Reviews.Title: A gift for Me.
Reviews.Author: Joanmarie Sarich "Book Lover"
Reviews.Content: Best gift I ever gave myself.  No complaints ~ love all the features of an a Kindle Fire (especially the built in dictionary).

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: paula
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this Kindle Fire.  I have not had any complaints with this device. I would recommend this product to my family and friends

Reviews.Title: Fast delivery
Reviews.Author: Aderson R. Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife, she absolutely loves it. Wakes up with it in the morning does not put it down night. Not a gift,bought it because she needed it.

Reviews.Title: The best option
Reviews.Author: Dante
Reviews.Content: I am a formal reader since 15 years ago, my girlfriend bought as gift to me a Kindle fire 1st Gen 4 years ago, and literaly it is one of the better gifts I ever receive.Everyday I use it in any hour of the day, I never have problems with it, the light control and the text format options, are very useful and atractive.I know there is a lot of new tabs or e-readers with better specs, but being honest, If you want a tab for: using apps, listen music, watch movies, check social networks or organize your files in the memory, you can do it in KF, but If this is important to you, maybe you should check other options.If you want the Kindle Fire as an universal text reader, this is your better option, is easy, fast, economic, intuitive and the batery life is very good.

Reviews.Title: happy
Reviews.Author: cindy
Reviews.Content: i have always been happy with my kindles. and the consumer service is great.. Whenfaced with problems. they are very easy to uise

Reviews.Title: Can't put it down!
Reviews.Author: Mary Beth Bryant
Reviews.Content: I know it is not the newest model out there, but it does everything I want it to do.Am very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Web -  Not so much.
Reviews.Author: jim
Reviews.Content: Great for reading newspapers, playing games. Not good for E-mail or Facebook or anything on line.A step above the older Kindle reader.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Andrew Russell
Reviews.Content: I receive the kindle as a gift . It work well I recommend people to purchase one from this site  .  I must say thanks to my husband for giving me this great gift.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: tammy
Reviews.Content: very pleased.my son loves it. tons of free games and apps. my son spends hours a day on it!  great price. great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Gigi Miner "Author, Tarot Consultant"
Reviews.Content: I really couldn't afford a new, top-of-the-line Kindle.  I wanted one, but just couldn't swing it.  Then the refurbished showed up in my suggested items.  Yay!  I don't know what I'm missing as I don't even own a smart phone.  So for me, it's great.  I can read and I can play a game here or there.  Only issue is the batter drains steadily even when it's off.  I think it updates without telling you.I'm happy with it.  Charging is slow and you have to hook it to your computer (or buy an adapter, but like I said, I'm on a budget).  But I see no reason to buy anything else since this has been through the shop and works just fine.  I'm even taking it to a fair and will show off my artwork that I'm not bringing.  The pictures are nice and clear.

Reviews.Title: Not the battery life of my Kindle Fire Original
Reviews.Author: Corey B
Reviews.Content: I had the original Kindle Fire and it stopped charging so I got a new one...2nd generation.  I do not like that it has little advertisements on it and the battery life is less than half of the original.  It is fine, but not like the original.  Sad I was not able to get the original again.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Susie/Sam
Reviews.Content: This was my first Kindle Fire and I enjoyed reading books and playing games. I have now upgraded to Kindle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: problem with battery life
Reviews.Author: Eric Brooksby
Reviews.Content: I know I have had this for a while now.  However the battery life on it will not last more than 24 hours.  If I buy a book it never runs out of battery and I don't really want to replace this product every year.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Fire
Reviews.Author: Barb Christiansen
Reviews.Content: Person was very helpful.  I have noticed the battery life is a quarter of what mine was. I realize I paid half of what a new one cost but it means I can't read whenever I like. Just disappointing.

Reviews.Title: NOT CERTIFIED
Reviews.Author: Kimberly M. Chapin
Reviews.Content: This kindle arrived damaged. It gets extremely hot and has a very funny smell when charging. Then it doesn't stay on and just quits. The kindle was also missing a charger. It is impossible for this to have been "certified."

Reviews.Title: Great tool for my son
Reviews.Author: Michelle McCovey-Good
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my son to download required reading for his 6th grade class.  This has been a great tool and allowed for flowing into the next book without having to wait to trudge to a store to get a hard copy.

Reviews.Title: Great birthday gift
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: I gave it to my granddaughter for her 16th birthday and she loves it! She's already read 6 books and enjoys using all the social media.

Reviews.Title: Hope it Lasts.
Reviews.Author: debbie
Reviews.Content: The service department at Amazon is AMAZING!  They are very helpful. This Kindle Fire is working great. I can play puzzles for 3 hours before I need to charge it.  Reading a book I can be okay for close to 5 hours before charging. So far I am very happy.The person who helped me at Amazon was named Mel, and I sincerely want to thank him for his patience with me.  Debbie Rusk

Reviews.Title: A Favorite of Mine
Reviews.Author: jesse molina
Reviews.Content: All the family can enjoy this great item, i use this more than my ipad. this is my second version and plan on getting the newest ones.

Reviews.Title: Everything I want and more
Reviews.Author: Lianakimble
Reviews.Content: I am writing this review because i was skeptical about purchasing kindle based off others reviews. I went on and got one because you cant bet this price. It is everything i wanted plus more. It is true the battery life goes kinda fast but thats what chargers are for. Most chargers can charge kindle but you need proper cord so it charge fast and doesnt damage it. Reading on this fire is great. I am very satisfied with my purchase. Plus it came early!!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: DEBORAH BRUNER "DEBI"
Reviews.Content: excellent refurbished kindle fire, arrived almost immediately, perfect condition, wrapped for shipping and arrived in perfect condition.  This was a gift for a grand daughter, and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle
Reviews.Author: sgas
Reviews.Content: I have used this kindle since Christmas and found this product to be easy to use and enjoyed it very much.  I would recommend this product to anyone thinking of buying one it is worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Kindle WOW!
Reviews.Author: San
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is fantastic, I love it. Thats all I do is read, my most favorite ling. I don't knoe what I did before my kindle. It's really great, I recomend it to anyone who wears glasses and reads alot.Won't use anything else.San

Reviews.Title: I like better than starting up my computer every time I need to check something on the web.
Reviews.Author: jskubitz
Reviews.Content: Very handy on trips and around the house. I get annoyed with all the DIY shows my husband insists on watching at night to it is fun to lay back and watch "the tube" on my kindle.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Veganlove
Reviews.Content: Finally the kindle as come out with a tablet that allows so much more other than just reading. I love all the previous kindles but my only problem was that when I got bored of reading I had no other option. The kindle Fire provides a variety of options. I am not one to read 24/7 so with this I can alternate with music and entertaining apps like Netflix. It was a purchase worth buying again.

Reviews.Title: Love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Sammy Hammett
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire. I read a lot and it is perfect. Amazon has a great selection of books at fabulous prices. My expectations are always met.

Reviews.Title: Not Impressed
Reviews.Author: cfreeman
Reviews.Content: It freezes alot and I can't find my downloads .I liked my old one better .I will get use to it I guess if it would just quit freezing up on me.

Reviews.Title: 2nd Kindle
Reviews.Author: Cindy Sharbonda
Reviews.Content: i would never buy another kindle or refer anyone to buy one. fix the gliches. not worth the money. headaches.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful display
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Wordsmith"
Reviews.Content: Kindle display is awesome.  i like the fact that it is compact and light.  As a senior citizen , I would recommend this to all of my senior citizen friends.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Judy Born
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Didn't come with a manual, but my tech savey granddaughter showed me how to get started. Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: replacement Kindle
Reviews.Author: K. Smith
Reviews.Content: My old Kindle would not reboot and this is a replacement under warranty, it works fine and I appreciate Amazon's support of their product.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7", LCD Display, WI-FI, 8 GB
Reviews.Author: vsilhavy
Reviews.Content: I rated this Kindle a 5 star as it is exactly as I was looking for.  It works great and does what I  need it to.  I do need to add Adobe Flash Player.  When I try to add it I am asked questions I am not sure how to answer.  I will call Amazon for help on adding this as Amazon is always quite helpful.  I would and have recommended this product.

Reviews.Title: Amazing! I love my new Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Jerrye Y. Almond
Reviews.Content: On the go, I have everything at my fingertips!  I love the fact that I can check my e-mails, listen to music, download and read books, down load new apps for games and utilities, get the news, weather, etc. all on my Kindle Fire.  I literally take it everywhere and it fits right into my bag.

Reviews.Title: Very good replacement
Reviews.Author: William Cox-negron "Williamcn"
Reviews.Content: Bought this Kindle for my son, who's previous unit's screen shattered after being dropped. The savings compared to a new unit are very good. It looks and works like a new Kindle. Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal !!
Reviews.Author: t49y
Reviews.Content: A Really Fantastic Deal ! A Best Going Away Gift ! All Updated ! Almost Kept It ! Give My Old Kindle ! Worth Every Penny ! Fascinating To Watch Top Kindle Pros ! A Security Blanket Without The Thumb Sucking ! No Frustration Here ! Just Pure Joy ! Thanks Amazon ! A Pleaser ! The Best ! Much Appreciated !

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: steven s. scarafile
Reviews.Content: Would like if there was a usb port and a input to add a keyboard, kindle is nice but if I had to do it again,would go with Ipad I think

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: THERESE M BURTON
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and I take it everywhere.  Grandkids love all the games and easy of use. Recommend this to anyone who wants a tablet on the go.

Reviews.Title: Good so far.
Reviews.Author: phcfamily
Reviews.Content: I had some problems with the previous refurbished Kindle, and Amazon was great about replacing it. So far so good.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Goodness2014
Reviews.Content: Wish it had more apps and were more compatible with . Gmail and other Google products.  Great reader love it.

Reviews.Title: It died
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "traveler"
Reviews.Content: The product is less than two years old and it will no longer hold a charge.  I understand that it is out of warranty, but it appears that this is a common problem.  When I contacted Amazon, I was offered was a refurbished version of this model for $63.  That did not seem like a very good deal considering I was only able to use the product, for which I paid $199, for less than two years.  I would hesitate to buy another Kindle under these circumstances.

Reviews.Title: love it.
Reviews.Author: runaroundsue
Reviews.Content: for reading, facebooking, gaming, and some web surfing.  I  just love my kindle.  Bought one for my daughter and she loves it too.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Diane Carnes
Reviews.Content: The hand held instrument was described very precisely but it did not come with a guide/instructions to operate it.  For the compute il-literate and older folk it would have helped.  When I called for help they couldn't even walk me through the process over the phone.  Next time I might purchase a book to operate one first before I actually purchase it.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: heidi meno
Reviews.Content: Love the Kindle for reading and playing games. When I want to search the internet I switch to my ipad but that's personal preference, the Kindle is smaller print on web searches.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: elizabeth smail
Reviews.Content: Just what I needed to replace my Windows XP Mini laptop which I used for travel. This was a Great Deal.

Reviews.Title: love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Valerie Ulee
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle because im able to take my class work with me where ever i go.Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: I am pleased
Reviews.Author: sandra horne
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my Kindle. I was very pleased with the first one until I had the charging problem

Reviews.Title: Only good for a year, then you`re out of luck.
Reviews.Author: May
Reviews.Content: I got the kindle fire as a gift and I love it. I just can't afford to replace it every year. It was ordered in November of 2012 and given to me as a Christmas gift. I had to replace it (no cost at the time) in February of 2013 because it wouldn't  maintain a charge and had to constantly be hooked to the wall charger. Now in April of 2014 I'm having the same issue. When I contacted customer service I  was told that the warranty had expired and all they could offer was a new or refurbished kindle at a "reduced" cost. Don't waste your money on these, they aren't worth the hassle.

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it.  Now I have to order another one. Very handy for the little things she's interested in like, Facebook and Pandora
Reviews.Author: Jeffri K. Norat
Reviews.Content: We love the customer service that came with the Kindle Fire.  When we called we spoke to an actual human.  No torturous computer voice menu. I can't say enough about it.  The Kindle device is great but the support that comes with it sold me.

Reviews.Title: Just love it!
Reviews.Author: dalmar6677
Reviews.Content: We love our Kindles.  Display is amazing and the free books (I have purchased also) are great.  Kids love it and it keeps them occupied.  Only problem I see is the part where charger goes into is defective.  Please fix this.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Scott Smith
Reviews.Content: Great price and works awesome.  I was skeptical at first buying a refurbished one but it was worth the money!  Internet, music, photos, books, documents!!!  What else could you ask for!!! Love it

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with experience.
Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: This was my first time ordering anything from Amazon and I must say it was a very pleasant experience. Not only was it easy, the items were on time and packaged well. They arrived safe and were exactly what I wanted. I will certainly recomend Amazon to my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Yes.
Reviews.Author: Monica Mayrinck Wanderley
Reviews.Content: Very good. We love the kindle Fire. Because we can download some boos. We like  to because e can download free games also. Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great price and tablet
Reviews.Author: lisab
Reviews.Content: Great first tablet, allowing me to still get on the web, check emails, and even play a game or two while the kids have my laptop is use.  Glad I made the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Have had some issues but like the product
Reviews.Author: sarah smart
Reviews.Content: This kindle seems to be working great but I gave it 4 stars because it's the fourth time we have had to replace it.  The first one, bought new, had charging issues.  We got that one replaced and the rest (all refurbished replacements) have had charging or screen issues that couldn't be fixed without replacing.  Hoping this continues to work!

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire previous Generation
Reviews.Author: Anthony Tronieri
Reviews.Content: The Kindle fire is my Wife's favorite. It arrives in super time & works right out of the box!! My Grand Children also have a kindle'd also!! I have purchased 7 of them in the last two years. One of them however,will not take a charge anymore. It is 2 years old and way out of it's warranty. I purchased a "new" one to replace it about 2 months ago. Hey 6 out of seven is a GREAT RATE!!!!  I will continue to buy from you in the future as well as recommend you to mt friends!!!

Reviews.Title: Rating
Reviews.Author: Patricia Alger
Reviews.Content: I choose the rating because I have not had any problems with my Kindle Fire 7" Display, Wi-Fi, 8 GB at all. I love it!!

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: marilyn rodriguez
Reviews.Content: This is my second kindle, which l like what l can do with it. I am still experiencing  upon turning on it freezes a lot and it worries me, this is why l have a second kindle. I hope it doesn't happen again.

Reviews.Title: Refurb?  Who can tell?
Reviews.Author: Kaitlyn Tuey
Reviews.Content: My daughter was heartbroken when her first Kindle stopped working and I was afraid I would have to replace it with a cheaper tablet.  Luckily I talked to Amazon support first and they made us a great deal on the refurb!  Same great quality product, plus a mended heart!  Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Replacement of defective kindle
Reviews.Author: Belinda
Reviews.Content: The kindle was bought as a Christmas gift.  I was disappointed when the first one's battery wouldn't keep a charge and then wouldn't charge at all. I was amazed how patient your customer service employees were and that you replaced the product immediately.  Thank you, you made it a much less stressful experience from starting with your staff ( customer service), right down to returning the defective kindle I started with.  I love my kindle. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great kindle!! But be home when its being delivered
Reviews.Author: Serena Hodge
Reviews.Content: the kindle is great. the only thing i dont like about it is how when they delivered it they left it outsidd in a KINDLE BOX  for All to see and someone to steal!

Reviews.Title: not even 8g's of memorey
Reviews.Author: Uriel Saenz
Reviews.Content: when I received it, it barley had 4gs of memory out of the supposedly 8gs. other than that the tablet is great.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this product
Reviews.Author: Heather Smith
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 3 year old and she loves it. It is easy for her to use and has great sound and picture.

Reviews.Title: Love my kindle
Reviews.Author: LMS
Reviews.Content: It is exactly what I was hoping for.  I realize my old one was struggling with battery issues .  It is a lot faster than my previous one.

Reviews.Title: Good Table for a Child
Reviews.Author: Turningleaf
Reviews.Content: It does what it needs to do.  Customer Service is fantastic! Definitely buy the extended warranty protection against accidents.  I really wish that it has expandable memory.  It's been difficult to locate a protective case for it.  We found a feaux leather portfolio style case, but I would love to find a rubber bumper style protection case for it.

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Krystal Nuñez
Reviews.Content: It is very amazing and does the same as those high expensive ones. Will NJ to change it for anything else.

Reviews.Title: not as good as the older models
Reviews.Author: dandtelyons
Reviews.Content: I am very grateful to Amazon for replacing my defective Kindle Fire even though it was past the warranty date - thank you!Now as to the newer Kindle I received: I don't care for the home page display (I can't see my favorite as easily as before); it shuts off with no warning at all and the display still shows 50%+ battery; I had an app and was playing it and then it was completely gone and I can't get it to download again.I do, however, like the bigger keyboard and it powers on faster than the first one I had.

Reviews.Title: It is really slow,
Reviews.Author: Celeste Vargas
Reviews.Content: I think this Kindle needs to get updated it moves really slow, not too happy with it at all.I wish it would just compensate for all the times i have had ti return it and jjuts give us a New Kidl touch,

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Sandy L. Neal
Reviews.Content: Son loves it!!!! My 22 year old son always borrowed mine especially when he went to class (college) , so i decided he needed one of his own.  Best thing I did!!!!

Reviews.Title: We Love Our Kindles
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This was the 3rd refurb Kindle Fire that we have bought. Buying it for teenagers. Great price! Great buy. Will buy again.

Reviews.Title: New replacement
Reviews.Author: John R. Hall
Reviews.Content: I like it. This is a free replacement for one that stopped working. Thank you to Kindle Fire "help" !!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Carleen A. French
Reviews.Content: So far I love it. I'm sure that I haven't learned all that it can do. Finding new things all the time.

Reviews.Title: Works Okay But There Are Issues
Reviews.Author: Rita
Reviews.Content: First, the good news. I'm happy to see that a comma has been placed so prominently on the keyboard. It was always a struggle trying to find it on my old Kindle. And so far the device has been working well, though the battery life seems much shorter than my previous one. Now the bad news. There is no volume control. I have to regulate sound through Audible. It's so bizarre. I cannot understand why something so basic has been tampered with. I find it extremely annoying. Also, the Silk thing doesn't work for me. My old Kindle showed my favorite sites in a more accessible way. My biggest disappointment has been that the new Scrabble app has been so butchered it is unplayable. It freezes before I can even finish a game. I LOVE Scrabble and I loved the previous version on my old Kindle. This new supposed "upgrade" is badly designed and a huge waste of time. Amazon, please please please make available the old, far-superior version.

Reviews.Title: great for the money
Reviews.Author: Chris Bertram
Reviews.Content: The kindle was a great present for my wife she love's it. Well worth the money i will definitely get another for me.

Reviews.Title: It's good but not great
Reviews.Author: Lana Upton
Reviews.Content: The battery doesn't hold a charge.I can have it fully charged and not even use it and the battery goes dead in a days time. Cosmetically it looks great and works great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent job!
Reviews.Author: LYNN IN TEXAS
Reviews.Content: The refurbished Kindle is better than new.  The screen is sharper and the recharging dock is smooth and quick.  Excellent job.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: love the price amazon had for it and i also received a coupon so that was a plus i purchased this for my grandson and he loves it.

Reviews.Title: Mommy, preteen,  and toddler use
Reviews.Author: misty schuitema
Reviews.Content: I love my fire! I just wish that the toddler games had more of a variety that are full length and free. My toddler loves it though.she can watch her favorite shows on it.  My older daughter also got one and enjoys it as well. She puts all her games on it to get them off her phone.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished is not the greatest
Reviews.Author: highpriestess77
Reviews.Content: My original Kindle Fire stopped charging so I got a good deal on a refurbished model but ever since I got it, it hasn't worked like a new kindle. It seizes up sometimes and loses connection often. Just not what I expected. I should have bought new...but when I bought my kindle new it only lasted a year before I started having problems.

Reviews.Title: Super Happy with my new Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Marissa Wilmot
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love my Kindle! I love being able to ebooks rather than buying the actual book and having to find a spot for it!My kids have also loaded books onto it.. love the free books!!

Reviews.Title: OKAY
Reviews.Author: sherifat
Reviews.Content: i like it .one can't ask for anything better.but i wished it had a camera i would have loved it better.

Reviews.Title: EXACTLY LIKE NEW
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: Can't tell that this Kindle Fire isn't brand new and it has a warrantee just like a new one does.  My husband LOVES it.

Reviews.Title: Certified Refurbished Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Lyle Henkenmeier
Reviews.Content: So far - so good.  I just wish that there had been some way to transfer all my games without having to start over.

Reviews.Title: Great job Amazon
Reviews.Author: Dawn Leming
Reviews.Content: yes very much so, love my kindle, easy to use, great screen, no camera but thats alright, very satisfied.  Amazon is so much better than Nomorerack...they are the worse place in the world to shop.

Reviews.Title: Second generation Kindle review
Reviews.Author: J. Hartzel
Reviews.Content: I am happy with the replacement you sent.  The only issue with it is minor....at least until something else shows up!  When I type a contraction such as "wouldn't", it will type it as "wouldn't't"...double 't.  That's sort of weird!  Otherwise, I have no complaints.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: works great!!
Reviews.Author: wendy and ken
Reviews.Content: works better than new. Amazon rep. was great help while going thru the process of getting the old kindle replaced

Reviews.Title: 2nd replacement works fine
Reviews.Author: Irene Matthess
Reviews.Content: I ordered this when my First Generation Kindle would not charge...the first replacement had to be returned...second replacement is fine

Reviews.Title: love it.........
Reviews.Author: Tiffany drake
Reviews.Content: It's 100 times better than the old one. Thw old one took forever to charge and then it just stopped charging.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Rosalind King VanWright
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son and granddaughter for Christmas and they loves them.  They play with it all the time.

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed...
Reviews.Author: twistedsoul
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle. I was very impressed with all it does. Its like having a full size computer in a small compact  box. I would recommend it to someone who is thinking  of getting a computer but who is on a limited budget. I got a refurbished one and I havent had any problems with it and saved ALOT of money. Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This was received just as was expected, although the updated interface is still taking some getting used to.  Great deal, too, as my 1st gen Kindle had a bad plug-in. Amazon replaced for a fraction of the cost to purchase a new one...even though I was out of warranty! Fantastic1

Reviews.Title: Worst battery life ever
Reviews.Author: Dr. C. Nash
Reviews.Content: The minute you turn the Fire on you are down to 80 percent on the battery and it rapidly discharges from there.  About 5-6 hours of use is all I can get out of it.  It makes reading a chore and the silly thing is heavier than any other Kindle I have.  The Paperwhite and the older keyboard models are a much better buy than the Fire.

Reviews.Title: Many great options
Reviews.Author: Prissy
Reviews.Content: My first Kindle had some things that caused me to use more time to get to thing, but the kindle Fire 7 cleared up those problems and is much easier to use.

Reviews.Title: refurbished kindle
Reviews.Author: Elana Preece
Reviews.Content: Works great! Purchased a refurbished kindle from another web site, after a month it wouldn't even charge. The people we purchased it from wouldn't even respond. Learned a lesson always buy from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: TxRose
Reviews.Content: Works like a charm. Very pleased with the service I received in finding a replacement for my 'non working' Kindle Fire.  Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: From 8-88, a piece if cake
Reviews.Author: Letitia C.
Reviews.Content: Purchased for an 80 year old who had no technology experience.  She's reading magazinse, books, watching movies and emails too. She loves it!

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE, USUALLY
Reviews.Author: Margaret  Steinheimer
Reviews.Content: Good, unless you are in daylight.  Then I can't see a thing.  This is a big problem as it seems to happen often.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: it keeps clutching when I try to chat
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle. It dose every thing I need it to.great for reading every where.I always have it and it's great for letting my  1 year old play games.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: D. Merchant
Reviews.Content: I am so thrilled with my refurbished Kindle. My first Kindle finally bit the dust and this is a replacement. Easy to use, easier to read. I love it. My only wish is that the battery lasted a little longer.

Reviews.Title: too heavy!
Reviews.Author: Nicole Glasser
Reviews.Content: I like the original Kindle better.  It is lighter and the battery lasts way longer than the kindle fire does.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Kathleen M. Kusel "goldfish-still swimming"
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift to a friend who is a writer.  She told me she loves the Kindle and uses it often

Reviews.Title: More than you expect
Reviews.Author: Kevin josephson
Reviews.Content: The Fire isn't as polished as an I-Pad however I cannot ever see paying a premium to get an I-Pad. The Fire does 95% of what an I-Pad does at half or less the price. A total winner.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Babs
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire for my grandchildren to keep them off my computer and it really help to keep them busy and off my computer.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Joyce Moak
Reviews.Content: the upgrade to the kindle fire from the original kindle is disappointing.  The battery has a short life, the screen is impossible to read outdoors.  These are the two things I enjoyed most about my first Kindle

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Harry W. Hoffman Jr.
Reviews.Content: This was a great exchange and the Kindle works fine, Thanks much. I really appreciated the fine service I received from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: refurbished kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Mary D.Dieker
Reviews.Content: It takes forever for my e-mails to open.  I think something is wrong with it.  The previous one was much faster and better. Perhaps you should send me a new we one. Not happy with the performance.

Reviews.Title: gift for my sister
Reviews.Author: Katie Kroenlein Hubler
Reviews.Content: I think she loves it :) it was fabulous to be able to get one reasonably priced that has a bit of a warrantee :)

Reviews.Title: Comments
Reviews.Author: passwater
Reviews.Content: The Kindle itself works fine it just gets really hot really fast.  I am concerned about its longevity but it came with a one year warranty so I am hoping if this continues to be an issue I can correct it before the warranty runs out.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire - Refurbished
Reviews.Author: Carolyn C. Jones
Reviews.Content: Love my refurbished Kindle Fire and hope to have it for years! It's very easy to maneuver around and order books. Love the display - very clear and easy to read.

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: genette
Reviews.Content: First time with owning a e-book reader...love it...so much easier to handle than a paperback.  well balanced and not heavy...love the vocab look up...I know its an original but I can't think of what else I need....love the amazon prime offer with it.  saved so much in shipping and still reading free books....not to mention liking the amazon Netflix....may get rid of Netflix.  no issues with refrib...purchase one for the whole family...may get more for that price.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished may not be the way to go
Reviews.Author: terrie
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because after using the refurbished for about 3 weeks, today will be the second time I call it in for the "lock" you slide to open it, is frozen, again. I called yesterday and the kindle folks worked through it and got it working. Today after charging it, I have the same problem. I can't open it. The Kindle Support group customer service was great though - worked hard and fast to help me, I just think I have a crummy refurbished.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE
Reviews.Author: Shadow Hunter
Reviews.Content: THIS WAS A CHRISTMAS PRESENT FOR MY WIFE--SHE HAS  HAD  A LOT OF TROUBLE CONNECTING IT TO THE INTERNET-DOWNLOADING BOOKS HAS BEEN A CHALLENGE (FRUSTRATING)

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: LaWanda
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire, with the exception of the Special Offers... there's too much interference, especially in the games.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Brenda Dormstetter
Reviews.Content: The unit is acceptable. However, I still am not satisfied with Amazon.  I had the previous Kiindle Fire repaired for $20.  Amazon should spend more time on customer satisfaction with simple repairs vs a throw away and buy an new machine.  We generate too much electronic waste in this country and Amazon is a big contributer.Don Dormstetter for Brenda

Reviews.Title: battery
Reviews.Author: Terri
Reviews.Content: This kindle might have a bad battery.  I am waiting a few more days to try and verify this.  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Disappointed and I LOVED my first Kindle.
Reviews.Author: B. Kraft "B. Kraft"
Reviews.Content: This comes with a USB charger and not a wall charger.  Completely impractical.  Almost useless.  Plugged into my laptop for 2 hours and was at 9%.  An electronic device that is meant to be portable and good for traveling should come with a standard wall charger.  Period.  I have raved about the Kindle Fire for over 2 years.  There are so many wonderful reasons to own one. Their customer service has been very good, but this issue is disappointing and frustrating and Amazon should rethink it.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Susz G
Reviews.Content: I have thoroughly enjoyed this device.  It is easy to use and just the right size for travel, waiting for appointments and before sleep.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 2nd generation
Reviews.Author: sobekath
Reviews.Content: I love, love my kindle fire! Play Scramble, WWF & other word games. Plus, like to spend time reading favorite books while enjoying my latte at Starbucks.

Reviews.Title: Present
Reviews.Author: julianna daly
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my granddaughter and she has not put it down.  She loves the games as well as being able to message with her friends.  This is a really good price for anyone just starting out on a tablet.  She can do a lot of things on this even some of her school reading and keeping notes.

Reviews.Title: Rating
Reviews.Author: beverly smith
Reviews.Content: Great product. I enjoy having a kindle. The product works fine. I had problems with downloading the books, but tech support did an awesome job with solving the problems.

Reviews.Title: It is fun

Reviews.Content: However, you cannot read books in the sun.  You cannot see the screen as you can with the original Kindle.

Reviews.Content: when I sent back the old one, I had to send the charger with it.....when you sent this one to me, you only sent the wire and not the plug which I thought was wrong.  these plugs cost $20 in the stores and I felt I should have received this device.  Also the kindle feels hot on the bottom after awhile. if I have to purchase the plug with what I spent on the kindle, I could have gotten a new one

Reviews.Content: I primarily use mine to download my crochet patterns so that I can follow the patterns without having a piece of paper that I have to keep track of.  I have learned to name the patterns by name as well as the number when downloading so that they are easier to find.  By loading to the cloud they are easy to use at my computer or on this device.  Easy to read and I can make notes on the area that I am working on for future reference.

Reviews.Title: not shure what to put here

Reviews.Content: Does what I need easy to use,but weel see if the charger holds up....only problem with the previously owned ones

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire

Reviews.Content: Awesome product, I use it everyday and I couldn't be happier with it!  The small size makes great for traveling!

Reviews.Title: The best !

Reviews.Content: Boy oh boy this refurbished kindle works great , I love it ! Thank you also for your speedy delivery . I just love my Kindle fire .

Reviews.Title: All in one

Reviews.Content: Love it!  Easy to use and so much fun with the convenience of all your books and games in one little space.

Reviews.Author: Alan Hollander
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying it, except two of the games have to often be reloaded to be able to play them.

I had bought the cheapest kindle cause that was all I could afford.  To my surprise they came out with the refurbished one and It was cheaper than the first one I bought.  Thank you amazon...

Reviews.Content: Because you replaced my kindle when i need it the most for to pay my bills with yall are awsome

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: craig colombel
Reviews.Content: Great value for the price. Best Kindle to get if you don't want the 4G and still want photos and music.

Reviews.Title: Great for kids
Reviews.Author: Bboese
Reviews.Content: I love that you can use this for multiple kids by using the family time app.  I bought this for my daughter and I'm seriously considering getting one for myself since it's a great size for reading books.

Reviews.Title: learning
Reviews.Author: debbie
Reviews.Content: There are a few differences as to getting around on this kindle.  I just have to play around and re learn.

Reviews.Title: Certified Refurbished Kindle Fire 7" Tablet
Reviews.Author: Hotmom
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my new refurbished tablet.  Most of the apps are different and cool.  It seems easier to navigate to each tab.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great refurbished Kindle
Reviews.Author: shaunna t
Reviews.Content: We got a Kindle for our 5 year old. He loves it!He used it about 5 days a week for about two years then we started having issues with the charger. I had no idea that Amazon even sold refurbished models so I was so happy to hear that when I called customer service.We ordered the refurbished one and it arrived within a few days.  Then we shipped the broken one back with the label they sent us. It was so easy!

Reviews.Title: Works great for my nine year old
Reviews.Author: Barcelo
Reviews.Content: This is an older model, but it does everything my daughter needs it to do. She can load apps, watch movies, and get on the internet with it.

Reviews.Title: Best item I've ever bought!
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: Seriously, I use this more than my laptop because it is so convenient. I like it so much that I'm planning to buy my son one for his seventh birthday.

Reviews.Title: Great refurbished Kindle

Reviews.Content: We got a Kindle for our 5 year old. He loves it!He used it about 5 days a week for about two years then we started having issues with the charger. I had no idea that Amazon even sold refurbished models so I was so happy to hear that when I called customer service.We ordered the refurbished one and it arrived within a few days.  Then we shipped the broken one back with the label they sent us. It was so easy!

Reviews.Title: Works great for my nine year old

Reviews.Content: This is an older model, but it does everything my daughter needs it to do. She can load apps, watch movies, and get on the internet with it.

Reviews.Title: Best item I've ever bought!
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: Seriously, I use this more than my laptop because it is so convenient. I like it so much that I'm planning to buy my son one for his seventh birthday.

Reviews.Title: Many con's, and little pro's.
Reviews.Author: Ramon Hernandez
Reviews.Content: Just to make things clear this is my 2nd replacement Kindle, and will be the last, because I'm switching to android. I'm very disappointed in Amazon, for making a device so bad. They can it's a good price but really, for what you get, it's not. The Samsung Galaxy 3 tab 7inch, 8 gb, is only like $30.00 dollars more, but you get more, like front and back camera, NO annoying ads that you have to pay $15 more to get rid of, and after you pay that you can't even put a picture you like, you get checker board, books and other things for your lock screen, and when your on your main page you don't have a choice of a picture. Plus, the apps are useless, well at least some of them. There's no instagram, keek, flappy birds, and many other popular apps, like 80% of them are rip offs of other apps and useless apps. 15% I know but won't use them and 5% are apps like and played for, even though there free on android. Kindle Fire's always want to be in some way connected with some social media, I hate that. The only thing this is good at is reading, cause that's what's it's for. Watching videos is a no, you have to pay for more if you want HD, listening to music is ok, surfing the web is descent, the web browser is slow, but good. The battery life only last like 3hours reading, on 0 brightness, has no wall charger when you by this, you have to send $20.00 more, when it should of came with it. All still takes 5 hours to charge. Their customer service is great, this perfect for newbies, and grandpa's and grandma's. You can't expand memory like in a android, you can't screen shot pictures, an you certainly can't take pictures. I hate how is so thick, the back has a good grip. Well I have it a 3 star cause it gets the job done, and I got what I payed for. But I would stay away from the Kindle family.

Reviews.Title: FIRST VERSION to me is.....
Reviews.Author: HushLizard "I'm a Artist working in acrylic p...
Reviews.Content: ..the best ! , Like I've said don't have those anger full making Apps get in your way, this does it all !My only surprise and bit disappointment is how soon I have to charge ,follow the tips on it how to save energy.Love It !  Hushlizard

Reviews.Title: First Generation: ?????... Second Generation: Big Wow Factor
Reviews.Author: J-Menta
Reviews.Content: This is my third kindle fire, and yes my last two had charging issues. So far this second generation device is a major improvement from the first two. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Shawna Ojstrsek
Reviews.Content: I love the device. My only complaint is that the only apps you can get are from the Amazon app store and they don't have a great variety. For example they have Candy Crush Saga but not Farm Heroes Saga with is by the same company King. I don't play Candy Crush but I do play Farm Heroes. I really wish it would either support Google Play apps or that Amazon would have more variety in their store. I have also found that to get some of my music on the device I could not go through the upload to Cloud player. I had to put them on directly from my computer. This is because apparently since half of my music is older and not as popular Amazon doesn't bother to carry the rights for it so it cannot match it when I try to upload it. Would definite buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Starfish
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with Amazon Cust Service when I called about the USB Port on my kindle failing to charge. I spoke to two different people on two different occasions and both times I received friendly (not that fake over the top stuff) customer service. I received my refurbished kindle on the exact date they gave me, it was easy to get my books off of the Amazon Cloud and was very excited on getting a newer version than my 1st generation kindle. I absolutely LOVE it!!

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: My battery failed just after My first new Kindle Fire but I loved the original so much that since the refurbished model had the same warranty and was significantly cheaper I decided  to buy it and have been very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: refurbished kindle
Reviews.Author: Brenda C Stephenson
Reviews.Content: It was in good condition and charges perfectly every time. The pictures are very clear and all the apps work just like new.

Reviews.Title: You guys saved the day
Reviews.Author: lena nicolaisen
Reviews.Content: My son's Kindle got messed up and I was able to replace it with a refurbished Kindle without breaking the bank.Thank you guys so much

Reviews.Title: love my kindles
Reviews.Author: susan jennings
Reviews.Content: I have 4 kindled and I love them all especially my HDX the May day feature is awesome.  I wouldn't give up any of them

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love My kindle fire.......
Reviews.Author: Margaret Jefferson
Reviews.Content: Love this kindle.... It's awesome.... I wouldn't change any thing about it..... The color is great, the sound is great and the display is just beautiful....

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Guisela Laureano
Reviews.Content: My Kindle stopped charging and I contacted Amazon to find out what I could do, I was told that since it was still under guarantee I would get a brand new replacement. I did and it is wonderful, Amazon was easy to deal with and they responded promptly to my problem, solving it to my complete satisfaction.Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Works but ONLY 5 GB!!!!!11
Reviews.Author: Tran Anixter
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet, Works fantastically and does everything I want. The only downside is it limits you with only 5gb of harddrive space. For a tablet? Come onnnnnnnnnn.... Alone I have 8GB in music so I cant use this as a music player and apps without running my space to 0

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Sabrina Taylor
Reviews.Content: I love having everything right there with me all the time even if I am not reading I can play games or watch movies

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Juanita Miles
Reviews.Content: The kindle is awesome. It's the perfect size for me. The support team is great. I am very satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service!
Reviews.Author: Carrie Perry
Reviews.Content: I called in for a service call for a problem that I was having with my Kindle fire, while on the call the Kindle completely shut itself down and locked out wifi completely.  The service representative sent me a new one in its place becasue the problem was unfixable and locked the device down.  I was so impressed with the customer service.  Thanks so much!

Reviews.Title: I love It!!!
Reviews.Author: pgriffin
Reviews.Content: Was a little hesitant to buy this, but everyone had a kindle except for me.  I thought I would try it and WOW was I surprised.  It looked like new and I love it.  Would definitely recommend a refurbished kindle.  Actually thinking about getting one for my son- in - law.

Reviews.Title: Good, but not as good as my first Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Sreep
Reviews.Content: I ordered the refurbished Kindle Fire to replace a 1st generation Kindle Fire that no longer charged properly.  This Kindle Fire dos not respond as quickly as my first.  It usually takes me two tries to get the games to come up once I initiate the app. Email & Facebook apps are also slow.  Books take several tries to queue and download.  I have talked to customer service, had our internet provider out & we even changed our wireless router, thinking it as the problem.  My husband got a refurbished Kindle Fire at the same time and his is not nearly as slow to respond.  I enjoy the Kindle Fire product and usually use it just for reading and games, but am disappointed in this particular Kindle's response with the Internet apps.

Reviews.Title: l enoy the kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Mary JenkinsFounun The Kindle Cover Good To U...
Reviews.Content: A GREAT CHALLENGE and especially to enjoy a great joy to enjoy and a great honor to enjoy easy to handle and a great deal more

Reviews.Title: why pay full price?
Reviews.Author: Geraldine McCollum
Reviews.Content: works well can not tell it is refurbished, same warranty, great price. Would recommend to friends to buy. if they needed a Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire 7" i
Reviews.Author: Dawn L. Lewis
Reviews.Content: My old one would not charge any longer; therefore Kindle gave me a deal on another kindle fire. I use it everyday/

Reviews.Title: Good as new
Reviews.Author: Anomazon
Reviews.Content: This is my maiden voyage into the waters of tablets.  Since I dont really know what Im doing, I decided to get the older version for cost sake.  I just love it.  Also, I am so appreciative of the Kindle Free Time.  So far, Amazon is the only one who has even acknowledged that children use tablets.  The other companies are losing a lot of customers by not addressing proper parental controls.Thank you Amazon and Kindle!

Reviews.Title: LOVE my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Dee Ann Girard
Reviews.Content: I recently shattered my screen on my kindle that was purchased by my family for my birthday in July.  I am so careful with it...it's my baby, but must of hit it just right.  Lucky for me my daughter was smart enough to purchase the extended warranty and it was covered!  I would recommend EVERYONE purchase the extended warranty...it is so worth it!I flew home with my friends first edition kindle to occupy my time (not a good flier) and when I arrived home my new replacement was already here!!!Thanks for the great service!!!

Reviews.Title: Consider how you wish to use this Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Nancy L Matthews
Reviews.Content: I have 3 Kindle devices: an early reading version, this Kindle Fire 7", and the latest Kindle Paperwhite.  I would give the 1st Kindle and the 3rd, the Kindle Paperwhite, each 5 stars. This model Kindle Fire product has a short battery life, even with brightness at 50%. I believe it might be an appropriate gift for a youngster's intro to an electronic reading device as well as access to the internet or to check email (if kids even use email.)  For adults who wish simply to have access to an electronic reading device with internet ability this may be a useful choice.  In my opinion this model Kindle Fire is not comparible to more sophisticated and more expensive systems.  Since I am retired and quite elderly, I do not find the Kindle Fire an asset and I am likely to seldom use it except to make a gift of it to a youngster. I love Amazon and buy nearly everything except my groceries through their fine service.  I am sorry to give this product of Amazon such a poor rating, especially when I love my Kindle Paperwhite.

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: JTree
Reviews.Content: Great customer service,like the new Kindle.Fast shipping.Would up grade at later date for new model of Kindle. Very satisfied. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle Fire

Reviews.Content: This is a great device. Easy to use and small enough to carry everywhere.  I would totally purchase this again.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Value !

Reviews.Content: Amazon in its true form of seamless customer service and product delivery offered mea fix for my problem.Provided expedient delivery of the new refurbished product .. And at the snap of a finger my new kindle was up and running with all my purchased product immediately available :-)

Reviews.Title: Not the kindle but the power connector
Reviews.Author: Jeanette Schoppet
Reviews.Content: I have the older Kindle and had problems charging it. The problem is the power plug does not make contact, I have more than half dozen power supplies cords and the connector wears out and becomes loose if I use a string or rubber band to hold it in place it may get charged.

Reviews.Title: It is a great tablet.

Reviews.Content: I' m happy with my Kindle Fire. Hope to order the 8.9" when prices come down. Right now I am enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Loved it!

Reviews.Content: I was surprised at how easily I was able to load my apps from my first Kindle. It was a pleasure.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: From Georgia
Reviews.Content: I got my Kindle Fire, 1st gen at a great price from the Amazon Warehouse. I have the 1st gen Kindle and love it. Decided I would get the Fire because of the price. The Q&A; app has not been able to answer some of my questions but the Kindle Community Support is great. I have received good help very quickly. Love having it my purse. Can always read if I get stuck waiting.

Reviews.Title: card games
Reviews.Author: joan stedman
Reviews.Content: I like this very much. I had about 20 different electronic hand held card games, and was buying lots of batteries . I donated them to Value Village and bought a Kindle and it is perfect..

Reviews.Title: Excellent Refurbished Kindle
Reviews.Author: keonna m freeman
Reviews.Content: It's just like new! No scratches, wiped clean, charger works fine.. I'd order from this company again! Thanks so much!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Sandra Davila
Reviews.Content: Is everything that I thought that it would be and then more Thanks. 7 more words required WOW / OK I wish it were in Hoy Pink and or Purple !

Reviews.Title: Just like new!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: After my old ereader (a different brand) started having issues, I decided to upgrade to a tablet. After looking at my options I decided to go with the Fire.  My son already has one and he was getting tired of having to share it with me and his sister.  It looks and performs just like new and is perfect for my needs.  I primarily read on it, but do enjoy several apps including games, news and shopping.  I REALLY wish Google Play was offered so the books I had on the previous device could be read on my new Kindle.  That is the only drawback I have found.  I would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Certified Refurbished Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Susan Hill
Reviews.Content: I never thought I would love this so much.  I had an older Kindle reader and thought that was all I wanted, but I use my Fire for everything.  Love it.  Awesome deal!

Reviews.Title: Love our Kindles!
Reviews.Author: K. Godin
Reviews.Content: This is the 5th Kindle we've purchased.  We have 1 each, my husband & I, and have purchased 3 as gifts.  Everyone enjoys them just as much as we do.  Great for all the reading we do, plus the added benefit of watching movies & shows on PRIME ... and web surfing.  Add to that Amazon's great warranty & customer service ... we will keep buying Kindles!

Reviews.Title: kindel fire

Reviews.Content: Love it, my grandchildren love it also & they r oh 20months old &  2 1/2 yrs old.  Great apps for kids

Reviews.Title: Great purchase

Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle fire it meets all my expectations I would definetly recommend it to my family and friends

Reviews.Title: LOVE these things

Reviews.Content: We watch WAY too much tv and movies now and husband is playing solitaire all the time. we love our Kindle Fires.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with my new purchase.

Reviews.Content: I will like it better when I learn how to do other things with it.  Then I will fill  in the 5th star.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Theresa R. Stuczynski
Reviews.Content: Love the kindle. i read more thani ever did.Great color forplaying games.  can lookthings up on the web watch movies

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle but disappointed it didn't last
Reviews.Author: Claudette Chong-Kissoon
Reviews.Content: I loved my Kindle but was very disappointed when without any warning it stopped working just 3 months after the warranty period had expired. The words Kindle Fire has come up on the screen and alternately the lock screen would appear saying "swype has stopped". I have tried rebooting it but nothing works. Seems like this device only lasts a little over a year. I am so very disappointed in this product!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: lee
Reviews.Content: Love my Refurbished Kindle! Its in perfect condition, just like new! If youre looking for an inexpensive Kindle, look no further!!Highly reccomended!

Reviews.Title: replacement

Reviews.Content: it was a replacement for my first kindle I had purched the warrenty. . it was replaced with a refurbished one, althou I had bought new.it doesn't work right at all it goes off in the middle of programs, games. facebook will only show a few messages and wont advance. games wont open up.i would not buy another warrenty. this is the first problem I ever ghad with amazon.  thank you edna turner

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jenna
Reviews.Content: We love everything about the kindle fire. My son enjoys it so much, and it's very easy to use for all ages.

Reviews.Title: refurbished Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Adriana Schaff
Reviews.Content: It has some problems...sometimes it does not recharge properly and also, many times does not allow me to see videos

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd
Reviews.Author: Barbara Haggard
Reviews.Content: We bought this kindle for our 3 year old grandson. He is having lots of fun playing games on it.

Reviews.Title: The refurbished Kindle Fire met and exceeded my expectations!
Reviews.Author: Jessie M. Ashby "Jessie Bonds"
Reviews.Content: I can now read my Kindle while recharging.  The only thing I dislike about this Kindle Fire is that the power on button is not raised out of the case enough.  I have to use too much pressure to turn the Kindle on.

Reviews.Title: Low battery life
Reviews.Author: Raghu
Reviews.Content: The kids love it but it hardly lasts for a movie or 2. It takes ages to charge and we have to make a number of manouvres to get it to start charging.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!
Reviews.Author: Nick Beckham
Reviews.Content: Very nice to have!! I have had my Kindle for 2 years now and I love having all the books i enjoy at my finger tips!!

Reviews.Title: LOVE!!!
Reviews.Author: Christine Cherry
Reviews.Content: I finally bought a case since I dropped my last 3 kindle fires and BROKE them. Im making sure this one stays safe!

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Allan G
Reviews.Content: I really like the kindle.  It is easy to read day or night.  My only concern is reliability.  This is the third kindle fire I have had and all the others failed for the same reason, the system program failed.  All the other ones lasted only about a year.  It is far too expensive to have such a short life span.  It should also have a usb port to expand the memory.

Reviews.Title: certified refurbished knidle fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Linda Cloutier
Reviews.Content: The Certified refurbished kindle fire 7"  works and looks great and I would recommend it to  anyone who is thinking about buying one.

Reviews.Title: A+
Reviews.Author: Mishee
