Reviews.Content: Great product. Exactly what I was looking for.  The seller is very helpful and even threw in some extras due to the snow delay.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fan
Reviews.Author: Rebecca J. Wegner
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and well supported by Amazon  tech. I enjoy the wide variety of materials available. Combined with Amazon Prime it's a great entertainment bargin.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Brook  Romero
Reviews.Content: No one should pass a deal like this up, Looks new, 1 year Guarantee, what's the difference, nothing that I can tell except the price. Have one for me and one for the wife.

Reviews.Title: Could not ask for anything better.
Reviews.Author: nana10
Reviews.Content: My Kindle Fire is exactly what I wanted.  I would recommend it to everyone I know. In fact I have.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished kindle
Reviews.Author: L. Adams
Reviews.Content: My kindle arrived promptly and it was ready to go when I recieved it. I like that it charges in just 2 hours,the picture is very clear, Thank you I love my Kindle it never leaves my side :)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Wilkie "Barb"
Reviews.Content: Bought this Kindle as refurbished and certified for my 9 year old granddaughter. Have not noticed any difference form mine with it's performance. She loves to read and play games and the Kindle has not disappointed her and that is what counts!

Reviews.Title: Buy this instead of an iPad......very little difference in my opinion in what each offers
Reviews.Author: sak
Reviews.Content: web, books, textbooks, games....and so many more apps that I haven't even looked into. I've had mine for several years and have had no problems with it. Have also downloaded several textbooks onto it, so it's very helpful when I don't want to carry around a 20 lb textbook.

Reviews.Title: I like
Reviews.Author: Gary A. Mason
Reviews.Content: The Kindle reader I had was nice enough for me as I only used it to read books anyway. However when it got a crack in the screen I was happy to get the refurbished Kindle Fire. Now I can listen to music instead of that crying baby that I always get stuck next to on the plane.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: marie leslie "Les"
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle HDX for $429 because I wanted a camera and all the other options.However, it did not work and I sent it back. I decided I would try this instead for readingbecause I wanted color. This worked better than the HDX and I have had no trouble andI only paid $99 for it! The HDX would not load, Mayday did not work and when it did theysaid the same thing over and over. So I don't have a camera but I have most everything elseso I am happy.

Reviews.Title: There is and bad to this item
Reviews.Author: Z. Burt
Reviews.Content: I got this for Christmas. I am 15 and I didn't ask for it but it is what I got. Some problems are: small storage space, FREEZES UP A LOT, and screen feels loose sometimes. This has a lot of problems mainly that it constantly freezes up and take about a minute to restart it. Takes about 40 seconds to boot up. BUT, as much as this freezes up, it is very cheap. So for a inexpensive tablet for Internet browsing and small gaming it is a decent tablet for the price.

Reviews.Title: Certified Refurbished Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: TK
Reviews.Content: For the moment, it works and I am satisfied. However, this is my 4th Kindle Fire in one year. Let's hope this one lasts a little longer.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: KRK
Reviews.Content: For the most part it works relatively well.  It has some quirks once in a while that one has to get usef to i guess.

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Connie Jean
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle!!  I'm never without something to read, I can stay in touch with friends and family... It's perfect,smaller then my laptop. bigger then my phone,,i can watch movies,,listen to music,the only thing it doesn;t do is  dishes :)

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: connie mills
Reviews.Content: It let's me have every thing right at my finger tips. for my reading plus a lot off most anything.

Reviews.Title: refurbished- smart!
Reviews.Author: Diane Molinari
Reviews.Content: this is a great way to get a newer reader to have fun with it and the price makes it even more attractive.

Reviews.Title: Thanks!!
Reviews.Author: Wibbs
Reviews.Content: Even though this is the 3rd kindle I have had to replace, I still like the kindle fire(s). Customer service has been excellent each time I have a problem.

Reviews.Title: its nice
Reviews.Author: lorenzo evans
Reviews.Content: it's a good replacement. I am glad THAT IT DIDN'T TAKE LONG FOR  ME TO GET IT. I AM PLEASED

Reviews.Title: Outstanding!!
Reviews.Author: E. Strauss "Elizabeth Strauss"
Reviews.Content: A very good product from Amazon! as always amazon.com reliable,fast,outstanding!I will highly recommend the New Generation(Second Generation Kindle) to All!!

Reviews.Title: The refurbished Kindle fire that has no volume 1/2 of the time
Reviews.Author: pamela m mcdaniels
Reviews.Content: I'm upset because the volume doesn't work all the time I keep doin master resets on this Kindle it's pretty annoying

Reviews.Title: Thank you!
Reviews.Author: Fab "Fab"
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for one that died. It works well and i am pleased with the new kindle. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Kindle #3
Reviews.Author: tashamee alston
Reviews.Content: Even though it's the past generation it's super nice.  My mom loves her new toy. This is another item that arrived very quickly and I was very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle
Reviews.Author: faceit
Reviews.Content: It's a much needed device for me.  So, I love it!!  It's my newest friend.  It is very very good!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Paul Hartwell "hotdog"
Reviews.Content: Not being used to hand held devices,no cell phone,this was easy to use setting up the broadband was harder easy to use with good support from amazon,I use it daily for Facebook,E bay and Netflix can't say I use it as a reader,would have liked a camera option on it,was reasonable priced so no complaints

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Francys
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle, it was a great price, so far there are no issues, exept for the one click to buy things because my little sister bought a game I didn't agree to.

Reviews.Title: My Order
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: Product is very nice and as described in the Amazon adds.  I received it very fast and with no problems.

Reviews.Title: REPLACEMENT
Reviews.Author: grammax6
Reviews.Content: this was a replacement for a defective one.  I was instructed to return the defective one with the charger cord, which I did, BUT when I received the replacement, there was no charger cord with the new one

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire comments
Reviews.Author: Bob Schulhof
Reviews.Content: I like the Kindle Fire compared to a book  because it is easy to read than a book and in various lighting conditions.I don't like it because you don't know:1. Where you are in the chapter (how many pages to go?)2. How many more chapters and pages there are3. Difficulty bookmarking and finding sections of interest

Reviews.Title: Great service
Reviews.Author: Lindy
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because I LOVE Amazon, and the lady that helped me with this issues was polite and she spent a long time on the phone with me to help resolve the problem I was having.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 2
Reviews.Author: Edna "Edna"
Reviews.Content: I had a Kindle Fire 1 & really loved it. It was replaced with a Kindle Fire 2. The Kindle Fire 2 will not let me view videos. It says I need Flash Player. I have tried to download it but Kindle Fire 2 does not support Flash Player. Have tried choose another view from the menu but none of them work. Therefore I cannot watch videos now. Other than that it is OK.

Reviews.Title: Had a new Kindle Fire that didn't last long as far as being able to charge it and the screen freezing.
Reviews.Author: susan harper
Reviews.Content: Amazon replaced my new Kindle Fire with a refurbished Kindle fire and I am not pleased.  The screen scrolls on its own and it doesn't stay charged long.  Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: It was better than I had expected!
Reviews.Author: N.meyers
Reviews.Content: I loved my old kindle and was very upset when I could not charge it anymore. So I called customer support, the man I spoke with was so very nice.I could not ask for better customer service. My new Kindle Fire was shipped immediately and arrived exactly when he told me it would. I am so very happy!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Dabbott
Reviews.Content: Item works well and is sturdy it has met expectations and if fun to play with or read books.  Downloading books is very easy and uncomplicated

Reviews.Title: Excellent device, terrible company policies
Reviews.Author: Hiram J Beaudry
Reviews.Content: Pros: solid construction. Evenly distributed weight. Fairly intuitive interface. Fast. Good screen. Not as crappy a build as I expected for under $100.Cons: Amazon, Amazon, Amazon! Setting up a proprietary app store and refusing anything that doesn't line Amazon's pockets. Going to all the trouble and expense of making it easy, but only if you do what they want and buy what they want and use what they want. Also, no apparently obvious way to use USB memory sticks to increase storage capacity. Proprietary browser is an annoying anachronism. Cloud video has significant limitations, and the tiny memory doesn't help. Also don't like apps that can't be deleted. Assurances as to the security of the device sadly lacking, making me wonder how safe my data and (dwindling) privacy actually is.My biggest concern is that I paid for the damned thing, so why am I required to use it the way they want me to? The people who made my car don't tell me where I can and can't drive, nor do they threaten to brick my car if I install secondary market stuff without their approval. My microwave doesn't refuse to heat non-approved foodstuffs. The idea that I am only borrowing the thing after paying for it is foul.I should be able to open any file that can be opened in Android. I should be able to have all my e-books work without having one easy way from the Amazon store and another complicated workaround for anybody else's. I should not be stuck with their browser.The real problem with the real problems is that they stem from Amazon's insular greediness and their gradual, but hopefully not inevitable, slide towards a day when the customers are the product and the advertisers are Amazon's REAL customer base. These petty little insults to the autonomy of the user all add up to a very bad idea, especially if Amazon wants us to trust them.Pretending to protect consumers while actually shafting them is grounds for revolution.

Reviews.Title: We had trouble with the charge connector on two fires but Amazon has made good each time.
Reviews.Author: Frederick W. Schaupp
Reviews.Content: I got our first fire over two years ago so I could have something to do while I was on dialyses. A year later I got a kidney transplant and spend a long time at Mayo Hospital so my kindle got a workout. A year ago I bought aFire HD and gave my wife the first fire. Now she is on it every day and half the night. We have had trouble with the charge connector and Amazon has replaced the units.  The fires work well and my on desire would be to be able to print pages from it like plans for crafts and things. I enjoy dealing with Amazon.

Reviews.Title: My first wireless device
Reviews.Author: Joseph Monaco
Reviews.Content: Still getting used to it. Battery seems to need recharging a lot. Will know better when I've used it more.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: delvara d. barner "Adonai reigns forever!"
Reviews.Content: I seriously debated over getting a Kindle.  It took me two months to decide.  Now that I have it.  I love it.  Not only can I read the book but, I can listen along while I read.Paperback books can be so heavy inside of my purse.  This way I can carry several books, read a little of each one and carry them around with me.I LOVE IT!!!!!  IF YOU DON'T HAVE ONE  GET ONE!

Reviews.Title: Love refurbished Kindle
Reviews.Author: Linda J. Taylor
Reviews.Content: Amazon was so wonderful to suggest a replacement for a reduced price when my Kindle Fire broke.  Love my Kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Dunyuan Chen
Reviews.Content: Bought for a friend and I haven't used it or seen it. But I guess it is pretty cool right?

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: mason reece
Reviews.Content: Everything is awesome! Fast Internet, great graphics! I would definitely tell my friends to get one! Then we could all hang out together and be buddies!

Reviews.Title: Sis loves Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: + DR Good "trippy lover"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sister who is 83.  It is lightweight, easy for her to hold.  She loves reading books on it, watching Netflix on it. It is great!

Reviews.Title: looks like a really great product, except i returned it before opening.
Reviews.Author: theresa kuennemann
Reviews.Content: looks like a really great product, except i returned it before opening. my other kindle worked for one more day and then completely decided to malfunction, and before i could use this one that i returned

Reviews.Title: Replacement for broken kindle
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Lugo
Reviews.Content: I love the new version of this Kindle.  The options are better organized.  Amazon customer service is always so helpful.  I have never found any customer service better than Amazon

Reviews.Title: Excellent condition and service
Reviews.Author: Bertie
Reviews.Content: My original Kindle Fire no longer held the charge and eventually died.After performing different test with tech support over the phone, he diagnosed it as a hardware issue and suggested I replace it with a refurbished one.  I chose the same size and style because I use mostly for reading.  Took 24 hours to get it and was able to access all the books I had before.  Excellent service.

Reviews.Title: Pleased at first but not later
Reviews.Author: jennypoo
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my grandchildren ages 9 and 10. The kids do play lots of games but both tablets started becoming slow after just a couple of months. I finally sent them back to Amazon and they were great replacing ..after a few months the same thing is happening. Very frustrating since there is only about 40- 50 games downloaded on each ...Even after clearing off most of the games it would still be slow and say that we had taken up too much space..rediculous. I spent many hours on the phone with Amazon and they can't even figure it out...I don't plan on buying anymore Kindle Fires.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Laura Wingate
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my new Kindle. It is a little confusing because I didnt receive a book with guide lines. or directions. there are a few things I am having trouble with but I am trying to.

Reviews.Title: FIRE does NOT live up to expectations and Amazon Rep. did not do a good job at informing us of issues.
Reviews.Author: Jack J. Glassman
Reviews.Content: Disappointing....we expected an improvement from the "Fire" Kindle this was repalcing. They would NOT ship it to us in our Winter address in the USVI and charged us NY tax plus our additional shipping here. Amazon has ALWAYS shipped to our USVI address wirh "NEW" items. Additionally, the refurbished unit that was sent is a British unit. The keyboard says, .UK not .com.This was our 14th Kindle that we have purchSED FOR OUR FAMILY MEMBERS......no more!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Catjackson"
Reviews.Content: I love it, its stream line and easy to use. The color is fantastic, and so is the sound. Not crazy about where the volume is located.

Reviews.Title: Love the IDEA of this product
Reviews.Author: robinh20s
Reviews.Content: As the headline says, I love the idea of the Kindle.  Unfortunately, I had to send my first one back due to a screen freeze and then it just wouldn't work correctly.  Acted as if it were constantly rebooting.  The good news is Amazon sent me a new one with no problem. Thank you Amazon!  I love using this in the place of a book.  It was initially a gift to me and I had my doubts...old school I guess.  I really enjoy that I can change the font size and the brightness of the pages.  I don't really use it for internet unless its shopping on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: 2nd kindle
Reviews.Author: eileen snyder
Reviews.Content: Love the kindle....just wish a recharging cord was included. Good response via phone when ordering!  Fair trade with returning of old kindle

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 2nd generation
Reviews.Author: Cookie
Reviews.Content: love it, has text to speech, easy to read, download fast, fun games, I know I will love the fire DXN

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the money
Reviews.Author: Carrie Warnecke
Reviews.Content: This is my first experience with a tablet and I absolutely love it. It is one of my new favorite things to use.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Kindle
Reviews.Author: Donna Gonzales
Reviews.Content: excellent service and product..........I appreciate your quick response to my needs and the helpfulness of support staff .. love Amazon

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Frederick V. Iannone
Reviews.Content: I got this because of a problem I experienced with my original Kindle.  This one fits my old cover.  I use this one at work to watch a show during lunch.

Reviews.Title: like new
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "NIKKJ3"
Reviews.Content: Was excited we I received product. Was used but couldn't tell. Thrilled belongs belief. Will purchase refurbished product again. It could be purchased with or without accessories.

Reviews.Title: customer service
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We already had a Kindle but was having some trouble with it. When I called, we were sent a replacement free of charge. Love our Kindle and love the company!

Reviews.Title: Not too happy with the kindle fire.
Reviews.Author: gloria h. trotman
Reviews.Content: I found it difficult to adjust to the Fire Kindle.  I originally had The Kindle 2 and it was so simple to operate.I am now becoming more accustomed to the Kindle Fire and am starting to enjoy it.  I still have to learna lot more about it--for the time being it will have to do.

Reviews.Title: Refurb Kindle is great.
Reviews.Author: starlight "starlight"
Reviews.Content: My refurbished Kindle is great. No problems whatsoever. I read from it all the time. Thank you for making it available at a good price.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Carol Walker
Reviews.Content: It does everything I want it to only find it a little slow for email and also when I try to get to another screen.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT TO GET A BEGINNER STARTED. GREAT EASE OF OPERATION.
Reviews.Author: katahdin
Reviews.Content: Right from the beginning this little device was easy to navigate. My wife had never even held a computer in her hands. After a half hour of my help she had set up accounts...visited Google, Ebay & Yahoo. The rest is history. I bought it as a present. I MADE THE RIGHT CHOICE. It's QUALITY & it's priced right.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT TO GET A BEGINNER STARTED. GREAT EASE OF OPERATION.
Reviews.Author: katahdin
Reviews.Content: Right from the beginning this little device was easy to navigate. My wife had never even held a computer in her hands. After a half hour of my help she had set up accounts...visited Google, Ebay & Yahoo. The rest is history. I bought it as a present. I MADE THE RIGHT CHOICE. It's QUALITY & it's priced right.

Reviews.Title: No control
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: I set up every parental control to keep my kids from buying but it never worked! Got many charges to my account! I will say they refunded me my money after calling and complaining to them! I did sell my kindles and spent the money on iPad minis for my kids to prevent charges! I will say the FaceTime is fun for me and my boys :)

Reviews.Title: poor quality
Reviews.Author: katrina henley
Reviews.Content: The refurbished is lightweight, the speaker system sounds cheap, the screen font is smaller and I  can't watch videos posted on Facebook because this kindle doesn't have flash player.

Reviews.Title: Works Like New
Reviews.Author: Becca Chopra
Reviews.Content: I dropped my first Kindle Fire and then the screen didn't respond to my touch any longer. The new replacement, while refurbished, is as good as new, and now protected in a heavy duty case. I love using the Kindle - it couldn't make reading all the books on my list any more convenient.Namaste!Becca Chopra, author of The Chakra Diaries and Chakra Secrets

Reviews.Title: Good deal!!!!!
Reviews.Author: gmasue
Reviews.Content: Kids absolutely enjoy this and it looks and works perfect.  I may get one for myself soon!! A great deal!!

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE
Reviews.Author: mamadavis "M. Davis"
Reviews.Content: this has got to be the best product I have to be honest.  I have an IPad and 2 of these and because this is lighter in weight I'd rather use it on the beach and at the pool.  everybody needs one of these or the IPad...but they are so expensive.  This does the job and I really like mine.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Crystal Black
Reviews.Content: This device is so sensitive. One day I tried charging it, and I found out that the circuits inside of it were shot. I sent for a replacement, and the same thing happened AGAIN. Besides that, it's really fun, especially for children. Just make sure to be SUPER careful when you insert the charger.

Reviews.Title: Great idea, lacking durability
Reviews.Author: Frank R. Caruso Jr.
Reviews.Content: I fell in love with my Kindle Fire on Day 1 (Christmas gift from my wife).  I use it for reading, NetFlix, music/audio books, Facebook, limited browsing, and a number of apps (Crosswords and Sudoku).  I wasn't expecting it to feel "like a book" in my hand, but was pleasantly proven wrong.  For what it is and how I use it, I would have given it 5 stars.However, its lack of durability is a big issue for me.  We got the extended warranty (up to two years), and it was a good thing.  Almost exactly at one year (when the regular warranty would have expired), the micro-USB port stopped working (couldn't charge or sync - unit was replaced under warranty, shipping was covered).  Six months later, lockup issues required service (shipping both ways covered).  Five days after extended warranty expired, the screen cracked and unit is barely usable.While customer service was prompt and attentive (while the warranty was valid), this product is fragile.  I now have a device that is barely usable, and no confidence that another purchased unit will be any less fragile.  I am exploring the Nook as an alternative.

Reviews.Title: amazing machine
Reviews.Author: Les Eller
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is so far ahead of the Kindle Fire I previously bought I can't even begin to describe it. My wife had a Fire HD; when I had problems with my Fire, I decided to bite the bullet and spend the extra $ for extra firepower. I was not disappointed. It is powerful, lightweight and performs way more functions than I have needed or had time to discover at this point. My wife is even thinking she might upgrade to it as well.

Reviews.Title: Husband loves!
Reviews.Author: shirley tanner
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my husband, some time ago, and I don't think he has put it down since! He has read I don't know how many books!! Perfect gift!

Reviews.Title: amazing machine
Reviews.Author: Les Eller
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is so far ahead of the Kindle Fire I previously bought I can't even begin to describe it. My wife had a Fire HD; when I had problems with my Fire, I decided to bite the bullet and spend the extra $ for extra firepower. I was not disappointed. It is powerful, lightweight and performs way more functions than I have needed or had time to discover at this point. My wife is even thinking she might upgrade to it as well.

Reviews.Title: Husband loves!
Reviews.Author: shirley tanner
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my husband, some time ago, and I don't think he has put it down since! He has read I don't know how many books!! Perfect gift!

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Louise morin
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with it,I like it for games,and books,good size to carried in my purse and friendly to used for grand kids

Reviews.Title: Kids love them
Reviews.Author: kids
Reviews.Content: We have 4 year old twins and have 2 kindles. They are easy to use and keeps my biys busy when I need to do something without being interrupted. Plenty of free as well as learning apps. Good investment!

Reviews.Title: My Experience with The Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Elaine Williams
Reviews.Content: The Kindle fire 7" is excellent.  It is easily stored in the holder and the pictures are clear.  There has been no difficulty with pictures fading out or freezing at this point.Other tablets started out early giving problems and not living up to stated expectations.  I am pleased and thus far I have no dislikes.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle
Reviews.Author: Sharon Lee Ross
Reviews.Content: Love my refurbished Kindle.  Got it fast and it's working fine.  No problems with it and it has more options than my old one.  I highly recommend buying a refurbished Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Charlie Goss
Reviews.Content: Just what I was looking for. I didnt need to spend the money for a brand new HD and I still have been able to do everything I wanted to do with it.

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: odieham
Reviews.Content: My HD version was stolen so I got this as a quick fix. I miss my HD for movies and the sound quality is not nearly the same. However, for $99, I got all my music, books and apps back very quickly, and the device was already set up as my Kindle. I can't complain a bit. Eventually I'll get the HD version with the 8' screen but for now, this is fine.

Reviews.Title: happy
Reviews.Author: Erin Metzger
Reviews.Content: I like what I purchased and cannot tell the Kindle has been refurbished. I use it daily and was pleased with the price.

Reviews.Title: The screen freese's up
Reviews.Author: deborah
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter who is 19 and she has been having problems with the screen freezing up or not charging well or keeping a charge I plan on sending in for service

Reviews.Title: good job
Reviews.Author: phillip sprabary
Reviews.Content: so far so good--much better than the nook i was using and so much easier to get what i am looking for

Reviews.Title: Love my baby
Reviews.Author: Queen Nisey
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle the only thing is that the batterie dies quickly..and I hate the ads..how come I have to pay to remove the ads. Anyways I still love my kindle

Reviews.Title: Great for readers
Reviews.Author: AnnBee
Reviews.Content: I read tons of books from the library, but wanted a Kindle for when I travel.  Several times I've opened a library book at the airport to discover I've read it.  Now I have hundreds of books to choose from on the kindle, and most of them were free.  It is hard to see the screen outside or with sunglasses on. There is no way to sort the books or to mark which ones have been read.  They can be moved from the device to the cloud and lent to friends.  It is a little too heavy to carry around when I'm out, but it does link to certain online calendars.  It is so easy to hold and turn the pages while knitting or crocheting.  I use it to read and play Words With Friends.  It doesn't need dusted and no bookcases are required.  I would buy another.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: margaret melin
Reviews.Content: I have experienced that even My replacement Kindle does not hold the ten hours charge that I was told it would hold.I do love My Kindle, it give Me hours of activity.

Reviews.Title: Son loves it
Reviews.Author: b.herrera
Reviews.Content: Was surprised it didn't come with adapter just the USB. Amazon in their infinite awesomeness credited my account the cost of one and I purchased it. LOVE AMAZON!

Reviews.Title: Short battery charge life
Reviews.Author: JIM NIEMEYER
Reviews.Content: Bery disappointed with length of time battery charge lasts compared to my old Kindle.  But Kindle had me buy a new charger for this unit - have yet to evaluate how unit now performs, but I cannot understand how the charger could affect the usage length of the battery.  We'll see...

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle
Reviews.Author: Patricia M. Wardle
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  Very impressed with my new (refurbished Kindle).  It works so well and takes a charge quickly.

Reviews.Title: I like it, but.......
Reviews.Author: PepIvy
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement for my First Generation Kindle Fire. The problem is that the battery has to be charged like every other day. I reduced the brightness and only use the Wi-Fi when needed. I only use it to play games (apps).

Reviews.Title: Works like new
Reviews.Author: dorothea gorman
Reviews.Content: Refurbished looks and works as if it was new. I never purchased refurbished before but will now do so in the future.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished not so bad!
Reviews.Author: H.Lori
Reviews.Content: So far, So good. I am somewhat hesitant to purchase refurbished electronics, however I must say that this kindle is performing just as a brand new one would. I am satisfied that it is a good as a new one without the price.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!!!
Reviews.Author: Agriff
Reviews.Content: For a refurbished device, this Kindle works like it's brand new. I bought it for my mom on Mothers Day 2013, she uses it every day no problems at all.

Reviews.Title: Not all that it appears to be
Reviews.Author: Midwest
Reviews.Content: At first I absolutely loved the Kindle Fire.  In less than a year it had to be replaced because it kept shutting down.  The replacement wouldn't even come on and had to be replaced.  The one I have now just randomly shuts down without warning.  My grandson got one for Christmas and it has never worked correctly.  It constantly shuts down now matter what you are doing on it.  Don't know if I would purchase this if it had not been a gift.  Seems to have a problem with shutting down randomly.

Reviews.Title: A Joy to have
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it. It's the best present I've ever gotten her, without a doubt. She hasn't put the kindle down since Christmas.

Reviews.Title: What a Buy!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia "cdeluz"
Reviews.Content: I bought a refurbished Kindle Fire HD for $79 (without tax). It was in perfect condition (operational and physical)! Do not be afraid to shop for refurbished items.  The warranty and return policy for the refurbished item is the same as on the brand new item.

Reviews.Title: Super!
Reviews.Author: Rouky
Reviews.Content: Big difference between this one and 1st generation! I had so many issues with charging with the 1st generation. Hopefully I won't with this one. It has so many more options. Absolutely no regrets! It's ideal for kids as it comes with parental control. I'll probably get a newer version later for myself. But for now this one does it!

Reviews.Title: Good device.
Reviews.Author: T. Walter "Bill"
Reviews.Content: It's NOT an iPad. It's Like the iPad, but for me, not quite the experience.I use it allot, for reading newspapers and my school work,surfing the internet in a wifi,  but lean more heavily on the iPad for other stuff.A good device.....

Reviews.Title: Very disappointing
Reviews.Author: J. Kelly
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement for my terrific 1st generation Kindlefire, which stopped taking a charge because like most of them the charger port was so poorly soldered that the soldered connections to the motherboard broke after repeated plugging/unplugging the charger cable. I miss it!This replacement "upraded" model is a serious step backwards.The user interface has been rearranged so that it's not nearly as intuitive and I spend far too much time looking for the means to perform simple tasks.The keyboards for all apps have the small punctuation marks on each key so dark I can barely see them, and there's no setting to change it. In fact, there are far fewer settings changeable than in the original Kindlefire.All the icons are huge and take up far too much display area, and of course cannot be resized.There is no more Amazon app - there is a SHOP link on the new home page marquee instead, and it seems the entire tablet is designed for shopping at Amazon.I have a lot of money invested in books on Kindle, and I like the color pictures in the Kindlefire versions of those books, so I can't give up on it, but I'm so frustrated with pretty much everything about it that I can only use it for reading (and solitaire).

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Natasha
Reviews.Content: I wasn't informed there were so many little scratches on screen. And I gave it as a gift to my son for Christmas

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: courtney
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting a Kindle for a while now, and I finally decided to get this one and I absolutely love it. I love that it has a little section just for kids (freetime), my daughter LOVES playing the apps (which are mostly all educational) and the books available. I love reading books on it, and there is such a huge selection of free e-books for it so you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: It took me over 2 weeks to get and the delivery people left it out side in the -  degree weather where no one even new it had arrived .

Reviews.Title: Good device.
Reviews.Author: T. Walter "Bill"
Reviews.Content: It's NOT an iPad. It's Like the iPad, but for me, not quite the experience.I use it allot, for reading newspapers and my school work,surfing the internet in a wifi,  but lean more heavily on the iPad for other stuff.A good device.....

Reviews.Title: Very disappointing
Reviews.Author: J. Kelly
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement for my terrific 1st generation Kindlefire, which stopped taking a charge because like most of them the charger port was so poorly soldered that the soldered connections to the motherboard broke after repeated plugging/unplugging the charger cable. I miss it!This replacement "upraded" model is a serious step backwards.The user interface has been rearranged so that it's not nearly as intuitive and I spend far too much time looking for the means to perform simple tasks.The keyboards for all apps have the small punctuation marks on each key so dark I can barely see them, and there's no setting to change it. In fact, there are far fewer settings changeable than in the original Kindlefire.All the icons are huge and take up far too much display area, and of course cannot be resized.There is no more Amazon app - there is a SHOP link on the new home page marquee instead, and it seems the entire tablet is designed for shopping at Amazon.I have a lot of money invested in books on Kindle, and I like the color pictures in the Kindlefire versions of those books, so I can't give up on it, but I'm so frustrated with pretty much everything about it that I can only use it for reading (and solitaire).

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Natasha
Reviews.Content: I wasn't informed there were so many little scratches on screen. And I gave it as a gift to my son for Christmas

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: courtney
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting a Kindle for a while now, and I finally decided to get this one and I absolutely love it. I love that it has a little section just for kids (freetime), my daughter LOVES playing the apps (which are mostly all educational) and the books available. I love reading books on it, and there is such a huge selection of free e-books for it so you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: It took me over 2 weeks to get and the delivery people left it out side in the -  degree weather where no one even new it had arrived .

Reviews.Title: I love my old Kindle
Reviews.Author: Angel Roca
Reviews.Content: This is great reader!It also does so much more but i just mainly use to it for book purchases! I am very satisfied with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Kindle FIRE
Reviews.Author: kathy Jones
Reviews.Content: My first Fire I bought just over a year ago.  I did not have wi-fi at the time.  Had to go to town to link up.  I got wi-fi this summer, and I found that my Fire was acting really strange. whenever I would delete something, the Kindle would put it back.  I took a chance and emailed Amazon to ask about it, and I was pleasantly surprised when a representative called me about my problem.  Eventually I was sent a replacement unit, and so far it is working just fine. I have had this new unit for about 2 months now, and except for the fact that it is too heavy to hold for long, So far I am very pleased with it.I have had terrible luck with Kindles (I have 3), But Amazon has stood by them very well.Kathy

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire 2nd addition
Reviews.Author: Connie J Himes
Reviews.Content: This one works great! I really like the 2nd addition kindle fire. I love the way it displays everything. Thank you amazon.com

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Eldoria Fugate "eldoria"
Reviews.Content: Love the item. This was a great gift for my child just if i could only get it away for dinner....

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle
Reviews.Author: lois brownell
Reviews.Content: I was amazed at the quality of service I received and the speediness of receiving my Kindle.  Thanks so much

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire 7
Reviews.Author: David G. Joseph
Reviews.Content: Replacement to original Kindle which no longer workjed.  Service Representative was very responsive and received this replacement  very quickly.  Works very well,  Quite satisified.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Exchange of kindle
Reviews.Author: Tonya J. Montgomery
Reviews.Content: I was very appreciative that it was replaced for a nominal fee. I .am addicted to my kindle and I was sad when I could not get it to charge. I had no idea that I could get a refurbished kindle. The process of returning my old one was easily done

Reviews.Title: kindle fire refurb
Reviews.Author: John Harvey
Reviews.Content: sat on my old kindle. offered this as a choice to replace at a fair. Happy so far and recommend refurbished

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Bill Forshay
Reviews.Content: My wife is a reader and she loves the kindle. We had an old one and dropped it, so we had to get a new one. Yes, I would recommend it to any one.

Reviews.Title: Fast and Furious!
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: It is an exceptional machine! I got it for fiancé for Valentines Day and realized that it would be great for several things, such as school, games, reading, etc...

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Lois Wood "reading"
Reviews.Content: When I ordered this to replace the one that broke, I was not told I was getting a refurbished kindle. So far its been fine so as long as it keeps working it fine. Just wish I was told first that I was getting the refurbished kindle

Reviews.Title: Great buy!!
Reviews.Author: susiegoozie
Reviews.Content: My first venture into the e-reader and I love it!  The Black Friday price was fantastic.  It has a great selection of apps and great content.  Amazon Prime is absolutely wonderful.  And the frosting on the cake--it is one of the few non-Apple products that allows me to get TV via the Cox Connect app.  Thank you, Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: amazing!
Reviews.Author: emily creswell
Reviews.Content: it may seem too good to be true at first but i took a chance and ordered it, and discovered that it was one of the best things I've ever bought on amazon. it comes brand new and in the new box so don't worry about damage, it does everything and is a fantastic buy, i love mine!

Reviews.Title: Great for kids & parents too!!
Reviews.Author: Marie Isabella
Reviews.Content: Great product!! Would recommend. Very affordable, lots of free apps, easy to navigate for both kids and adults! Battery life if also good.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: rebekah deal
Reviews.Content: It works great and looks brand new.  My child loves it. There were no scratches or dents on it. Thank u

Reviews.Title: Satisified
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: Pleased with operation except for one thing.  I do not like the female voice, prefer the male voice when listening to books.My other kindles have both choices, and I wish this one had the same.  Also, the charge is much shorter than the other kindles.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Ann Marie "Ann Marie"
Reviews.Content: it is the most fun I have ever had and goes every where with me, I have had hours of enjoyment and reading fun. love all the features

Reviews.Title: No decent flash player
Reviews.Author: Christi Malone
Reviews.Content: Kindle fire no longer comes with flash player installed.  There is not a decent flash player app available.  Nothing I have tried, even with customer support, is compatible with the website my students need.  So, I have 7 Kindle Fires that are absolutely USELESS to my classroom!!

Reviews.Title: Love this tablet!
Reviews.Author: Sabrina
Reviews.Content: I love the ease of my kindle fire. I love how it performs like brand new and I got a great deal. My 5 year old uses it with ease and I love the kindle free time...I set the limits and the kindle tells her when time is up...one less struggle..lol!

Reviews.Title: I am generally very happy with my refurbished Kindle Fire.
Reviews.Author: Charlotte Pollard
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my refurbished Kindle Fire except for the fact that, if I need to turn the volume up to the highest setting, I get some buzzing from the speaker.

Reviews.Title: My kids and I love our Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Momoffive
Reviews.Content: We bought the Klear Kase and it has endured young children and still kickin! Apps are fun to explore and books are easy for the kids to access.  I also like having my books also accessible and larger than my iphone.  An ipad just seemed too much for a 5,6 and 7 year old. The kindle is perfect.  And, the price was right!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7" LCD Display,Wi-Fi, 8GB
Reviews.Author: Judy "gottalovetigger"
Reviews.Content: I very much enjoy my Kindle Fire though the only reason I gave it 4 stars and not 5 is because compared to the IPad Mini it is heavier to hold. I use it side by side with my IPad Mini> I have recommended it to many of my friends.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Teamof4
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son and he is really enjoying it.  Definitely worth the price for the value. Good quality.

Reviews.Title: Minor glitch
Reviews.Author: James Geater
Reviews.Content: Had issues with silk right off the bat. Held the power button down for like 20 seconds to restart. Working fine now.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever !!!
Reviews.Author: Rose Walton
Reviews.Content: The kindle fire is the best tablet I've ever had. I love it and the price is awesome.Would recommend this produce to anyone. And amazon customer care is awesome.Even the shipping was fast. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: This will be my 6th kindle Fire that I've had to replace. While the first 5 were first generation kindled,this is the first 2nd generation kindle that has been sent. The memory storage is a lot bigger,but it seems to have some problems as well. The battery life is a big concern off the charger the battery doesn't last more than a couple hours. Although the percentage will say 100% the battery bar never goes green and almost immediately drops 2-4%.  The web browser is the worst. Almost every video you try to stream won't play ,even with the experimental viewer. I could go on for hours about how disappointed I have been with the Kindle. I already know that I'm going to have to replace this one soon, but this time I'm going to speak to someone from the corporate office.

Reviews.Title: kindkle 2gen#3
Reviews.Author: julianne parkinson
Reviews.Content: At first it just didn't seem as strong a kindle as what I'd had but I like very much now I am hooping trade up to the next level but really this line does all I really need.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Tammy Griffing
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fires are great!  They allow my students to read using technology which is required on the Common Core testing.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle
Reviews.Author: John S
Reviews.Content: The refurbished Kindle Fire was a good replacement for my older unit, that had problems with charging the battery. The fact that the original design for charging the unit was poor to start with is another issue all together.

Reviews.Title: Bad Touchscreen
Reviews.Author: Dr. Faith Bult
Reviews.Content: The unit came to me with a bad touchscreen.  The screen worked it just did not work in specific area that was touched.  Many other devices have the ability to adjust or to setup a touchscreen.  Evidently this device does not.  Several calls into Amazon Technical Support (which sounded like they knew as much about this device as I did) were fruitless.  I opted to send the unit back and purchase a new device.The new device has been working perfectly for over 3 months now.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Shari "Shari Grimes"
Reviews.Content: I love my new kindle and appreciate the price break to replace my older kindle.  Took me a little while to learn how to use it but it is now simple.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: lovemykindle
Reviews.Content: As soon as I received my first kindle reader I was hooked. At Christmas I couldn't wait to upgrade to the Fire. Being on a very limited income I was extremely happy to find they had refurbished Fire's at a very affordable price. Mine came without a blemish on it and it works just like New. I am extremely happy with my new toy and if you add in all the free games, apps, music etc you can "purchase" I will be content for a long long time. I am virtually a shut-in so this Kindle Fire is a God-send. Thanks Amazon

Reviews.Title: Review.
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: Good but the battery doesn't last long, overall it is great. Sometimes, the screen freezes. It may just be me

Reviews.Title: 5 stars
Reviews.Author: Jennifer l stotts
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire! The only issue I have had is the charger and Amazon has given great customer service each time.

Reviews.Title: Love her Kindle
Reviews.Author: Shya109
Reviews.Content: Shy loves her Kindle.  When the Kindle is down Amazon make sure she get's a replacement right away.  They have been very understanding

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Farmer, Joe
Reviews.Content: I had problems with the fire freezing the hole year I had it.  When it didn't freeze finding a cord that would charge it was a problem too. When I finally called CS it was 1 week since I purchased the fire for a Christmas gift.  They did except a free exchange and the replacement is working great.

Reviews.Title: Not as represented
Reviews.Author: Barbara Eugenia Durham
Reviews.Content: I was told by the Amazon rep on reply to my specific question that this earlier device would support JAVA and it does not. It also takes a rather long time to boot up. In addition it does not sync well with my Kindle paper white.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire review
Reviews.Author: miguel
Reviews.Content: Customer service was very helpful and polite. And the product we recieved was perfect nothing wrong at all. We appreciate how cooperative everyone was.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Barbara Edwards
Reviews.Content: I like it so far. Little problem navigating it. font a littlr to small in amazon home page.bye,bye.exit button would help

Reviews.Title: some bugs need to be fixed
Reviews.Author: Echo Shelton
Reviews.Content: There is a delay when typing and it sometimes changes the word to something completely wrong and not legible, it shuts down the internet randomly and has glitches....not completely satisfied with this item

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Nesbit
Reviews.Content: The kindle arrived in good condition, however, the connection for the charger feels loose and in danger of losing the connection for the charger.  This was the reason I exchanged my first Kindle Fire. As you know, recharging it is the most important operation of the Kindle or it soon becomes nonfunctional.

Reviews.Title: Really unfair to review 2nd Gen model now...
Reviews.Author: Brady Brown
Reviews.Content: If it looking for the best way to consume Amazon media, you've got to get the new HD Fire version.  This second edition was to cheap to pass up, but is just really lagging and hard to interact with sometimes, specifically sometimes inadvertently turning on menues while reading, then other times not being able to find them. Also, these older ones apparently charge much slower than the new ones. Even so, its amazing what they can pack in it at such a great price.Jeff Bezos did that better than Steve Jobs!

Reviews.Title: Not junk
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Works great. No problems. Good buy for the price. Coupled with Amazon Prime I can watch stuff that comes on tv, yeah.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Julie Jarvis
Reviews.Content: I love this product.  It is so entertaining, especially on long car rides.  Have lots of games and lots of fun.

Reviews.Title: Love the new Kindle
Reviews.Author: Craig Monroe
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and worth the cost. Can't wait to learn everything that I can do on this very versatile electronic device.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Amaya Renfroe
Reviews.Content: first kindle stopped working for no apparent reason, it was not damaged & kept in a protected case, but Amazon replaced it.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Thomas J. Romanofski
Reviews.Content: This was our first tablet so we bought the refurbished to try and see if we liked it works great used every day with no problems.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: This is such a great item and was so reasonably priced.  The quality is so exceptional.  Thanks to Amazon for selling this amazing item!

Reviews.Title: 2nd kindle
Reviews.Author: Tammy Kimmel
Reviews.Content: It works great. Charges completely with no issues. Still takes  a long time to charge in my  opinion even with the power fast charger

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: Luis Emilio Lopez
Reviews.Content: Well, I really didn't experience this item that much, since it was a gift for a friend. But it seemed like any tablet. The screen looked good, but I truly believe there are better screens and with higher definitions.At the end it does what it ways, at least. So no prob.

Reviews.Title: I love the kindle but always had problem charging it
Reviews.Author: Lisa RR
Reviews.Content: My kindle has always been very slow to charge, but I thought that was the nature of it. Now I am having an extremely difficult time getting it to charge at all so it obviously was an issue with the charge port.  Unfortunately, my warranty expired last month.  I am trying to find the contact information on the page to contact Amazon directly to see if there is something they can do to help with this charging problem without having to purchase a new kindle.  It also had a little light spot on it from when I received it.  I wonder if it was refurbished...  I should have sent it back immediately but having such a busy life really got in the way of that.Update:  I did speak with a very helpful person at Amazon.  He is sending me a new charger free of charge, to see if that will help.  He said we can also try a reset.  If all else fails then I will have to replace the device.  It will be a refurbished one at a discounted price.  I am really happy with Amazon Prime service and overall like the kindle.  I will have to see if I will be able to replace it.  I know it is my fault for not checking into how long my warranty was and for not sending it back.  Amazon's customer service is great and I felt they did a great job handling me.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire (Previous Generation)
Reviews.Author: JJ1949
Reviews.Content: I love it.  It is a bit different than the one it replaced but easier and love the improvements.  The size is great to put into my purse and take with me wherever I go.

Reviews.Title: Re-furbished Kindle Fire works well
Reviews.Author: Hercules
Reviews.Content: While the Kindle Fire is much more sensitive to the touch than we are used to, it does work well.  We are impressed with the manyh functions it performs!  We are about to get used to it and use it regularly to read books with.  We are not at this time using it for e-mail and other functions and may never do that.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was trying to replace an older kindle fire that would no longer hold a charge. It was out of warranty, so I figured I would have to pay full price. Instead, the nice man in South Africa told me of the benefits of buying refurbished at less than half the cost. Now my sons have their kindle free time back. We are very happy.

Reviews.Title: 3 kindles
Reviews.Author: Tilly1984
Reviews.Content: I have 3 kindles. One Fire HD and 2 refurbed Kindle Fires. One of the of the Refurbed ones stopped charging and wouldn't turn on. They replaced it without a problem. Which is great because my son was devastated when it stopped working.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: sue
Reviews.Content: I am so enjoying my Kindle Fire; it's easy to use and have had no problems at all!  The ease of the bookmark and able to make the fonts large adds to my enjoyment.

Reviews.Title: my review of Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Master Card "Eleanor"
Reviews.Content: my kindle dies after 2 years and financially I bought the re furbished kindle.  Its OK so far thank you

Reviews.Title: Great value for ereader/tablet.
Reviews.Author: Derek A. Riley "Shannon"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire. My only complaint would be more apps in the store. Battery life is not bad.

Reviews.Title: Prompt customer service
Reviews.Author: Lou Skunt
Reviews.Content: Touch screen was unresponsive right out of the box.  However, amazon had a working replacement here in two days.  The replacement unit worked great.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: julie
Reviews.Content: I was excited to get my Kindle Fire in the mail, added lots of apps and have enjoyed using it.  Very user friendly.  And a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kayla
Reviews.Content: It's affordable and I haven't been able to put it down since Christmas, I love absolutely love it!  Best gift ever.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: It is perfect for my daughter and I! We use it for mainly Netflix but it works perfect for everything else too!! Very happy with this investment

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: entertainme
Reviews.Content: Kids love it and I'm happy about the help I received in replacement amazon is best around keep up good work

Reviews.Title: a few disadvantages
Reviews.Author: Leo Schor
Reviews.Content: Did not realize that the battery life was so short.  Also can not read in the sunlight.  otherwise works fine.

Reviews.Title: love love love love love
Reviews.Author: shannon
Reviews.Content: This was my first tablet and I am totally in love with it! Works great. The WiFi is great!  Very happy with my kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: Like new
Reviews.Author: anncole15
Reviews.Content: Perfect condition. Works and runs like new. Great device. I purchased this for my four year old and he loves it.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying my Kindle again
Reviews.Author: bmrsnrgrammyk
Reviews.Content: My new Kindle is operating great (it was a replacement for one which would no longer charge).  I got the first one for Christmas 2012, and am glad to have the new one.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: sue cronk
Reviews.Content: I really like my Kindle, whether I'm reading a good book or playing games. there is just so much to choose from.. I just wish it hadthe app for farmtown then it would be the best ever...but I enjoy it just the same...

Reviews.Title: Can't imagine life without my kindle fire!
Reviews.Author: Musikmeister
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire!  I have a busy life and it goes everywhere with me!  The gym, work,  leisure time!  My husband purchased the otterbox for me which gives it extra durability!  I don't even use my laptop anymore!  My kindle does it all!

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: denise skeens
Reviews.Content: I am really impressed with customer service.  If an issue occurs, it's nice to have it resolved so quickly. It makes all the difference! Love the kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: Bought it for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Colleen Soop
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves her Kindle Fire! The apps that she can down load onto it and the games as well as the books...it's hours of entertainment for her.

Reviews.Title: Replacement Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Tonia Patino
Reviews.Content: Stellar performance so far.  Thanks for the replacement and no-hassle policy!  Product continues to work like a gem, even in the hands of a 6 year old boy!

Reviews.Title: YAY for fast shipping!
Reviews.Author: Naomi Sanders
Reviews.Content: Ordered this on 12/21 for a Christmas present for our niece and it was in my hand on 12/23.  Amazing!

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Ea Porter
Reviews.Content: I liked the Kindle Fire.  The only reason I returned this purchase is because I received a new Kindle as a Christmas present.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: My kids love it!!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Dometrius
Reviews.Content: Great product, perfect for my kids! Great value and built tough for kids! Love, love, love it! Thanks, amazon! :)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire (previous generation) - great upgrade from my first Kindle
Reviews.Author: lbl "lbl"
Reviews.Content: I enjoy reading eBooks on the Kindle Fire. I also have added several apps to it. Its size makes it handy when traveling.I would recommend the Kindle Fire to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Will not accept keyboard .
Reviews.Author: shutupndans
Reviews.Content: I am disappointed that it will not accept keyboard. Is there another model in the price range that will accept keyboard? I would like to exchange if possible.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Melnar
Reviews.Content: This is my first purchase of a Kindle Fire. I bought it to start learning more about and how to use these devices and so far it has not disappointed and I am having so much fun learning how to use it. I just love it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect! ��
Reviews.Author: nikki
Reviews.Content: This Kindle has been just like buying a brand new on but saves some money....which is always good! :) glad I chose to go the refurbished route! :)

Reviews.Title: grammie  goes  kindal
Reviews.Author: Darrickcook
Reviews.Content: Bought  for  my  grammie  she  can read  a good  book  in a day  she  likes  it  alot  refurbished was  juiced

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Phyllis Miller
Reviews.Content: Started to have trouble with the charging connection so this is a replacement one they stand behind them i love it and my 3 year old grandson loves it to i bye him games or books and he loves it and i read and keep in touch with my friends and family you wont go wrong with this tablet.

Reviews.Title: My old kindle died
Reviews.Author: katy rollins
Reviews.Content: My old Kindle died and I was heart broken.I turned the issue over to my dear husband and he went to work trouble shooting.He wound up on the phone with a very helpful Amazon employee in South Africa.Together they worked out a deal to replace my old Kindle with a refurbished Fire for a reasonable cost,The only problem is my husband got a Fire HDX for Christmas from our lawyer son and my reign as having best Kindle in the house ended,Now I'm sad,Maybe the folks in South Africa have a solution to this issue?

Reviews.Title: fun fun FUN
Reviews.Author: Pauline Cornelius "citizen"
Reviews.Content: I just love catching up on reading books, news, games and so much more...while waiting in the car, waiting for appointments, or vegging in my recliner.  Best gift I ever got!

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire 2nd generation
Reviews.Author: Sarah Barber
Reviews.Content: I love the ease of use and the amazon warranty. It means a lot to have a company stand so firmly behind their product.

Reviews.Title: Love my kindles
Reviews.Author: mabel reyna
Reviews.Content: Because my granddaughter is very happy with it. As a matter of fact I really need one more. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire 2nd generation
Reviews.Author: Sarah Barber
Reviews.Content: I love the ease of use and the amazon warranty. It means a lot to have a company stand so firmly behind their product.

Reviews.Title: Love my kindles
Reviews.Author: mabel reyna
Reviews.Content: Because my granddaughter is very happy with it. As a matter of fact I really need one more. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: larry  ollett
Reviews.Content: It's every thing I expected,it made my 11 year old grandson very happy. All his friends want one now. My wife  and I expect it to be a great learning tool. The price was great also. Thank You Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Lacks battery life
Reviews.Author: Ruben Vega
Reviews.Content: This device has a horrible battery life!!!  Next time, I will consider an iPad; much better battery life for the price.

Reviews.Title: Not as Good as I thought!
Reviews.Author: James D. Davidson
Reviews.Content: Number One...my husband bought my Kindle Fire for me a year ago Christmas so I could have the additional options other than books.  It is quite heavy compared to the other, but the features of e-mail, internet and other apps overcame my objection.  After one year, my apps began dropping and the battery would only hold a charge for about 8 hours, even if it was turned off.  I rebooted several time, got the apps back, only to lose them in a few days.  Your answer was to send me a new Kindle which is most likely the one you want me to rate.  I loaded the e-mail but was unable to load any of the folder information and we have about 20 folders with quite a bit of information.  After at least four contact calls and e-mails telling me the technical specialist could fix it, nothing was accomplished.  I was finally told to keep both at no charge.  As nice as that is, it did not solve my problem.  I now have one defective Kindle that has the folders and one that I cannot load the folder information.  I am not sure of the resolution, but am not happy.Any ideas????  Cindy and Jim DavidsonAccount is James D. Davidson

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Lawn Denise Carter
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire I have all my favorite books,games,music I don't leave home without my kindle fire I would recommend everybody to purchase a kindle fire it's so relaxing when your reading a good book I love it

Reviews.Title: we have three of these around here
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: Ordered one for my a few years ago, and love it.  Ordered this one for my 64 year old Mother as a Christmas presant.  I figure if she gets as far as looking at photos in an email, we are ahead....keeping my fingers crossed. She was a whiz on the computer, but the stroke has taken away a lot of her ability with electronics.  It is so simple, but that is not always the best soloution.  the other one, we ordered for my Mother in Law, who, at 89 years old, is having a blast.  Who would have thought of her being on Facebook?

Reviews.Title: Excellent condition..works wonderfully
Reviews.Author: Jean W Cain
Reviews.Content: This may be refurbished, but it works great...just like the "new" one I purchased before. My Grand-daughter just loves  "her" kindle.

Reviews.Title: Piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Jaqualynn lea Braddock
Reviews.Content: It is so slow and '......just don't get it  you are wasting your money is$159.69 but worth 60 DON'T BUY

Reviews.Title: Satisfaction with Refurbished Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Dorothy T. Tardy
Reviews.Content: It is everything promised and more!  I purchased it for my 95 year old Mother's birthday, and she's having a wonderful time with it!

Reviews.Title: like new
Reviews.Author: David B
Reviews.Content: I had an original kindle 1st generation file but it stopped working after 2 years of service - saw the refurbished 2nd generation and for the price it was a deal. My kid was very happy to get it for ChristmasOriginal leather case fits perfect for these two models!

Reviews.Title: Christmas success story
Reviews.Author: tori
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I got this for his mother and it is easy for her to use and exactly what she wanted

Reviews.Title: trade in for a broken kindle
Reviews.Author: JASON CALLAHAN
Reviews.Content: This was exactly what we wanted.  They even took our broken kindle as a trade-in. This way, we didnt have to pay full price.

Reviews.Title: storage managment and usp port problems
Reviews.Author: Andrea Fiala
Reviews.Content: we have had it 8 months on our 2nd device because the usp port on the 1st came loose. the available storage is very small. I don't want to pay for a cloud for a kiddy device. managing the storage is the worst part. Its like a filter that never gets fully clean and gets worse and worse over time until it the whole device needs replaced. I downloaded clean sweep as others have advices but still can only free up 20% storage if I'm lucky. my kids don't even use it anymore because the storage fills up so quick and then kicks them off the wifi. Then they hand it to me so I can delete the two or three apps they downloaded and free up 20% again. oh and just FYI for you new to amazon this device really needs amazon prime and Kid free time subscriptions to get the most out of it. its way to small to ever enjoy a movie on and the kids fight over the small screen.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Patricia  H. Law
Reviews.Content: I havr enjoyed this Kindle more than words can ever ecpress. It has everything I need to read  and check my emails.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Debbie M. Byrd
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift for my neice and she cant seem to put it down. I am so happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: educational device with poor quality
Reviews.Author: stacy
Reviews.Content: Amazon did not replace my device (defected items).  If you search on the web regarding this device charge port others have had this problem.  Last but not least, no one would repair this device. This item was not broken but had a known defect with charging according to Amazon customer services.  I feel that the Kindle purchased with this defect should be replaced.  Amazon just extended the year warranty for 3 months. This extension did not help me at all if I was unaware of the extension and the defected port in the device.  It was few months after my year warranty was up I began having problems with the device charge port (remind you, know notification regarding the device nor the extension given).  We began proping it up or holding it a certain way to charge and then it just quit charging all together.  Come to find out this device has a known defect at the charge port and Amazon would not replace item but wanted me to purchase the Kindle HD for my inconvenience.  Paid over 200.00 and device lasted a year; I would not recommend this purchase of Kindle fire nor Kindle fire HD.

Reviews.Title: 15 months
Reviews.Author: Shopper
Reviews.Content: I loved my first Kindle....then bought this one in October 2012....and this week the battery died....it's dead.  Not a very long life for this investment....very, very disappointed.  I'm not sure I'll buy another Kindle if they only last 15 months.....doesn't seem like a good choice.  But I have enjoyed using it and really liked having it with me.....might be the time to let go and find something a little more dependable.

Reviews.Title: Great deal on a great tablet
Reviews.Author: Lola Alice
Reviews.Content: Was apprehensive about buying refurbished, but it has been a great product. Some problems with charging as others have mentioned, but it all depends on the type of charger you are using. Don't use just any old cheap charger with it. Spring for the official one.

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: B. L. Moore
Reviews.Content: I love it in the fact that its small and I can take it wherever and read, search the web or play games. But the battery doesn't seem to last all that long, particularly if you are searching the web or playing games on it.

Reviews.Title: great for y girls
Reviews.Author: Rob V
Reviews.Content: I have two girls 7 & 5.  I purchased one for each of them and they LOVE them!  Their Kindle Fires have been a life saver on road trips and even around the house.  They love the games, music and movies!  It has been a perfect gift for them!

Reviews.Title: Still not keeping a charge as long as my original
Reviews.Author: Kipperley A. Gibson
Reviews.Content: Still not keeping a charge as long as my original, My second one did not hold a charge at all, and the third one is not as strong as my original one.

Reviews.Title: great stuff
Reviews.Author: mike south
Reviews.Content: my grandchildren love them, we have two, they love all the games that yall have, my wife also loves it, I think its a pretty awesome tablet also, tks amazon

Reviews.Title: REFURBISHED
Reviews.Author: Desiredbymany "Erotica Reads Are My Most Favs!!!"
Reviews.Content: KINDLE WAS REFURBISHED & VERY USED BEFORE SHIPPED TO ME & IMMEDIATELY STARTED GIVING ME PROBLEMS..HOWEVER AMAZON REFUSES TO UPGRADE

Reviews.Title: Loves her kindle
Reviews.Author: blanca
Reviews.Content: It works wonderfully my 8 years old daughter loves it. She sees movies, plays games and uses the internet. She loves it.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Claynishia McGhee
Reviews.Content: My son loves it no problems great price works like new....I will definitely be looking to but from this vendor again

Reviews.Title: So far so good.............
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: This is the 5th time (in 2 years) I've had to have this model replaced due to charging issues.  I upgraded to the Kindle Fire HDX at Christmas and gave this model to my son to use. So we will wait and see if in 5 or 6 months it needs to be replaced for the same issue.  Thankfully, it happens within the 1 yr warranty period, so there has never been a charge to replace it.  The only inconvenience is that my son loses all his work he's done with his MineCraft game and that upsets him.

Reviews.Title: I really like it
Reviews.Author: Chyllene H. Mclaughlin
Reviews.Content: I really like the Kindle, this one and the one I had previously.  I enjoy using it and like the displays.

Reviews.Title: Battery charge does not last
Reviews.Author: Ken from SC
Reviews.Content: The battery drains quickly after just an hour or two even when wifi is off.  I like the devise but it is becoming useless without battery charge.

Reviews.Title: love, love, love.
Reviews.Author: angie
Reviews.Content: Great product. Did not disappoint.  My children saved their own money and bought these. Now I can have my kindle back!!! Lol!

Reviews.Title: Overall Happy
Reviews.Author: AzMomof5
Reviews.Content: Purchased 4, one had to be sent back within 6 months and was given a new one. 2 of the 4 have had their screens shattered. but we got them replaced. I like these for my young children. However once they get older I don't know if we will stick with a kindle. Great customer service by Amazon BTW

Reviews.Title: Charging issues with ever Kindle I've ever owned.
Reviews.Author: MichiganMom2Boys
Reviews.Content: I would love to give the Kindle Fire a great review, because I really love the product when it's working! The unfortunate problem (and it's a big one) is that the charging system seems to have a design flaw that leads to product failure.  This was a third replacement for previous Kindles that have stopped taking a charge after a relatively short amount of time (less than a year).  My first complaint is that there is not an actual charger included with the purchase of the Kindle.  It only comes with a USB cable, and trying to charge the device from a computer takes a ridiculously long time.  I've concluded that perhaps Amazon doesn't include a charger because there's no such thing as one that works properly with this device for the long haul.  I've tried a lot of different chargers, thinking that perhaps it was just a matter of finding the elusive perfect charger to keep this device working.  No luck so far, and now I'm already running into charging issues with this latest Kindle.  Sorry Amazon, three strikes, you're out.  I've switched to an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Chris Gray
Reviews.Content: This product is user friendly. Picture quality is excellent. Gets a little heavy after long use and battery life is not as long as I hoped.

Reviews.Title: You Don't Want This Model
Reviews.Author: R. Adams
Reviews.Content: I hate to leave negative reviews, I really do. But I don't want anyone else to have the same problem I have had. We bought one of these for our son. Before the one year warranty was up it suddenly stopped charging. So I contacted Amazon and they did replace it free of charge. However, now the replacement one is also having the very same issue, and now, of course, the warranty period is up. So my son has no kindle. I believe this has to be an internal defect with this particular model. There is no way we would have two tablets do the same thing. I also have an HD model and have never had any issues with it charging. So, my point is, if you are going to buy a Kindle, don't get this model.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire not needed to resolve charging problem
Reviews.Author: M. Landry
Reviews.Content: I ordered a refurbished Kindle Fire when I was having trouble charging my first generation Kindle Fire.  It turned out that the micro-usb connector could not make a good connection to the charging port.  This problem persisted for the refurbished Kindle Fire.  I then tried the enclosed USB to micro-USB cable with aggressive micro-USB connector.  This cable was able to make a good connection and worked on both the old and refurb unit for charging.  So I returned the refurb Kindle Fire but kept the cable and purchase a charger with a USB port to complete the fix.  I lowered the rating one star because I had to remind Amazon to send me my  $72.00 refund for the refurbished unit.

Reviews.Title: What do I think about my refurbished Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: speede reader
Reviews.Content: Does not stay charged as long as I would like, but I love it.It may be because I have some games downloaded on it!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: henryd
Reviews.Content: I think  it's great  the battery does not last long but still great. I would get a new one soon

Reviews.Title: Some changes made to first generation Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: lifeisgoldenreader "lifeisgoldenreader"
Reviews.Content: I ordered what I was led to believe was a refurbished first generation Kindle Fire.  Some changes have been made to it, however, most notably, no longer able to play flash videos.  Not tech savvy enough to know what other changes have been made, but would caution anyone who orders this (perhaps to replace a malfunctioning Kindle Fire as I did) anticipating an identical product to expect the refurbished version to be configured a bit differently.  Not all improvements are bad--just different; the feel of it, some functionality are more similar to the KF HD.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: Amy1of6
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 11 year old daughter . I can't tell that is used and refurbished . She is happy and I saved money !

Reviews.Title: Awesome at half the price!
Reviews.Author: Beth Badertscher
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised by the refurbished kindle fire for my 9 year old son.  He absolutely loves it, for games and reading.  $100 was a more reasonable amount for me to spend for such a cool Christmas present.  Tons of apps- can't say enough how much I like it!  Just wish it came with a guide or paperwork.  That s why I gave only 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Rocks
Reviews.Author: Toni
Reviews.Content: I am sooooo very please wiht this Kindle and it is really what i needed!  Thanks for the discount and the added tools I needed!

Reviews.Title: Great Kindle
Reviews.Author: Luv Amazon
Reviews.Content: This is the way to go from Amazon - certified refurbished - if you want to save money. This is a very nice item. It comes re-boxed like it's brand new. Make sure you also purchased the Amazon Kindle 9W PowerFast Adapter for Accelerated Charging, too, as it does not come with one to plug into an outlet.

Reviews.Title: Replacing Kindle Fire due to battery failures
Reviews.Author: James H. Chico "Crafty Character"
Reviews.Content: Insofar as it will perform as did my original Fire did it will provide the service that I need. Since it has the same battery configuration as the original then I am probably going to suffer the same failure as I had with the original hence I will be needing to replace the refurbished one again in the not to distant future. I will probably decline purchasing another Fire again and go for a tablet of a different make to see if I can come up with a better alternative than spending the same money over and over again. I do like the Fire but I don't like having to replace it after a couple of years due to battery failure.

Reviews.Title: Good for price.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Battery doesn't seem to stay charged as long as the other Kindle's I purchased brand new a few months ago. Also, one Kindle must have come from the UK because where my others have .com button it has UK.com and I haven't been able to find how to change it. Good product for the price.

Reviews.Title: A satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: olive carr
Reviews.Content: If there is a complaint about my kindle, it it always corrected ASAP. I have been a kindle customer for over 5 yrs.

Reviews.Title: Good deal.
Reviews.Author: Michel DeMers
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is what I hoped it would be.  Purchased for my wife it is in daily use.  On the down size is an issue of sensitivity.  Frequently the space available for indicating where you want to go is very small, and with the response being so easily engaged it is too easy to make a mistake.  Which means that you end up in the wrong place, and have to confront the same problem in retreat.  This problem arises in other areas, as well.  But, all-in--all, it's a good product.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: Francine MacDonald
Reviews.Content: fun, fun, fun. I became addicted and would recommend the kindle fire to everyone who likes to read and play online games..

Reviews.Title: kf7
Reviews.Author: Texan
Reviews.Content: confusing at first, once you get the hang of it, its great. son loves it and he actually reads now.
