Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: kassie
Reviews.Content: Love it when I did have charging problems and called customer support they sent me a brand new kindle I had it in 2 days! Couldn't be happier

Reviews.Title: Smaller, but perfect.
Reviews.Author: Sunny in Minnesota "Sunshine"
Reviews.Content: This was a present for my son, it was smaller than the one my daughter got which I didn't realize until it came, but he loves it and it works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Thumbs up!
Reviews.Author: T. Perkins
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I expected! It says "refurbished" but if you weren't aware of that when you purchased it, nobody would ever know. I highly recommend this to anyone looking to buy a Kindle.

Reviews.Title: she is very happy
Reviews.Author: brenda Irvin
Reviews.Content: my brother bought this for his daughter for christmas and she is very very happy. I had to help him out but i did not mind i like the idea of being santa's little helper

Reviews.Title: Kindle fun!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my sister and she loved it!! it said refurbished but it came in the kindle original packaging and was perfect!! It looks just like the one I bought at Best Buy but for a way better price!! She uses it for reading and also surfing the net and watching netflix! A great purchase for sure.

Reviews.Title: A gift
Reviews.Author: zig
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift to my brother-in-law. He loves it and its working fine. Thanks amazon for your great service

Reviews.Title: Quirky but not fun.
Reviews.Author: Marjorie Stanko
Reviews.Content: I had to return the first one I ordered - the screen was non responsive, freezing and then, if I happened to be writing something, it would jump all over the place, erasing and replacing with nonsense. As well, the recommended Word/Office was ineffective and clunky. The only thing I could do without interruption was use the Kindle reader. I returned it and it was replaced and continued to do the same things. Additionally, it weighs way too much, heavier than most paperbacks. Definitely a disappointment.

Reviews.Title: My 5th Kindle?
Reviews.Author: Cateherine
Reviews.Content: I use this product daily and have come to rely on it for many things. My only concern is if  it will continue to work for more than a year. This is my 5th Kindle they seem to stop working right after the warranty runs out. Amazon has been very good about replacing the out of warranty Kindles at a reduced price. I read on my little black and white Kindle most of the time. If this Kindle stops working before the warranty runs out I will replace it with the Samsung Tablet and not try for a 6th Kindle.

Reviews.Title: thought it would be different
Reviews.Author: ryan
Reviews.Content: not ever owning a kindle or tablet and not one for the android market place cause I'm an apple guy. it pretty awesome easy to use everything is easy to understand just wish I had gotten the 16gb instead of the 8gb

Reviews.Title: Bad Kindle Fire Previous Generation
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my great granddaughter ... took it to Geek Squad to get it set up.  Not a kid friendly item.  This one wouldn't even let you type in anything - keyboard really messed up.  Returned it and got the new Samsung Galaxy 3.  Both the salesperson and the Geek man said it was far better than Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed...
Reviews.Author: cleon
Reviews.Content: When I first purchased this device I would have gladly given it 5 stars...however... The charging portal has become loose, and I have recently discovered that this is a common problem with the first generation fires...after the warranty expires of course...I was considering upgrading to an HD but if amazon was knowingly selling crap then, I have no confidence that they are not selling crap now. Perhaps it's time to find a different tablet all together.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is fantastic!
Reviews.Author: deanaw101
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement for a kindle that didn't work correctly. the service dept took very good care of the problem. i have only good things to say about this product. Dean

Reviews.Title: Disappointed...
Reviews.Author: cleon
Reviews.Content: When I first purchased this device I would have gladly given it 5 stars...however... The charging portal has become loose, and I have recently discovered that this is a common problem with the first generation fires...after the warranty expires of course...I was considering upgrading to an HD but if amazon was knowingly selling crap then, I have no confidence that they are not selling crap now. Perhaps it's time to find a different tablet all together.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is fantastic!
Reviews.Author: deanaw101
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement for a kindle that didn't work correctly. the service dept took very good care of the problem. i have only good things to say about this product. Dean

Reviews.Title: It works good.
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: It works good.  My only problem is I thought the Scrabble and books I bought could be accessed without the internet connection.  It is not useable in the car.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Chris Johnson "book worm"
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Easy to use.  Don't care for the ads that show up.  But getting use to it.  Would recommend the Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Leah Atherton
Reviews.Content: Because we had to replace it after less than a year. Otherwise not bad at all my daughter is enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: mandy moody
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my son for Christmas because he loves to read.  It has been a great asset for him.

Reviews.Title: Great product and a great price.
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: I bought this new kindle fire to replace the one that stopped working.  My nephew loves his new kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: Easy to read.
Reviews.Author: Cross2
Reviews.Content: I loved mine I have trouble with my eyes and I could change the settings for easier reading. I got the  HDX for Christmas or I would have kept it.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Robin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my daughter who had been wanting a larger screen than her iphone for reading books. She reports that it works great. Her only issue is with the browser, which doesn't format a lot of web pages correctly and there doesn't seem to be an alternative browser available to her.

Reviews.Title: TWO KINDLE FIRE 7"
Reviews.Author: Charles palermo
Reviews.Content: I NOW HAVE TWO (2) IDENTICAL KF7' and neither is working.  One which is new will only show the logo "Kindle Fire" and will do nothing.  The other shows different "to open" pages but will do nothing.  At first I thought it might be me; I mean two loco pods?  But then decided it had to be something else.  Today I will contact Amazon to try to determine what is wrong and if it can be put right.  This is a rare incident for me with anything from Amazon.  Despite all, I would certainly recommend this and any product from Amazon; one bad day does not mean there will be another.

Reviews.Title: Easy to read.
Reviews.Author: Cross2
Reviews.Content: I loved mine I have trouble with my eyes and I could change the settings for easier reading. I got the  HDX for Christmas or I would have kept it.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Robin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my daughter who had been wanting a larger screen than her iphone for reading books. She reports that it works great. Her only issue is with the browser, which doesn't format a lot of web pages correctly and there doesn't seem to be an alternative browser available to her.

Reviews.Title: TWO KINDLE FIRE 7"
Reviews.Author: Charles palermo
Reviews.Content: I NOW HAVE TWO (2) IDENTICAL KF7' and neither is working.  One which is new will only show the logo "Kindle Fire" and will do nothing.  The other shows different "to open" pages but will do nothing.  At first I thought it might be me; I mean two loco pods?  But then decided it had to be something else. Despite all, I would certainly recommend this and any product from Amazon; one bad day does not mean there will be another.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PURCHASE FOR THE KIDS
Reviews.Author: MOMMY "NIECEY"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my kids ages 8 and 10. They absolutely love it and I do as well. The market offers free educational apps that allow them to practice skills being taught in school while they are "playing" and I don't have to make them. It's a win win for both of us and I use a prepaid debit card which allows no purchases that aren't allowed by me because no money on card means no accidental purchases. They can download interactive books which makes reading fun for them. As stated before it's a win win and I would recommend highly.

Reviews.Title: Good product, as described
Reviews.Author: Ltmayhem
Reviews.Content: Could be a little cheaper, since it is a refurbished product, but the warranty is the same as new, so we're definately satisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Perfect gift!
Reviews.Author: Connie Swed
Reviews.Content: Gave two of these away for Christmas this year.  Two happy recipients.  Packaged very nicely, ready to wrap.  Delivered on time.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: tonjia allman
Reviews.Content: It is fabulous like having a small computer at your finger tips Love it.The screen is clear and the words are easy to read.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Beverly Gilmore
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my granddaughter and she was so happy Bless her heart!Works great and the price was right!

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This kindle was purchased as a Christmas gift for my 4 year old.  We love that it has Kindle Free time on it, and that we can select what games go on his Free time.  This was such a better route to go as far as tablets for children.

Reviews.Title: Good price
Reviews.Author: Jannie Mc
Reviews.Content: Purchased at a great price for children.  So far, they have been very functional and working just great.  Good choice

Reviews.Title: My husband loves his Kindle
Reviews.Author: Rosalinda Gamez
Reviews.Content: My son and I bought the Kindle Fire for my husband for fathers day, and he just loves it, he watches sports and music videos, he is so happy with it that he shows it to everybody and recommends that his friends get one.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Prudence Cichy
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire!! Wouldn't give it up for anything!  I watch Netflix all the time, get free books, listen to music.  The sound is great for both movies and music.  The color is fabulous.  Love, love, love it!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire, early edition
Reviews.Author: Megins Lezer "Megins"
Reviews.Content: I bought this product last year as a Christmas gift for our Great Nephews, 3 years and 5 years old.  They love it.  The parents love it, as it keeps the kids off the adult computer.  The parents especially like the the "timer" that tells the child that his time on the Fire is over.

Reviews.Title: Crystal clear screen and durable
Reviews.Author: Holly S. Bedard "Holly"
Reviews.Content: I bought the refurbished Kindle for my grandson and he loves it. He hasn't put it down since he got it. He watches Little Einsteins on it and reads his books. I got it for him to use on the plane since they were moving overseas and it has helped him transition to the new surroundings being able to find familiar programs and books.

Reviews.Title: Great buying experience.
Reviews.Author: Jeff Harper
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this buying experience product was as described and was delivered on time.Made my Christmas shopping that much better.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great refurbished product!
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this kindle for my mom for Christmas. So far it is working great and she loves it. It came with the USB cord for charging, but did not include a wall adapter. If you are hesitant to buy refurbished, it is just like new. No problems encountered. Great product

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Amympk2003
Reviews.Content: It works as expected and was a good deal for the money.  Wonder why it takes like 2 minutes to warm up, though, when you turn it on?  All the Kindles do that, it's the only drawback.  :-)

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle!!
Reviews.Author: Kimmy Baby
Reviews.Content: Love this product! It allows my kids to play games on the weekends and read their books during the week! Appreciate the fabulous customer service also!  Thanks Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Robert Williams "colafan"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it. Great price and a great product, we now own 3 kindle fires

Reviews.Title: Like new
Reviews.Author: Demetria Nelson-McNaulty
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter will not put this item down.  She is reading and gamingIke a champ on her kindle, it is doing what it's supposed to do.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle!!
Reviews.Author: Kimmy Baby
Reviews.Content: Love this product! It allows my kids to play games on the weekends and read their books during the week! Appreciate the fabulous customer service also!  Thanks Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Robert Williams "colafan"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it. Great price and a great product, we now own 3 kindle fires

Reviews.Title: Like new
Reviews.Author: Demetria Nelson-McNaulty
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter will not put this item down.  She is reading and gamingIke a champ on her kindle, it is doing what it's supposed to do.

Reviews.Title: My new Kindle
Reviews.Author: Penny E. Rackley
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle for my granddaughter and she loves it! She is required to read every day in school and it really helps her in many ways. We find new things it does all the time. Like yesterday when she was reading, she asked me what a word was and we found that holding down the word, it gives you the description, the vowels and what type of word it is. That is cool!She also loves the games and the piano and guitar apps.She received a lot of present for Christmas, but the Kindle was her favorite gift by a mile.The only issue I have, is that is say's the Kindle is: "Penny's 2nd Kindle" and I have only had one and I don't know how to change it to say: Diamond's Kindle". Can you please help me with that, so I can change it?

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Patricia Pennington
Reviews.Content: work great I like it glad I got it does what I need it to do will buy  it again

Reviews.Title: The Kindle would've been great for me... but charging port is loose and will no longer charge
Reviews.Author: Elena D. Christie
Reviews.Content: Description says it all.. took care of my kindle and didn't overuse it but the charger stopped working, after ordering another charger that doesn't work, don't think I will consider buying another kindle product in the future.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Karen Clifford
Reviews.Content: It has worked out perfectly for my grandson.  He was always asking to use his mom's and so it worked out that we couldget one for him.

Reviews.Title: Mostly enjoyed!
Reviews.Author: Sherbear
Reviews.Content: Overall, I was very pleased with my Kindle fire until suddenly it quit charging.  No warning, no reason, just wouldn't hold a charge.  of course, it was past the year warranty but in my mind a little more than a year should not have a device dying.  As far as quality and ability to use and the things I used it for, I cannot complain.  I used my kindle more than my desktop sometimes.  I loved being able to read anywhere (although I would recommend the paperwhite), play games, check messages, do my banking!!  I just replaced it with a refurbished Kindle...we'll see.  I just found out that the Kindles tend to have charging problems from another source.  Hopefully mine will last longer this time.  And the extended warranty is not available at this point.  Still for the price, I think it is a good deal.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Alan M. Haydis
Reviews.Content: the kindle should have been new as it was a replacement for a kindle under warranty.  The new kindle is very touchy and if not plugged in carefully it does not charge.  This is very annoying. I don't know if this fact warrants a replacement?

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle fire!!!
Reviews.Author: glovely1
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire.  Speed and clarity and my favorite that it charges super fast.  This is a big necessity since my kids take turns using it.  Customer service is great and always very helpful.  I'm thinking of getting 3 more kindles, 1 for each of my kids.  I definitely recommend this product!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: rosemary thomas
Reviews.Content: Real nice but have not gotten it set up right yet need more help on how to do it book did not tell much

Reviews.Title: works like new
Reviews.Author: Daphne Miller
Reviews.Content: The kindle looks great and works as expected; no problems at all with this device. Amazon did a great job on it.

Reviews.Title: Not Acceptable
Reviews.Author: junebug
Reviews.Content: I was told I would receive a self addressed envelope to return it if I was not satisfied. I did not return such because I did not know where to return it! I am definitely not satisfied! No connection cable to connect the thing ( this should have been mentioned) and the case itself was filthy dirty and all scratched up!!! I will be happy to return it when you send a self addressed envelope!

Reviews.Title: Excellent e-reader -- great for avid readers
Reviews.Author: H. Stone "Rolling Stone"
Reviews.Content: There are many pluses for this kindle, several because of Amazon, and several because of the availability of e-books from many sources.  Since owning my first Kindle Fire, my reading habits have changed considerably. Now I read a hundred or so books a year, up from about 25, and I choose very fine books instead of relying on what is available in airport bookstores, which is usually of marginal quality.Here is where I get books:1. Amazon web site:  An amazing collection of ebooks.  All genres, and very high quality (as well as some pretty poor reads -- you have to be selective).  Enough great reading for a lifetime, and continually growing.2. Download the Calibre program to your computer, and browse the world's bookstores and libraries for ebooks of your choice.  It can convert non-Kindle format into Kindle format in some cases, if you don't have an app on the Kindle to read the non-Kindle format.  It has access to free collections like The Guttenberg Project, as well as to web sites that charge.3. Access your local library through the library web site using Overdrive.  This works extremely well, but is only as good as your library's collection.  The quality and breadth of available library books varies widely with municipality.4. Borrow from Amazon Kindle lending library.  I have had varying success with this.  In a few cases, the selections were very good.  Many more I left unfinished, usually because the writing was inept or uninteresting.Bottom line:  The most reliable source for great reading is Amazon, Calibre is great for obtaining the classics at low cost or free.Other issues:  Kindle Fire First Edition is not particularly easy to use for web access to surf the web.  Kindle Fire Second Edition is much improved.  I have other ways to access the web, and feel that using the Kindle almost exclusively for books more than justifies its cost.I had a Kindle Fire First edition for two years that eventually reached a point that it would not fully charge any more.  While this was disappointing because I expected longer useful life, Amazon's service made up for the inconvenience. Within two days I had a replacement refurbished Kindle Fire Second edition at a big discount from full retail.  All of my books were already available on the replacement.  Dealing with Customer Service at Amazon was unbelievably fast and efficient.  My first call was put on hold for no more than 10 seconds, and there was no second call necessary.  When the Kindle failed, I had misgivings about getting another one.  But having gone through the replacement experience, I would not consider an alternate e-reader.My impressions of other readers, like the I Pad or Nook, is that each has particular characteristics that differentiate it from the Kindle.  Each is probably superior to Kindle is some aspect or another.  Since my main use of the Kindle is for reading books, I believe that the Kindle is far superior simply because it has instant access to an enormous library of quality books.

Reviews.Title: Good for older people.
Reviews.Author: SMM2571
Reviews.Content: I bought my Dad one of these a few months ago. He loves to read and he likes movies. At the time, they didn't have the HD version of this Fire but he hasn't complained yet. He loves it, and uses it daily. Very easy to use for someone who isn't tech savvy.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Jeff & Trish A. Munson
Reviews.Content: No problems with this one yet. LOL  I love the selections you can get with Amazon Kindles.  Thank you for the offers you have.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: William F Capron
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for the Kindle Fire I purchased for my mother that unfortunately was out of warranty.  Amazon was quite helpful getting me a replacement.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire7"
Reviews.Author: Phillip R. Pitt
Reviews.Content: Loved the unit but wish more information could have been given on how to operate it. A manual would have been great.

Reviews.Title: perfect condition
Reviews.Author: Laura Ball
Reviews.Content: Refurbish is in perfect condition - like brand new!  Can't go wrong with warranty included! Purchased for 8 year old boy he loves it!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: CJS
Reviews.Content: Got this for my 90 yr old father for Christmas. The Kindle workd great and very easy for him to use.

Reviews.Title: Kids
Reviews.Author: Angel Strain
Reviews.Content: Got myself a kindle for Christmas one year and enjoyed mine so much that I got one for each of my daughters.  They love them also!

Reviews.Title: Pretty good refurbished Kindle
Reviews.Author: Tiffany Leeman
Reviews.Content: Love the Kindle. But it didn't come with a charger!  That made the Santa gift a bit inconvenient. But it is a great device.

Reviews.Title: Works great, wish it came with some instructions
Reviews.Author: QE1088
Reviews.Content: The Kindle is in perfect condition an works great!  I marked "this is a gift" when I ordered it so that it would come unregistered but it still came registered to me (which luckily was easily changed).  It also came with no instructions at all and no wall charger.  Luckily I have my own Kindle Fire so I was able to help my dad figure most of it out and his phone charger fit it so it can charge.Overall a good buy.

Reviews.Title: xmas present for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: she loved it, she had wanted one for a long time and this was the perfect xmas present for her

Reviews.Title: Love this device!
Reviews.Author: Terri J. Anderson
Reviews.Content: This item was refurbished, but arrived in absolutely perfect condition.  It is lightening fast and has excellent graphics.  I can't wait until I can upgrade again.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: destiny piazza
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these for my kids for Christmas. They LOVE them and you would never be able to tell that they are not brand new! Great bargain!

Reviews.Title: Flawless as always!
Reviews.Author: Nena
Reviews.Content: I had the assignment to order a Kindle for my dad for Christmas from my mom, and I knew Amazon was the place to come. I got a great deal for a brand new Kindle Fire simply because the seller didn't want it! And it was delivered Christmas Eve!

Reviews.Title: Decent alternative
Reviews.Author: Amazon junkie! "Amazon Junkie!"
Reviews.Content: The refurbished Kindle Fire has been working as expected.  It was delivered earlier than indicated when ordered.  There was not a user manual included or any other instructions so operating it has been mostly trial and error.  A charger is not included.  That may the case with a "new" Kindle as well though.

Reviews.Title: great purchase
Reviews.Author: raleighkate
Reviews.Content: Worked perfectly and does all the things I needed it to for less than $100.  It would be nice if it included a cord that plugs into the wall outlet, but has a USB plug-in, so it works fine.

Reviews.Title: was great
Reviews.Author: Linda O'Connell
Reviews.Content: Everything was great. They are working very well and it was a great gift! I would deffinitely order again. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: My kids love it
Reviews.Author: Christy Holley
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire 7" LCD Display, Wi-Fi 8 GB has been wonderful for our kids. We love it just as much as they do!

Reviews.Title: Loving our kindle
Reviews.Author: Ang L
Reviews.Content: Ease of use, seamless functionality...easy enough for our 4 year old to use but sophisticated enough for parental controls and safety features for her!

Reviews.Title: Great device!
Reviews.Author: zombman
Reviews.Content: I have had no problems with my kindle fire second gen. device.everything has been pretty much perfect with it, thus the 5 stars.and I would recommend it to everyone that needs-wants.a solidand stable device.zm

Reviews.Title: perfect gift
Reviews.Author: rafael cedano
Reviews.Content: my son was so happy ., for at months ago every weeks the same question when dady .  THANKS THANKS

Reviews.Title: Honest Seller
Reviews.Author: laura gubler
Reviews.Content: I had the best experience I've had in years on Amazon, this seller is honest, and emailed and called me right away when I had a concern with my order and she had it shipped to me the day she said it would be here! It's nice to know there is good honest people still out there, this was a present I needed for my daughter by a certain day and because of this seller and her honesty she made me a happy momma and a little girl that is going to be very happy! Also the Kindle was in perfect condition! I am very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Lynne Keeler
Reviews.Content: I couldn't praise this wonderful Kindle enough.  It suits everything I do, reading, internet look ups ect.  It's a keeper!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "-*-Lisa"
Reviews.Content: We needed our old Kindle Fire replaced due to issues with the charging port. Even though it was out of warranty, Amazon offered us a good deal on an updated refurbished model.  The new-to-us Kindle works well and looks great! Thanks Amazon.com!

Reviews.Title: love the kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Jennie Larson
Reviews.Content: the kindle fire is just what I wanted and I just love the color and all the fiatures that come with it.

Reviews.Title: I Returned it
Reviews.Author: Jean Rickards
Reviews.Content: Had it for 2 weeks, and never got connected to the Wi-Fi. I even had a computer tech come to the house, which I paid for, and he couldn't get it to connect either.  I received and email from Amazon that they received my return on 12/23,  Still have not gotten my refund credited to my credit card.  The email stated 1-7 business days.  Apparently there is a reason they are "REFURBISHED"  They didn't work the first time, so don't expect them to work the second time.

Reviews.Title: Beware - it is refurbished
Reviews.Author: julie brown
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these refurbished kindle fire items and one of them worked just fine, however, my daughter has had to call amazon to get the other one working and it is not working well.  I will have to rethink ordering anything else.

Reviews.Title: a blast
Reviews.Author: Raymond G.
Reviews.Content: Love this thing - might get myself one too nd my sister was even impressed by it's easy to use features

Reviews.Title: my kindle fire
Reviews.Author: hartbeat
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my refurbished Kindle Fire.  In perfect condition-quality of print/background excellent.  Interactionwith my kindle touch good.  A fine bargain so far.

Reviews.Title: We'll done Amazon.
Reviews.Author: Carol Slater
Reviews.Content: So far it has worked very ,very good. I appreciate the way we were treated . I will continue too order more things from you.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle
Reviews.Author: Joyce Nelson
Reviews.Content: This Kindle does not hold a charge for very long.  Seems like I always have to have it on the charger.

Reviews.Title: This thing is great!
Reviews.Author: chris kingston
Reviews.Content: Bought this because my girlfriends laptop in ancient and she needed something to take around with her and use etc. It runs really well, I use it to watch Netflix while I do dishes and stuff like that and it's great. If you have a Prime account you can "borrow books" to read without paying for them. (that and free two day shipping on thousands of items, TOTALLY worth it) We have no previous experience with Kindle's or anything like that but this one as a starter has made an excellent impression and will get tons of use I'm sure. The layout is super super simple and it's linked to your accounts directly [Facebook, Pinterest, Gmail all that good stuff] and makes everything really easy to use. The only thing that I guess I was not even disappointed in, but expected maybe a little more from, is the main screen itself and the lack of customization as far as the background when you pull it out of sleep mode and it really doesn't have much of an interface option. Whatever it works and it's awesome so I don't care she likes it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the kids
Reviews.Author: BBQGUY
Reviews.Content: Got this Christmas 2012 for the kids and a year later they are still using them all the time.  This is perfect size for teens and preteens and has most of the games they are looking for.  At this price picking up 3 was not an issue.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Condition, No Manual
Reviews.Author: jeri hodder
Reviews.Content: the only complaint is that there was no manual for newbies to Kindles like me. condition was like new, though, so overall very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle working just fine
Reviews.Author: Rosalynd Jensen
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is working just fine and I'm completely satisified.....couldn't beat the price for the quality of product we received.

Reviews.Title: Nice initial tablet for a reasonable cost
Reviews.Author: MICHAEL S ALLEN
Reviews.Content: The basic Kindle Fire gives a good combination of features for an initial tablet user.  The WiFi access to our internet service works great, facilitating browsing from anywhere in the house.  The screen is crisp and bright, easy to read under all conditions.  Performance is good and the host of applications that are available at little or no cost opens up practical uses such as cataloging recipes and bringing them up for use in the kitchen.  It's nice to be able to download recipes directly to the device and never have to type a thing by hand.  I love being able to access multiple translations and paraphrases of the Bible on one compact device while I am in church or studying at home.  Access to e-mail is helpful and convenient.  Access to books through my public library is also convenient.  Battery life is amazing on this device, as is the technical support from Amazon (which I only needed on the defective Kindle Fire I originally bought through a third party reseller of "refurbished" products - stay away from sales except through Amazon directly!) .  A far cry from an iPad with a data plan for use anywhere, this is a very nice compromise for most of the things I do at home or without internet access.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Photo Girl
Reviews.Content: Works like new.  Bought a new one last year for my middle daughter.  I really didn't want to spend $149 on the LeapPad for my 5 year old because in a couple of years she will grow out of it.  I love the Kindle fire because of the Kindle Free time app.  My kids can use the app with age appropriate content and I don't have to worry about it.  Also with free time I can set parameter like how long they have to spend on educational applications before they can play their other games.  This is an awesome product and I am very happy with it.  You would have never known that this was a refurbished Kindle.  It work and looks brand new!!!
